name: Dyarna Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
Review for the hotel:
Location : 5/5
Near everything, centrally located at a quite and relaxing area

Rooms: 2/5
Rooms are super old, mattress are the worst, windows and doors are passing wind because its too old

Sleeping quality: 2/5
Mattress is aweful , you can hear everyone moving or talking at the hotel from your room

Staff: 5/5
Very helpful and nice staff

Breakfast: 3/5
Limitied food varities, it was okay

Overall experience 2/5
The hotel is a good value for money but it needs to be renovated in terms of rooms at least since it has very nice location
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.text: We have been visiting this hotel on and off for the last 15 years. It has had a lot of money spent on renovations and new TVs and A/ C systems. The buffet breakfast by Omar is superb. The only problem we had was groups of people talking around the pool at 1.30am when we trying to sleep. Maybe we are too old! Still our go to hotel in Dahab.
reviews.title: Fantastic location

reviews.text:
Very cozy hotel, at a perfect location for being very near of the main attraction area of the city, meanwhile not too close so it's a very quiet area
Staff are very friendly and cooperative, and the place is quite clean
some maintenance need to be taken care of, especially the mattresses
reviews.title: Great place for relaxation and enjoying the beautiful city of Dahab

reviews.text:
Good hotel near the sea ,clean rooms  ,on the hotel areas three is good diving center ,rooms have ac and tv,you can get room with sea view it’s really beatiful in 3 min walk nice German bakery with amazing coffee and pharmacy ,shops 
Swimming pool also nice 
Diving center here  offer diving courses and they really good ones if you have never dive before you can get open water padi or advanced or etc 
Really nice place to stay in Dahab
reviews.title: Good hotel stay in Dahab

reviews.text:
The room was directly on the sea view and i were looking for view like that 

Water was good , A/C was good 

Pool is open 24\7 and this is nice for me to do after party with some friends 

Don't ask Room service after 12 clock ⏰
reviews.title: If you want average cost for sea view

reviews.text:
It’s a good place to stay it if u pay 10 USDs per night , but compared to its price TOTALLY NOT WORTH IT !! 
No water in the room when I checked in , dirty sheets and pillows. Staff is rude and unprofessional. Checked out after 8 hours there even thou I payed for 2 nights.
reviews.title: Terrible over priced place

reviews.text: The hotel is only one star not 3 stars,the hotel is average but the worst thing is room cleanliness,the breakfast was good almost avergae,the hotel has two pools one for children and the other is for adults,but there is another problem that the air conditioner is not working properly and the tv screen is small.
reviews.title: Dyarna hotel review

reviews.text:
Overrated,poor room quality , some of the staff are really nice and helpful but the mangment is quite unprofessional 
I hade to leave a day earlier cause i could't stand it
Not recommended cause there are so many better cheaper places and all the people at dahb are frienldy
reviews.title: Loved dahb / hated dyarna

reviews.text:
I stayed here last week for a 2 night stay as part of an Intrepid Basix Tour through Jordan and Egypt.  

I really liked this hotel. It is a basic accommodation and should be reviewed as such.  The rooms were big and clean with a cute balcony (great view) and I never had an issue with hot water.  

The pool area was very nice and loved sitting, relaxing and watching the sunrise.

The breakfast was not the greatest but there are plenty of very cheap options nearby. ( Yum Yums was my favourite!!)

WIFI in Egypt in general is not the greatest so I have a Vodophone SIM to use when I come to Egypt.  250LE will set you up nicely for where ever you go. 

The service was excellent.  The staff were kind and courteous and their English was great.

I loved that it was located on the walkway that can take you essentially anywhere in Dahab.  I love to walk so this is an added bonus.

I recommend this property to those that enjoy an authentic experience rather then luxury and I will personally stay here again.
reviews.title: 2 Night Stay

reviews.text: I’ve been there for 4 nights and I have actually nothing to complain about. The staff is really kind & helpful - something I value the most. The rooms are clean, furniture is basic. The internet works only around the pool. There are always many locals that are also as kind as the hotel staff. Breakfast is made of open buffet, where you can find a lot of good food, you’ll definitely find something for yourself. The only thing that I didn’t like that much was the fact, that there was only a one small window in my room, but it didn’t bother me that much because I spent most of the time outside. I really enjoyed being at Dyarna.
reviews.title: Great place

owner_response.text: Thank you for your review wishing to see you soon
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: the location is what made me book thi hotel. I really relay love the restaurant on the beachfront, Their mnu i a bit all over the place but it has some very tasty things on there!  Hotelroom ws clean, with ac and private bathroom
reviews.title: very good location

reviews.text:
This small hotel is good. The roos is clean, and with its own bathroom. The resturant is on the other side of the bouleverad on the beach. It is nice to go for a swim and come back and have breakfast.  
The russian food on the menu i nicer than the english food.
reviews.title: Good hotel, prime location

reviews.text: I was amazed that directly on the boulevard, you can find hotels like this! It is nog superdeluxe, but you will not spend much time in your room anyway when you have the choice to sit in the restaurant at the beachfront. They have sunloungers, and proper table an chairs to work from.
reviews.title: Supercheap hotel directly on the boulevard

reviews.text:
This was our first time in Dahab and at Sababa it looked very clean. The staff in the restaurant was super-friendly. The menu is half Russian half European and Egyptian so a good mix of food. 

I can recommend the fresh juice. It is really fresh and made without sugar or water.
reviews.title: best food and very clean

reviews.text:
We came to this restaurant because it is next to the tour company we used King Safari( very good!!). 

The restaurant is at the beachfront and serves a very good breakfast and good coffee. 
Staff is very attentive and the place is clean, even the toilets!! ;-)
reviews.title: beautiful & friendly

reviews.text:
Sababa restaurant is in the center of the boulevard. The restaurant is clean, with a nice sitting area and wifi. And easy entry to the beach. 

This was one of the places where they didn't play the horrible music really loud. I was pleasantly surprised by the menu! I didn't know this was a Russian restaurant!
Very good coffee, and loved the dumplings!
reviews.title: Very nice  and clean restaurant at the beachfront

reviews.text:
Sababa was the only place where we all (10 persons) could sit together, so we went there. I was bit critical at first but the staff made such a great effort making us all feel welcome that  we kept coming back ;-) ;-) 

Nice, relaxing place. Good coffee and juice, and totally loving the Russian menu!
reviews.title: Nice place to chill on the seafront

reviews.text:
The hotel was very helpful with our check-in time ( 3 am). The rooms are simple but clean.  They have their own restaurant directly at the beachfront where you can swim and hang out all day.  The food was good, and they make the best-iced coffee in town. The chef was very thoughtful. I mentioned I didn't care for tomatoes on the first day and haven't seen them on my plate for the rest of my stay, which I  appreciate very much.

I think for this price you will find nothing else directly on the boulevard.
reviews.title: Very good hotel

reviews.text:
There are many restaurants in Dahab, and this one was recommended to be good. 

This was the first time I and my fiancee tried Russian food, and it was absolutely delicious!  The restaurant is nice and clean and at the beach front.  
Only negative was that it took at least 20 minutes before we were served our drinks.

If you are in for Russian food and want to sit on the beachfront, this is the place to be!
reviews.title: Excellent Russian Chef

reviews.text: Loved this hotel, mainly because it is  directly on the boulevard with access to the see. I loved taking one of the peddle boards in the morning, to come back at the beach and the staff already had my fresh coffee and orange juice ready. They took very good care of me and my family during our stay in Dahab
reviews.title: Perfect location

location.address: El Masbat Street Masbat Beach, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text: This is probably the best value accommodation in Dahab. Selection of rooms - small and basic with shared bathrooms, ensuites, and more spacious ensuites with balconies. There's two bedouin-style social areas offering shade, plus a couple of benches in the sun. There's a rudimentary kitchen with two fridge-freezers, stove and pans etc. with a new one being built as I write - should be ready in the next few weeks. FREE drinking water (huge bonus, especially if you hate to waste plastic) and a washing machine for guests' use. The place is kept clean and is well managed. Staff and owner are friendly and responsible. There's cats in the common areas (but they don't wander into the rooms). Good location in the middle of Dahab, 1 minute walk to the sea. Especially low rates for longer term stays. My room is an en suite twin with balcony. Two single beds (linen and towels provided), a desk, two chairs, mirror, bedside table, wardrobe, bathroom is fine, balcony is a nice place to relax. Wi-fi is decent most of the time. Note: there's I think three guesthouses in Dahab with the name "kangaroo" and/or "oasis". This is the one at the end of the short alleyway opposite Ali Baba restaurant. I know I sound a bit like an advert, but I'm really pleased to have found this place - been here four weeks now, relaxing, reading, writing. Their whatsapp is +201067037433
reviews.title: well managed and very good value

reviews.text: It's clean, low budget( help you save your money for mor excursions in Dahab ) and has a central location in the lighthouse area. The owners are friendly. That's all you need in Dahab. Good for backpackers and not for families. There are also rooms with AC. The only disadvantage is that some bathrooms have no doors. Otherwise is ok.
reviews.title: Low budget, clean and central

reviews.text: I see it's a nice place cheap , simple, nearby sea , no service here but they have a lovely stuff and you can go anywhere you want it's not so far , they have a small kitchen but useful so you can cook by your self and dining in outdoor place they also have wifi internet .
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text: Room was not clean, no air conditions, no fridge, no tv,  no food, no water ,nothing in a room but a bed and I was okay with this but the thing that I was not okay with is the terrible bathroom I saw people's pee and poof in every place no one clean it and sometimes there is no water inside it. As an advice don't even think to go there.
reviews.title: Horrible

reviews.text: We ended up on a last minute road trip to Dahab, and a friend recommended this place. It's nothing fancy, but it was clean and for the price I was totally happy. If you're looking for a place purely to sleep at the end of a long day diving/kitesurfing/drinking it's perfect, but if you're expecting luxury go elsewhere
reviews.title: Cheap, clean, friendly staff

reviews.text:
I am an Egyptian but it's my first visit to Dahab  it's a quit place and full of nature places . the camp is just 10 meters of the sea . take care that there is two camps called kangaroo go to the one in the street in front of "The kitchen "restaurant  the manger called Salah and he is friendly guy he can organize your trips all around Dahab  in the sea and in the desert and he have the best prices of them all. 
irst look I didn't like the places but in the next 30 min I found it greaaaaaat .I  recommend it
reviews.title: friendly manger

reviews.text:
Stayed here first for 3 days when we got in trouble with one of the other guests because beer and food was stolen from us out of the common fridge. 
We didn't see this other guest perform the theft our selfs but the man in charge of the camp, Jamar, insisted it was this other guest and we trusted Jamar. So we got in a fight with the other guest and decided to do a 3 day trip to the desert and other places and then return when the other guest would be gone.

The theft of the food didn't stop and we soon realized it was the personnel them self taking guests food from the common kitchen. 
We complained about this and also that the wifi always was down. Jamar explained that wifi was down in all of Dahab. We told him this wasn't true because it worked fine everywhere else. So his solution to the problem was that he thought that we could go to the other places and use their wifi. We said that that was a ridiculous idea and that he should just fix their wifi. He then went into a frenzy and asked us to stop complaining about everything. We thought it was just fare to point out that our stuff was stolen and that the wifi, that is included in the price, didn't work. 

There is so much negative things to write about the place so i will try to be as short as I can but it wont.

The personell didn't do any of their tasks unless the owner were there. Then they were all over the place, cleaning the rooms, the common places, painting the walls etc. However when he wasn't there they were just a bunch of useless sitting around taking up the guests space, smoking and drinking coffe all the time. They weren't friendly and Jamar were even hostile at times. He was really the core problem of the whole camp. The guest there was great people but he made sure to talk bad- about everyone and try to turn other guest around each other (our example: the false accusation about the guest stealing from us). He even talked ill about the fantastic cat lady who only did good for the community and the camp. Everyone adored her and he couldn't stand someone doing better for his country.

Because the workers didn't do any work we the guest our self had to do alla the work. The only one in the work force who really did some of the work was Mohammed who were really friendly and tried to help out and stop Jamars shenanigans.

The rooms were cheap but not clean. We had to clean our own rooms. 
I would so much more recommend the other fighting Kangaroo camp where we moved over to, after being threatened by Jamar who took a frying pan and hit it in the table! where me, my wife and two other people sat and ate breakfast, because he thought we had made a mess in the kitchen. We had spend the entire morning cleaning the camp.
After that we immediately packed our things and left. 

Also, he was threatening everyone that he got in an argue with that he would call the police on them. What the police would do under the different circumstances that occurred were very unclear. Of course he never called the police.

A beautiful camp but with a really hostile environment that just makes you want to cut your vacation short.

Thanks for listening and please, for your sake, stay at another camp. There are so many good options in Dahab.
reviews.title: Horrible personnell

reviews.text:
My room was simple but clean. The price is very cheap. The place is quiet. 
Mohamed is very friendly and it's a pleasure to drink tea with him.

Thank you for your welcome and your simplicity !

Christine
reviews.title: nice camp

reviews.text:
it's quite, clean, cheap and relaxing, they have a variety of rooms rangring between 60 EGP per night to 120 EGP per night for a double airconditioned room with a balcony and a private bathroom,
Kitchen is communal and the camp has a laundry room , and both the management and the residents are really friendly . It's a great place to lay on your back and enjoy the relaxing vibes of Dahab
reviews.title: Cheap, Cozy and clean

reviews.text:
Me and a friend came over for a week long diving trip and stayed here.

Prices for the low and mid tier rooms were very cheap, we stayed the first couple of nights in the cheap ones and later on moved on to the next level because those rooms also had AC.

The staff was very friendly and the guests were as well, very good atmosphere!

The location is great, right on the main strip close to most of the diving clubs and the shops.

Next time I'm in Dahab I'll be staying there.
reviews.title: Great value, great atmosphere

reviews.text: It has been great choice to stay at Dahab Home, the place is very nice clean and comfortably,  new furniture,  very nice breakfast included and staff are very helpful polite and friendly,  highly recommended for all travellers
reviews.title: Very nice

owner_response.text:
Dear Hanan
Thank you so much for your nice review , looking forward to see you soon again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
Very nice and clean,staff are great help, very close to all restaurants and Caffe,2 minutes walking to the beach ,
Will definitely keep staying here at Dahab home, 
Breakfast on the rooftop is amazing, best sunset view.
reviews.title: Great experience

owner_response.text: thank you so much for the nice review ,it has been very nice to host you at Dahab Home ,wishing you safe travels and hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
We have been several times in Dahab and this time was first time we stayed in Dahab home. The staff is simply amazing, the kindest, most helpful and they are taking care you get the best of your holiday. The place is cozy, clean and with great breakfast (a mountain view on terrace included:) ). Location is just a step away from the city center.
We are looking forward to coming back asap
reviews.title: Dahab home feels like home

owner_response.text:
Dear Ana
Thank you so much for your nice review we are glad you like it ,it has been very nice having you and friends staying at Dahab home - safe travels and hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay at Dahab Home. Tarik and his family are lovely, friendly, helpful people - nothing was too much trouble. The location is great: quiet; only a short walk to the sea front; and very close to numerous cafes and restaurants. We loved having the delicious breakfast on the delightful roof and were very comfortable in our room, which easily met all our needs.
reviews.title: Great choice

owner_response.text: Thank you so much for this nice review , we hope to see you soon again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

name: Golden Heights Resort
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
Just returned from a beautiful 7 night stay at Golden heights Aqua park, the hotel was beautiful had clean rooms, beautiful sea view and great house keeping. The food was beautiful with plenty variety and great taste! Aqua park was so fun,swimming pool was clean and overlooked the sea. Free hotel transportation is also available to el mamsha Everyday from 9pm to 1130pm which is super convenient.

Overall I would highly recommend this hotel,the experience was amazing. Every single staff Member went above and beyond for us and made our stay so special and accommodated us at all times whenever they could. Massive thank you to Mokhtar in reception for always being so helpful and cheerful. 

A huge thank you to all the bar staff for their excellent service including Islam & Abdrahman and a special shout-out to Faried for always greeting me with a smile and making us feel so welcome! My experience wouldn’t be the same without you. 

Thank you to everyone at Golden Heights Aqua park for the most spectacular experience and the great service you have all provided and all the efforts in making our stay extremely special. We hope to see you all again soon!
reviews.title: Highly recommend

reviews.text:
The rooms were very clean,The food is delicious and the Hotel Manager was Very friendly and eager to make us feel welcome have a good time. The rooms has a Pool and a Sea View which is Brilliant. 
The sea is relaxing and the beach is clean. 
I would recommend it to anyone visiting Dahab. I would def. repeat the experience
reviews.title: Relaxing with an amazing view

reviews.text:
“Hidden gem in Dahab!
The Staff are so hospitable and welcoming, always going above and beyond to ensure your comfort and convenience.
The hotel is perfectly located in the back away from the hustle and bustle yet it's super easily accessible to the main road and the beach is less than 2 mins away.
The rooms are quite big and equipped with everything you need, the bathroom is quite spacious.
The swimming pool is quite nice,
Special thanks to ms.Rabab the hotel manager and Ahmed for looking after us.
Will definitely come back over and over again”
reviews.title: It is wonderful. Everything is going smoothly

reviews.text:
The place is so peacful, we enjoyed our stay there.

It's so near to the sea and the resort is very clean.

Restaurant and food in general needs improvement as the varities are very limited.

The hotel staff is exquisitly friendly.

If you need to relax this is the place to go ;)
reviews.title: Peacful resort

reviews.text: Waw what a trip it was.  I would like to thank the owner of the place who had smartly choosen the place for travlers liike us to enjoy. It wad amazng climate with beautiful sites around.we enjoyed alot there.my wife who always find some quest in the food outside home wad praising the food quality that was amazing for me that she liked it n I too liked the food quality.moreover the service was very good.wish to visit the place again soon
reviews.title: Incredible trip to golden heights residency

reviews.text:
الفندق نظيف بس بدائى جدا ومفيش مارينا والصخور فعلا خطر لان مفيش ثبات تماما والطريق طويل للغطس او حتى للعوم وغير ممهد تماما 
ستاف ممتاز ومتعاون وناس طيبة جدا 
مفيش وسائل رفاهية او انشطة 
اقتراح للفندق لو يحط حتى لوح خشب لحد مكان نزول المياه يبقى زى الفل
reviews.title: اكتوبر

reviews.text: الفندق جميل جدا فعلا و كل اللي شغالين هناك بشوشين للغاية و حسيت ان المكان بيتي فعلا، الڤيو ع البحر جميل و البحر نفسه في نزوله حلو جدا ومش ضحل، و قعدات الشاطئ لطيفه ومتنوعه وفيهم قاعده بدوي لطيفة خالص، و الاكل نضيف و طعمه حلو و إدارة المكان ناس فوق الذوق بمراحل فعلا، اتبسطنا جدا هناك فعلا
reviews.title: اقامه جميلة

reviews.text:
Неделю отдыхали в этом отеле. 
Это было восхитительно! Чистый, спокойный, уютный отель. Первая линия, небольшой номерной фонд, туристов практически не было, в бассейне плавали одни, на пляже тоже отдыхали одни. 
Максимально романтинческий и уединённый отдых получился, чему мы были несказанно рады. 
Очень вкусно кормят, чистая посуда, всегда все убирается-вытирается во время, никакие мухи над грязными тарелками не летают, как это бывает в больших отелях. 
Персонал максимально вежливый и дружелюбный, всегда помогут, подскажут, посоветуют. Вкусные смузи подают в баре у бассейна (за отдельную плату).
Единственная претензия по персоналу так это к ресепшену. Ресепшен не предупреждает о том, что в море без специальной обуви заходить опасно, как итог - мой муж наступил на морского ежа,
 и как потом выяснилось их на этом пляже немеренное количество. Оставшиеся дни мы были очень внимательны и уже плавали в специальных ботинках, 
но все равно каждый раз изучали дно, чтобы можно было безопасно поставить ногу.
Анимации нет, но она нам была и не нужна. Мы хотели как раз таки спокойного романтического отпуска лишь для нас двоих.
Вид из окна номера был прекрасный. Море-горы - глазу есть где разгуляться. Шикарные большие балконы в номерах, уборка каждые 3 дня, ну либо по требованию.
Минус: из крана течет соленая вода, кажется морская. Бедные мои волосы, которых после моря я получается снова мыла морской водой, но уже в номере отеля.
Итог: Это лучший отель из всех где я только была в своей жизни! Спасибо!
reviews.title: Лучший отель Египта!

reviews.text:
Kilka wstępnych informacji:
Hotel położony bezpośrednio przy piaszczystej plaży. 
Lokalizacja: 10 min drogi autem od centrum Dahabu, przy drodze prowadzącej do Blue Hole. Dalej za tym hotelem znajdują się hotele Sea Sun oraz Tropitel. 
W skład hotelu wchodzi 8 apartamentowców, każdy z balkonem z widokiem na morze. Hotel jest nowy, wybudowany pod koniec 2010 roku. 
Pokoje czyste, tv LCD, lodówka, klimatyzacja, sejf, telefon.
Toaleta prysznic, suszarka itp. 
Ogólne wrażenia bardzo dobre, obsługa bardzo dba o klientów, choć u niektórych przydała by się lekcja angielskiego. 
Jeśli przyjechałeś na nurkowanie to ten hotel jest strzałem w dziesiątkę, nie jest drogi, ale też bez większych luksusów.
Jest bezpłatny transport do Dahabu (busik), trzeba tylko zapytać w recepcji. 
Warto też porozmawiać z managerem hotelu, fajny facet, wysłucha waszych uwag.
Jedzenie dobre, może mniejszy wybór niż w w innych czterogwiazdkowych hotelach, ale smaczne i świeże (tylko bułki na śniadanie stare).
W odróżnieniu od pobliskiego Sea Sun (nie polecam), nie ma tu smrodu ani odoru w toaletach.
Warto zabrać buty do pływania, gdyż przy plaży jest rafa i można się łatwo w nogi skaleczyć.
Brak wiatrochronów przy leżakach na plaży (mają być doinstalowanie w tym roku)
Wskazówka: Jak dacie kelnerowi większy napiwek to cola/ fanta/woda na kolacje zawsze za darmo :)
W recepcji wifi (płatne, niestety).
reviews.title: Dobry hotel godny polecenia

reviews.text:
Came to Lila Inn and got a great well come and care from the hosts of the place .
There are family who run the camp.
Hisham the father and mustafa the sun are taking care for all you need . Just ask from them .
Azeza the mother cooking are delicious.
And camp is well served .
Will come back again for sure
reviews.title: Great choice

reviews.text: Nice and high quality food and service the place is very good for relaxation the room was nice and clean but you need to get mosquito spray for room . At all this camp is the one of the best places I have ever seen! 💕
reviews.title: Chilling ❤️ And feeling home

reviews.text: Excellent. I‘ve been to multiple camps in and around Nuweiba. What‘s great about Leila Inn is the family environment of the place. Hesham and his family run the place and take great care of their guests. The food is homemade and delicious. Fruit juices and fruits sweeten the day. The sanitary facilities are clean and the water comes hot and with enough pressure. From your hut you will see the sea theough a small window, right next to your bed - lovely. Would always come again. Thanks for the great time
reviews.title: Excellent stay

reviews.text: IT was so AMAZIIING ........,i loved the place so much, really comfy ,clean ,quite and there's activities to do, the food was delicious and the staff very helpful and so friendly it was a great experience and for sure it will not be the last time to visit , thanks for your efforts to make us enjoy our time.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text:
Everything was really nice, starting from the smooth reservation through WhatsApp till the checkout, the beach is really wide n clean, rooms r a bit small but sparkling clean, toilets as well, there is hot water n it is a plus, the staff r really friendly n u really feel home. 
Even it was crowded a bit they kept the cleanliness levels at a good way. 
Thnx for everything, would definitely go it again.
reviews.title: Relaxing Stay

reviews.text:
Very nice place, i think it the best place in the world to who want relaxing and serenity.
The food was great we told me what is specialized them is the food cuz they have a good chef and it’s homemade and really it was NICE ❤️
reviews.title: UNIQUE ❤️💜

reviews.text: This is my second time in laila inn and evertime i leave i feel i want to go back again ❤️ Really guys everything was more than beautiful the hospitality, food ! , cleanliness of the room and the toilets and staff were frinedly always great 😊
reviews.title: So comfort 🤩❤️

reviews.text: I'd like to thank everyone in the laila inn ❤️ i spent a very good and joyful time, the food was very clean and tasty, the room was very clean and smells good, you dont need to bring anything you can bring your shoes see cuz i haven't found my size cool😍
reviews.title: Laila inn is the best ❤️

reviews.text: I always go to sinai scince 10 years ago i found laila inn is the best camp i have ever seen ,very nice views , colorful , clean and tidy .the guys are so nice and polite and the most thing i love is the food thank you laila inn 🥰
reviews.title: Laila inn is the best,❤

reviews.text:
One of the best places ever  , comfy, claen and very calm , sea view is amazing, i loved the food it was very delicious and the staff very friendly and polite
I enjoyed my staying there ❤thanks to everyone
reviews.title: Amazing Place ❤️

location.address: Taba Nuwibaa Road Ras Shitan, Dahab 46618 Egypt

reviews.text:
This Hotel is not worth one night. The rooms and furniture is old. We had ants and coackroches in the room. The flush from the toilet didn’t work. In the cupboard we had the leftovers from others guests- really disgusting! The cleaning is unprofessional, everywhere hairs and dirt. 
With strong winds- usually in Dahab- the windows make sounds so it’s impossible to sleep. 
The breakfast is cheap with 50LE, but no cooling and everything under plastic. Coffee and tea in plastic cups. 
If you want to have a good time in Dahab don’t stay in this Hotel.
reviews.title: Not again

reviews.text: The rooms are basic,  but comfortable and the staff will do their utmost to help you or provide what you need.  My toilet wouldn't flush, but a guy was sent to fix it within quarter of an hour. I had no remote for the AC but didn't really need one , so I never mentioned it. My friend felt that his room was too small, so they upgraded him almost immediately. Breakfast was good (but SLOW service) The private beach is great! Right on the water and a fantastic place to watch the sunrise over Saudi Arabia and the Gulf. It's just a few minutes walk to the main 'Dahab front', so it's both easily accessible but quiet at night. The restaurant opens and closes too early for evening meal, but you can walk down to the private  beach and bar afterwards. The pool is great for relaxingat.
reviews.title: Mostly great!

reviews.text:
You will not find there different type of services but pool is available and very close to the beach.. 
Poor breakfast but enough, lunch is not the best thing but at least you can have average food for lunch and dinner
reviews.title: Not a luxury hotel but good

reviews.text:
Nice hotel friendly  staff do not understand English  very close to center dahab when we complained it took more than 24 hours to fix the toilet .
Also took long time to change  towels in the room .
 Thank you
reviews.title: Stay at dahab hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is poor rooms and poor breakfast location is good and staff is not professional. I'm not happy for this stay especially in Dahab and the value of stay is very expensive. at all bad experience in this stay
reviews.title: Poor Stay

reviews.text: I have enjoyed to stay in this hotel for a night the location is super good, my room was facing amazing view, will back again in the future in addition I would like to thankful the staff especially Amira she was really friendly and nice .
reviews.title: Great service and nice location

reviews.text: Nicely located at the end of elmasbat area, where you have easy access to all shops, restaurants, diving activity centres and tour shops. The hotel offers bed and breakfast for a reasonable price. It is clean and friendly. The breakfast is basic, however every day there must be a new item or two, hence offering some variety. Sheets are clean and fresh towels are brought in every day. If you are looking for a base in Dahab to return to after a long day diving, snorkling or simply swimming in any of Dahab’s magical beaches, Dahab Hotel is an acceptable choice where the personnel are ready to provide help and sincere service
reviews.title: Family run friendly hotel

reviews.text: the location is super good coz it is in the middle of dahab yet very quiet and distant enough from the crowd, the beach is rocky but the settings is amazing to spend hours and hours just enjoying the nice breeze away from the crowd , the place is very clean and tiddy ,landscaping is simple and neat , needs proffesional hotel managment  but Mr.Alaa kamal there is very helpful and friendly , Mr.Haitham from the reservation was helpful as well , the breakfast is less than basic so it need much more varities but chef Gamal was doing his best to provide everything we needed . the rooms are basic but enough for the stay at dahab , they got AC and the rooms got such amazing view of the sea and the pool . they need new linens and towels . the place is safe and got special spirit of serenity . highly recommended .
reviews.title: amazing location and view

reviews.text: The beach is awesome and it's sand beach which is rare to find in Dahab as it's mostly rocky. The hotel itself is beautiful however not well maintained. The breakfast was poor in my opinion and needs to be upgraded in terms of quality. There were no night activities during my stay of 4 nights. For someone who is going just to enjoy the serenity of the area it's ideal.
reviews.title: Dahab

reviews.text:
The hotel is in a very quiet and chilling out location at z light house, the place got unique design as all z rooms can c the sea and the pool, also u can view z sea while chilling out on z pool, it's a safe place to stay.
The rooms are clean althu they have limited crew but the furniture is not good , breakfast is not good as it's very very limited, it happened tht they got a serious of plumbing where whenever u open the tab u feel as if electric shock through water tht u even can't touch the metal tap again, i informed the receptionist who changed me the room instantly but surprisingly i faced z same problem in another 2 rooms, hopefully they worked on fixing this serious problem coz "electric shock" while showring is not the best experience so i had to leave the hotel z next day as they seemed and acted like they are unaware about z seriousness of this problem ! I  wish they hire good management team to run z hotel coz it's really a beautiful one
reviews.title: Amazing hotel but needs some good management and maintenance

location.address: El Maleel St, Lighthouse Rd, Dahab 45214 Egypt

reviews.text: The stuff was so friendly with us and the food was amazing also the rooms excellent with good condition I really enjoyed in Carmine hotel and I’m sure I’ll come back again next time and wanna thanks Mr amir Safwat for that❤️❤️
reviews.title: Was amazing experience I recommended anyone to come here

reviews.text: Perfect place to stay if you want to relax and have a comfortable sleep. I stayed in a dorm and the beds have everything you need, a good mattress and pillow, personal light, charging port, privacy curtain, and ensuite bathroom. The bunks are built in so they dont squeak or move and the upper bunks have stairs to get to them! Amazing! All the staff and super friendly and ready to help with anything. Especially Amir who always made sure to say 'hello' whenever he was around and made me feel so welcome I ended up extending an extra night. I would definitely stay again :)
reviews.title: Home away from home :)

reviews.text: Happy staff- professional management- ask for Mr Amir and Mr Shenouda. Very clean Hotel. Great Atmosphere- a lot of returning customers. Pool and breakfast . Price is decent and Very reasonable. Very nice Mountain View.
reviews.title: Guest

reviews.text: The staff was amazing  and friendly specially mr amir my booking was room only and he made for me complementary break fast the room very clean housekeeping is very helpfully and kind   I will definitely come back again love all the staff
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

reviews.text: I stayed five nights at the Carmine hotel. Amir and his brother are extremely professional and honest people running this hotel. They helped book day trips and offered a great price for the airport pickup. The staff was very friendly and were always able to help with any things I needed. The location is great, few minutes walk from the main promenade with many shops and restaurants.
reviews.title: 5 Night stay

reviews.text: I stayed in the dorms which had bed curtains and a hot shower and your own personal electric socket and light and locker. The hostel hotel was built motel style with the rooms opening onto a guitar shaped pool which was peaceful but also great and spiritual for sitting around 24;hours. Cafe beside the pool which served food day and night. Lovely staff at your service 24 hours. Wifi worked better for the last part of my stay everywhere in the property
reviews.title: Perfect charming central charismatic hotel for a really reasonable price

reviews.text: The hotel is AMAZING! The service is WONDERFUL! The staff is super friendly! The rooms are well maintained and I enjoyed my stay to the fullest! I most definitely recommend this hotel! Thank you Shenouda and Amir for making my stay memorable.
reviews.title: Tina

reviews.text: I stayed here for 10 nights. The owner  Shenouda and Amil are super kind and helpful. The hotel area is quite big and have so much public area that can chill. Also, there’s a swimming pool which is always clean. The staffs are also friendly and hard working. I felt like home when I stayed there. We become family. One of the best choice to stay in Dahab.
reviews.title: Home stay in Dahab

reviews.text: I enjoyed my stay at the hotel. Wonderful service and the breakfast is beyond tasty. My room was well maintained and I found pleasure in all my needs during my stay! Upon your arrival ask for Mr. Amir and Mr. Shenouda for the best service and advise on what you can do while in Dahab.
reviews.title: Beautiful ve

It was a very beautiful days in carmine hotel 🏨 😍
We love this hotel so much 😍  it was different than any hotel  🏨  and the breakfast was perfect 👌 and special thanks for mr.shanouda and mr.amir so much ❤  definitely we will return to this perfect hotel 👌

name: Happy Life Village
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: A wonderful hotel, especially if you want to go diving. I could nit-pick about a few things but on the whole I was really happy here for two weeks. It's not 5 star so manage your expectations but it's a great hotel. The staff make it really special and will go out of their way to help you. Some niggles I had with the room were sorted out very quickly, simply the remote controls not working. The bathroom could have done with a face lift and the showerhead wasn't great, but it was usable and I got used to it after a couple of days. I fully intend to return there as soon as possible.
reviews.title: Definitely a happy life there

reviews.text:
Very friendly staff, special mention Alfi from restaurant crew. 
Food is of great quality, besides house wine which is medium to lower quality. 
House reef is impressive. Take care to it! 
Lagoon diver station is very recommended.
Garden is nice in midst of desert.
Rooms are clean, furniture is outdated and needs upgraded.
Off season is best if looking for calm and lots of space on beach.
reviews.title: Best off season place with great Diving spots in front of door almost

reviews.text:
Scammers..... I would not even have bothered to write this review if it was not for money being stolen from me by the hotel!

so now that i write the review anyway, let`start:

1) cockroaches in the room, no wonder as other people`s dirty plates with food were left standing in front of the rooms for (!) days

2) on our arrival an awful (making me almost vomit) smell, coming from a toilet and bathroom floor; bathroom dirty and  not being cleand; once i took the showerhead an cleaned the toilet with water for 10 minutes( is it my job as a paying client?) it got a bit better; also  i gave the cleaning staff several  (!) times a tip makes it even worse

3) staff from the wellness center bothering clients in a very aggressive way an selling massages for 100 euros ....

4) food no comment

5) arrogant staff in the reception

and last but not least:

6) over 170 euros were debited from my Visa by the hotel, visible on my visa bank statement (i send the hotel a picture of my statement showing the name happy village hotel)
After requesting the bill number, the hotel claimed the amount was not visible in their accounting!! but my money was gone! 

We arrived having paid the hotel and all inklusive in advance, and didn`t buy or consumme anything outside this package. 
One guy in the reception named Saad asked my credit car on our arrival for no reason, as everything was paid. We arrived tired in the night, wanting to go to our room, but this guy insisted i give him my Credit card.

After travelling for decades, never has this happend to me.
People making their living thanks to the tourists and  treating them that way says it all.

Only pleasant thing about the place is the stunning view, better look at it from another place in Dahab.....
reviews.title: Scammers, cockroaches and dirt

owner_response.text:
Dear guest

Thank you for your comment on TripAdvisor, kindly find hereunder the clarification for the said complaint
                            

Let me clarify the situation. Like we have been sending by email address.
After we received your comment by email, we checked with all outlets to check the amount 
We contacted Lagona diving and they said no money was received 
We contacted the reception desk and there is no money received. Upon check,  the reception asked for the hotel voucher not for a visa, upon check-in you do not have the hotel voucher. The reception desk asked for the hotel voucher, not your visa card. 
We contacted our bank account and the amount was not received.
  The receipt that we received is not from our bank and is not clear without any details.
 Kindly find the hotel's answer.
One- After the third time check with our accounting and refer back to our bank account but the attached amount does not appear on our account. 
2- Your booking coming through a travel agent not direct with the hotel, so how can we deduct the amount from your credit card without your approval?
3- After revising your room there are no extras or any payments to ask you to deduct any amount from your credit card, so there is no reason to ask you to give us your credit card and deduct any amount.
4- If we assume that there is a person who requested any account for the room, there must be approval from your side and give him the credit card and the password for him to take the amount, it means nobody can deduct any amount if you didn't gave him the credit card of your own free will and written your password to deduct the amount. 
5- After deducting any amount there must be 2 copies of receipts one for your good side and the other one for the hotel with your signature but we didn't find any receipt for your credit card in the attached, kindly advise us if you have any receipt from our side.
6- Finally, who is the person who deducted the amount? So that we can check with him if he is a member of the reception, a Laguna employee, or a health club employee.
According the cleaning kindly, find our replay 
- We checked with reception and he said he sends the best control service and on the next day
 The desk try to contact you to change the room and informed the housekeeping to clean the room

The Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

I felt like I am the part of a big, loving family. All the people are so friendly and nice! The animation team is the best I have ever met!

reviews.text:
My family and I spent our vacation at Happy life village, the place is awesome with best location by the sea and near the mountain. The room was clean, thanks for the housekeeping staff who were cooperative. All the staff was friendly and helpful. 
The food was delicious. The animation team did amazing job either at show time at 9 pm daily or during the day time activities by the beach. A big thank you for Ksenia who   led the epic yoga classes by the sea as well as stretching and dancing activities. Thanks for her, as well as Fox, Mustafa, and Olga for their entertainment activities. I also want to mention Amir the guy at the beach, and the nice hardworking gentleman who was at the beginning of the beach aisle.

Thank you guys for making our stay memoriable.

reviews.text: This hotel is so nice. I'm enjoying my holidays here. Entertainment is so good. I love this hotel so much. The people are so friendly, positive. I love the beach view and I did diving here. Also I enjoyed games like volleyball, darts. Stretching with Kseniia was really the best 👍💯

reviews.text: We spent our amazing holiday here. All staff were working hard to keep us smiling and satisfied. Entertainment team from the hotel is so professional and energetic. We took part Ksenia's daily yoga  and streching classes were simply gave the sparkle for the days. Thanks Ksenia again. This vaccation was unforgettable for us as a first time holiday makers in Egypt. We will recommend this hotel everyone.
reviews.title: Best vaccation in Dahab

reviews.text: It was the first time in Happy life village. There are nice clean area, good different food every day, beautiful coral reef, cool shows from the entertainment team. Good place for kids too.. I enjoyed and relaxed very well in this place!
reviews.title: Very good rest

reviews.text:
Unbelievable this is my first review of Happy Life after coming here on holiday for many years going back to 2009, and returning numerous times, well into double figures.
This is an extra special little gem of a place I found many years ago, which will always draw me back. Happy life is very peaceful, chilled out and laid back place. 
It is set in a stunning location in South Dahab with gorgeous views of red mountains behind. The house reef is also great for snorkeling, teaming with colourful corals and marine life. 
The rooms are a generous size, comfortable and have all you need.
The food is of a really good standard. Having been to various hotels in Sharm el Sheikh with a higher star rating than Happy Life, I've still found Happy Life's food to be of better quality, standard and choice than other hotels I've experienced in Egypt.
Having visited this hotel so often I've seen staff come and go through the years, but there are a core who have remained. 

Number 1... Mohammed  ( manager of the restaurant) who many returning tourist mention time and again, and hold in high regard for being exceptionally helpful, very efficient, very friendly and kind and has time for everyone, staff and guests. He keeps the restaurant running like clock work, regarding staff, appreance of the restaurant and good quality of food. 

Mina and Samir are also staff who have been there for years, who will greet you on arrival and take your luggage to your room, 2 exceptionally pleasant guys that I'm always happy to see on my returning visits. 

Years gone by the WiFi used to be very intermittent, which was frustrating, but it has improved so much recently. Now able to get wifi most of the time at the reception area for free. This is always important to guests. 

Quads bike trips are on offer at the hotel for a good price, Samy will ensure you have a memorable time on your quad bike offering a few different special locations.

Gamal an older security guy doesn't speak a word of English, works hard at doing a great job of ensuring the safety of tourists on the beach. I've know him since day dot, I have a massive soft spot and big respect for him. 

The hotel put on a free shuttle bus service to and from Dahab which allows time to enjoy shops, bars and cafes if tourists a change of scene. 

My time is spent chilling on the beach, soaking up the gorgeous scenery and enjoying the peace and quiet, while dipping in and out the sea for a snorkel now and again. There is something special about this place that will always pull me back and many other returning guests. I recommend this hotel hugely for location, outstanding friendly, helpful staff, good quality food and a total chill out.

Thanks also to Mr Mohab one of the mangers, who I've know for years who keeps the place running well and is always friendly to me. Look forward to being here again very shorty. 

Thanks everyone at Happy life for always making my holidays here amazing👊🏽🌞⭐️🌠🌚🐠🐡🐟🌅
reviews.title: 2nd home and first class hotel

reviews.text: We stayed at this wonderful hotel.  Everything is great here.  We liked this place - calm, wonderful, with a beautiful view of the mountains and the sea.  The reef is just class.  We also went to evening shows - Mister Hotel, Miss Hotel, fire show 🔥🔥🔥🔥, karaoke.  Entertainment is so good.  Fox did great job 💯💯💯💯He is amazing show man.  I did Stretching with Kseniia.  Salsa 💓with Kseniia.  She is great.  Also the food is so tasty.  thank you so much.  We will back again.
reviews.title: Ksenia

reviews.text: I went to Dahab with my wife in December 2022 .we spent our vacation in Lidia hotel ,they were so good ,we find the place peds friendly as we are cats lovers .we had a great time sitting around the fire in the restaurant by the beach front .the service was good and  the place was very clean compare with other places we stay in Dahab in our previous trips.
reviews.title: PEDS FRIENDLY PLACE

reviews.text: It is a good otel o the beach. The front of the hotel is in a street with good shops and cheap restaurants. the room was clean, a comforable bed and free wifi. Breakfast was included and was ok. The coffee was cheap nescafe but they also have nice coffee but you have to ask for it.
reviews.title: good hotel on the beach

reviews.text: Nice hotel with swimming pool and verz nice beach restaurant. Private bathrooms, free wifi and travel agency next door. very helpful and friendly staff. Dahab is amazing and i will definatelz come back
reviews.title: Good hotel, very good location

reviews.text:
This hotel is directly on the boulevard in el Mamsha,  The back of the hotel is at the sea, the front in the busiest shopping street of Dahab. 
Absolutely great location. beachresto was my favorite place. Good to have the street restaurant options at the front of the hotel
reviews.title: Budgetfriendly hotel with swimming pool best location

reviews.text: The hotel is ok. it is nice to just walk out of zour room straight into the swimmingpool, specially when it is so hot. The staff is verz friendly, but the biggest plus from this hotel is the beachfront restaurant. It is not busy, and the views are amazing.
reviews.title: Nice hotel with swimmingpool and private beachrestaurant

reviews.text:
After staying in the Desert I really was in need of a good hotel with good beds and a shower. King Safari Tours recommended this hotel and I am very happy they did! 

Thank you all for a fantastic stay and for helping me with my dietary problems. Special thanks to Mahmood of the housekeeping> He is the guy to talk to if you need any advice of where to go to for shopping!
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel with swimmingpool

room is nice and clean

nice breakfast

reviews.text:
I didnt book upfront and was lucky that they had a room for me! Reservation is recommended as 2 days later the hotel was fully booked. 

Good hotel with clean rooms, helpful staff and an excellent location, close to shops and restaurants in the heart of town.  Very good value for money!

reviews.text:
We booked a room with a double bed. The room was clean and the staff very friendly. They helped us with finding a good dive center and a tour operator to visit St Catherine Monastery and quad biking.

The hotel is only a couple of minutes from the boulevard and a lively area with lots of restaurants and local shops.

reviews.text:
الصور خادعة جداً ده منظر على الفاضي. للأسف نزلت في أماكن أحسن منه بكتير وأرخص.. غرف مستواها متدني، ريحة مجاري في الحمامات والغرف، الغرف مش بتتنضف بعد الcheckout. نمل في كل مكان في الغرفة..الدش مكسور.. كل الأدوات الصحية مصدية.. فوط وملايات مش نضيفة خالص.. بيسين مش دايماً بيتحطله كلور... مياه كل شوية قاطعة. . حاجة للأسف في منتهى السوء
Pics are deceitful.. Rooms are totally unclean, bedsheets and towels are disgusting.. Very bad smell coming from toilets and spread in the rooms.. Water is on and off.. Rooms are filled with ants.. Swimming pool not regularly cleaned.. Sanitary wares are broken
reviews.title: Not recommended at all

name: Sheikh Ali Dahab Resort
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: This resort is fantastic and trustworthy for connection to the desert locations, since the owner Gabaly is bedouin himself. That is the primary reason we stayed here. The staff's goal is to make you feel at home, and they definitely did that. We stayed for 6 nights, and they can book for  the surrounding bedouin camps to see Serabit el-Khadim, St. Catherine's monastery etc. Their daughter Neama can book for you, and they will look after the drivers as well. They arranged a driver service return from and to the border at Taba (or from Cairo too I can imagine). General manager Karim looked after many details. I recommend you work through them, since there are so many checkpoints along the way. The kitchen staff love to serve, are prompt, and the food menu has delicious options. The rooms are very large, and we took the option of king size bed. It's very clean. The staff are industrious and take pride in their hospitality too! Several Family members took the time to meet us personally. I can't say there was anything negative to report. You will love to stay at this resort! I can recommend it 10/10!
reviews.title: Bedouin Owed and with Sumptuous Hospitality

reviews.text: This is an excellent hotel, owned and run by the local bedouin sheikh and his family members. It has its own organic farm to supply its vegetables. They can arrange visits. The rooms are suites rather than rooms . Ours had a vast double bed
reviews.title: Excellent hotel with own organic farm

reviews.text:
It was an exceptional experience with cozy nature touch. The hotel is located in a quiet area, with back access direct to the touristic promenade.
The room is spacious, super clean with well functioning A/C. 
The hotel staff are beyond helpful and welcoming. 
Special thanks to Mr. Karim Ganzouri and Mr. Sherif, who were more than helful regarding exploring Dahab, facilitating transportation our visits' spots.
Will definetly come back.
reviews.title: Excellent experience

reviews.text: I landed at Sheikh Ali after solo traveling around Egypt for three weeks and was greeted by the kindest staff. I immediately was treated like this was my home. Whenever I asked for anything, the response was always "anything is possible!"  Most of the time they knew what I needed before I even did! The owner, Gabaly Ali, cares about the environment, the people, the animals, everything....and it shows. I "thought" I wanted to do a juice cleanse for a week, but the organic veggies from his farm and the vegetarian Egyptian food was too good to pass up! Seriously, this place is the real deal in comfort and excellent care. I will be back for sure!
reviews.title: Amazing Place and People!
