reviews.text:
I stayed here for almost 2 weeks and it was everything I hoped and dreamed for! The rooms are outstanding, the service impeccable, the food delicious. The accommodation inside and outside was constantly kept clean (a true challenge with all the dust and sand flying about), and there is always someone helpful around when needed. Location is close to the hustle and bustle but secluded enough to be very peaceful and quiet. The place is run in a very relaxed and super friendly manner. Karim, Sharif, Khaled and Hamed, thank you so much for making my stay a wonderful and memorable one. I hope to be back again later this year!
Best wishes,
Deborah (Debby)
reviews.title: Super stay!

reviews.text: We are two adults who very much enjoyed our stay at Sheikh Ali.  Everyone was super friendly and we really enjoyed the breakfasts!  We selected the Egyptian breakfast each day.  The rooms were extremely comfortable and the entire place is very serene.  It's just adjacent to the main drag of Dahab but not on it which I was happy about because it was nice and quiet at night.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay at Sheikh Ali Dahab

reviews.text: We're a family of 4 adults who stayed at Sheikh Ali resort for 6 nights, end Jan to 6th Feb 2022.  The rooms are brilliant, the pool and surrounding area are fantastic, there's a fire pit, Bedouin tent, massage centre and dive centre all on site.  The location is fantastic, the hotel is really quiet however via the back gate it's a 60 second walk to the main street in Dahab, to the start of the market area.  The staff are amazing, they sorted out personalised trips for us with great guides and were always on hand to help.  A special shout out to Sharif who was so so great.  The dive centre is run by really professional Germans who organised a bespoke dive for the 2 younger individuals in our party.  Oh - and the breakfasts, especially the french toast is  to die for.  It's amazingly good value.
reviews.title: Perfect Hotel, Perfect Location

reviews.text:
Lovely recent stay, it really is like staying with family. Lots of little touches that show this hotel really cares about people and our environment.

Thank you to Sherif and all the other staff for looking after us. Also have to mention the fantastic chef who makes the best foul and falafel in Egypt! 

Good wishes to you all and lots of love for Charlie and the little puppy 🙏🏼
reviews.title: Outstanding staff and lovely hotel

reviews.text:
The rooms are really nice, pool is clean and it’s super close to the main boardwalk area. The only issue I have is the front desk seems clueless. I booked a massage but they didn’t ask my name or room number. They needed to cancel the massage bc the masseuse’s son was sick, but couldn’t figure out how to reach me. When I showed up, they didn’t apologize or make an attempt to book another masseuse. I asked for a time the next day and For some unknown reason, they then booked me at 7am the next morning without asking me. 
When I expressed concerns that her son may have Covid, they said it was impossible because there’s no Covid in Egypt and even asked me if I actually knew anyone that had gotten it (and why yes, my dad with stage 4 cancer did in fact have Covid at that time). It felt aggressive and at very least unprofessional. 
When I came back to book for a third time, a different front desk person asked if I was still mad, and when I said it was disappointing and unprofessional, easily avoidable, she said that I should be happy and she lives her life happy, which was an odd, passive aggressive (?) response. 
I wish I could say it was all worth it but after all that,  the massage was just OK. She used her elbows a lot but was not particularly mindful about speed and location of the pressure.
reviews.title: Awful customer service

location.address: Mashraba Palm Tree Garden, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text: Where to start....we had planned this trip for a long while (canceled cause of covid and got a full refund at the time). We kinda took a chance cause it seemed good. It was awesome. Location-wise, it is perfectly located a short walk from real Dahab and a short walk to the tourist center. The staff of the restaurant and accommodation were super friendly and helpful. The dive gear was perfect. The dive instructor and itinerary was perfect. Everything from being picked up and driven back to the airport worked like clockwork. Our free-lance dive guide, Youstina Youssef, was totally flexible, patient, professional and calm and collected. Halil and Lynne (owners) were super friendly and genuine. Wifi is limited in all of Dahab and so I recommend you buy a data sim at the airport. I think what I liked most about it is that it's unpretentious but totally comfortable and very well run. In the end it cost us less than we were quoted because we ended up doing a few less dives than we had booked (cause we needed to rest). And I was given the opportunity to settle my account when I received the final invoice after we had left. So.... fully and highly recommended and shukrhan for a memory to keep forever
reviews.title: Diving holiday

reviews.text: Egypt is a wonderful experience but can be (reserved Brit speaking!) a bit full on. Dive Urge, led by Ahmed, could not do enough to make our stay and experience more relaxed and wonderful. Set at the edge of Lighthouse area (think slightly hippie yoga vibe) it’s charming. Just awesome staff which completely made the trip. Thank you. 💚
reviews.title: Oasis in Egypt

reviews.text:
Dive urge 
Dahab is such a great place to explore the Red Sea. It’s very chilled and friendly and hotels don’t come more friendly than Dive Urge. The staff are so welcoming and just can’t do enough to make your stay as comfortable as possible. My husband is coeliac so dining is a bit of an issue here but the chef made special food for him every day. Including gluten free donuts on his birthday!
The place has a very relaxed feel. It’s not a smart hotel, more like a guest house where you can kick off your shoes and walk around in your swimmies. Breakfast is on the beach with the waves lapping gently close by and a view of the beautiful sea and mountains. 
Beds are really comfortable and there is a fridge and water dispenser in your room. 
Everyone is welcome here-the last time we visited was with very young kids, now they are teenagers and there was lots to keep them happy. The house reef is a stunning snorkel. 
Now to the diving… the reefs are full of coral and fish. So many fish!  There are a load of dives sites, mostly shore dives, and they drive you to these up and down the coast. Some are really close by and others you might go to and stay out for the day, having lunch in one of the lovely local restaurants. Eating out here is very reasonable in price and delicious. There are safe places to leave all your kit and valuables and many sites have a shower as well as a toilet. 
You set the pace. If you want to fit in lots of diving then you can. Or you can just do one or two each day… totally as you wish!
Our dive guide was exceptional. She was ultra clear in her dive plans and explanations when training and guiding. Thorough and attentive, she helped the children and me with every dive. She gently encouraged my daughter to try some training dives and now she is an Advanced Open Water diver which was a real bonus!  There are snorkelling options for non-divers and the reefs are covered in life. We saw a turtle and octopus on the reef right in the middle of Dahab! You will not be disappointed!

The food at Dive Urge is great-Egyptian breakfast is a dinner winner with freshly made falafels, cheese and flat bread. The pancakes are also really special and come in beautifully shaped patterns-different every day!  Everything that comes out of the kitchen is delicious and beautifully presented. And all served with a big smile from the wonderful Attwah who will go to the ends of the earth to make your stay the best ever!
We hope to be back again very soon!
reviews.title: Small and very friendly Hotel right on the beach. Wonderful diving and snorkelling right in your doorstep.  Perfect!

reviews.text:
Our stay at Dive Urge was incredible. We enjoyed a relaxing 6 days there, with 5 days of diving. The rooms are very comfortable, very clean, and quiet with excellent a/c and also screens on the windows and doors to catch the breeze. The garden was a terrific place to relax in after diving. Dive Urge has a small sandy beach right on a reef which offers excellent snorkeling.  Ahmed is the perfect host and super accommodating. 

The dive center is highly professional. The equipment is top notch, and we felt very safe and in great hands with our dive master, Shereen. Hamid and Ben  could not have been more helpful or professional.  

If you are looking for a place to escape everyday life with some fantastic scenery and scuba diving, go to Dahab and stay at Dive Urge!
reviews.title: Breathtaking scenery, excellent scuba diving

reviews.text:
I returned for another stay with Dive Urge. The service was top notch. The dive DM was super along with Ben ( in training). He helped get my wieghts sorted out. Everyone from the Owners to the cleaners always had a smile and willing to lend a hand.
I decided before I arrived that this would be my last dive trip due to health iusses so I wanted to spend it with Friends. Y'all made the trip perfect.. Thanks for your care.
As always you were safe and efiencent.
If I make it back to Egypt I will return to just set on the beach and eat egg wraps. or sleep witha cat.
reviews.title: Still wonderful

photos.caption: Santa Michael catching some rays at Dive Urge. It was a hard season and he needed to unwind.

reviews.text:
My first check in was 6 days before right now I’m here again . I asked them to keep my bag 💼 I love my cozy room looking to the nice garden , I love their way of treating me .owner ,worker mangers, I love their laughter time in beach area , I love to hold my keys all the door almost like my home ,,,right now Covid time so it’s really calm and quite that’s what I want but I don’t know how it’s in normal time .I love their breakfast and coffee . And my friend who do snorkeling with me nice stay !!! 
Only I have comment on the room door have a space with floor and will a way for letting 🪰 come inside room they should fix it 
Otherwise everything perfect
reviews.title: Homey

reviews.text: I travelled Solo. Right from the beginning when I was lost with the taxi driver from sharm, Ahmed the manager guided us and also paid for my trip - saying we will settle it later. I had a few changes in my schedule and all were accommodated extremely professionally.  The place in itself is a 5 minute walk from the hustle and bustle of the town. The rooms were very clean and the connecting beach is just perfect with it's sunbeds and view. They even arranged a taxi for me to get around, recommended a good kitesurfing instructor as well as arrange a private snorkelling tour for me at lighthouse beach at very short notice since I couldnt dive as I was flying the same day. No complaints - plus point is the service and cleanliness of the place. Will definitely return.
reviews.title: Great little gem of a place

reviews.text:
The place is located in a quiet area, off the crowds, but still walking distance to restaurants etc. The rooms were clean, had a nice soft light in them, and had all the basics needed.
The staff was very forthcoming, always quick to help
Finally beach access was great, not rocky, nor any corals, hence easy to swim right out. Would definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Cozy, family-friendly place

reviews.text: Had a lovely stay at Dive Urge, very clean, quiet end of town with easy access to the beach and eel garden. The restaurant was only just starting to be opened up after Covid-19 restrictions but there were plenty of other options. Dive equipment was well maintained and I had an excellent guide for my 12 dives to take me up to 100 dives. Will I go back, certainly!
reviews.title: Dhahab Dive trip

reviews.text: I spent 2 wonderful weeks at Dive Urge.  My visit was dominated by work as I had tons to do but it was fantastic working from any of the wonderful quiet spots at Dive Urge whether the garden,  restaurant, chill out area by beach or even on the beach! as the WiFi connection is excellent everywhere.  The best thing about Dive Urge is the family vibe. Lynn is a Brit and married to Muhammad an Egyptian and they have 3 beautiful children, Nadia, Hebba and Samur who are all 100% bilingual and very friendly and great sources for local info. Ahmed the Manager is a very sweet man and Nassimi who runs the restaurant is a gem. The room was really nicely furnished,  the fridge in it was much appreciated as were the tea and coffee making facilities.  I dived a few times with their Dive Instructor Ahmed who was very kind and I did my refresher with him and then did a few regular dives with him. Diving at Dive Urge is not cheap, but seeing as I went out alone with Ahmed I wasn't complaining. Dahab Divers is much cheaper at less than half the cost,  but then they have bigger groups of people too. I had breakfast included in my deal and it is to be recommended as you can choose what types of breakfast you want. I stayed over Xmas and we had a wonderful xmas dinner with all the staff and family.  My two weeks flew by and I was sad to leave everyone.  Would definitely recommend a stay here!!
reviews.title: THE place to stay in Dahab!

reviews.text: Elite Residence is a beautiful and comfortable villa with excellent service provided by staff Adnan, Mahmoud, and Mazen. The staff went above and beyond to ensure our stay was comfortable and memorable. The villa itself is spacious and luxurious, making it the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life. Overall, a highly recommended stay
reviews.title: Amazing and beautiful place

reviews.text: Perfect service, Nice accomadation and neat beds and rooms. I highly recommend staying there If you need a quiet friendly environment. Also, it is close to the downtown and Dahab restaurants and cafes. You can also enjoy your view at the roof❤️
reviews.title: Elite residence review

reviews.text:
We have been coming back to Dahab for 14 years and already know a few accommodations here. I particularly like this one. The hotel is located in the so-called "villa district", the construction of which was started only about 10 -12 years ago. The hotel is only a few years old and therefore still quite intact and beautiful. Laminate flooring, beautifully tiled bathroom, simple but tasteful furnishings. Thanks to soundproof windows and insulated walls, you can't hear the loud noise of the mosques in the morning or the very loud air conditioning in the courtyard. If you close the bedroom door at night, even the loud fridge is not disturbing. I slept like a log. The spring mattresses are very thick and new, maybe a little bit hard, but that is a matter of taste. The hotel manager Mahmud and his concierge Ibrahim are friendly and accommodating, but that goes without saying in Dahab. The location may seem a bit remote, but you can be on the beach promenade in 15 minutes and in Azahlah, the old town centre, in 7 minutes without much hurry.
What I liked best: Here were no groups of men from Cairo partying noisily all night like in cheaper hotels.

Not the hotel's fault, but a sincere warning: The way from the hotel to Lighthouse leads through streets whose pavements can become gravements. Everywhere there are up to 30 cm deep holes or manhole covers with handles sticking out 10 cm. In addition, these streets are very poorly lit. I tripped over such a handle in the dark and fell lengthways onto my knees, hands and face. Better you walk in the middle of the streets. They are better lit and the drivers all drive very carefully because children use to play there until late at night.
reviews.title: Great!

reviews.text: Great location, a 10 min walk to the market. Very friendly staff. Had a great time staying at elite residence. We had a great New Year's Eve gathering on the roof. I would totally recommend it to other people. Definitely won't be last time there.
reviews.title: Elite Residence

reviews.text:
Top service! Veilig in Dahab! Hele agenda gemaakt voor ons 4 dagen hier. De eigenaar, is na ons bezoek een vriend geworden. Dat is iets wat ik belangrijk vind. A big 10!!

Ook zijn taxi driver heeft ons echt vermaakt en was super gezellig en aanwezig, waar het nodig was!

name: Shams Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: the best thing about this place is the staff. we got the best treatment in the reception, the hotel cafe, and the cleaning staff. everyone was lovely and did their best for us. rooms were very clean, we had a fantastic ocean view just like in the picture. breakfast and other meals in the cafe were great. I ordered a taxi from the border through the hotel because it felt safer and it was excellent both ways. behind the hotel, there is a street you can eat and buy everything you need but the hotel is still quiet. to enter the water in a comfortable spot we needed to walk about 7 minutes toward the lighthouse.
reviews.title: amazing time at shams hotel

reviews.text: Shams is a great place to be in Dahab. It is 5 minute walk from “center” located beachfront on a beautiful reef of Dahab where you can see many fish. Nice breakfast is included in the Shams restaurant on the beach. The room was practical, with aircon and very clean. The staff was exceptionally friendly and very helpful to all our needs. Will surely come back!
reviews.title: Home in Dahab

reviews.text: Am a SSI/PADI DiveMaster and just spent 10 days at Shams. Dahab offers great dive sites, all accessible directly from the beach, which saves you a lot of boating time and inconvenience. On top it is a very nice -not too large and not to small- Arab town, with plenty choices of restaurants, bars, Bedouin type hang out places and cafes/bars and options to experience the Sinai dessert. Mozes picked up the 10 commands from mount Sinai which is a 1,5 hour trip and of course a magical place. If you go to Dahab, which I can highly recommend from many years and still expanding own experience, Shams is certainly a place to be. Well located, fair prices and in effect a well above average price/quality balance. It has a dive center as well, where the highest standards for divers and people who want to learn/experience diving are met. Daily dives are scheduled as well, with always a guide/instructor coming along. Last but not least, the Shams staff are really nice and pleasant people, without any exception. The only reason I give 5 stars is because there are not more ! Many thanks for having me again 10 days, keep on going Shams/everybody and I will be back for sure !! Albert Gillhaus | Boxtel | Netherlands
reviews.title: A great experience | favorite place in Dayan-Egypte

reviews.text:
Our group of seven family members settled into the Shams hotel in Dahab for several days of relaxation and diving.  We had a fabulous time.  The hotel is located at tone end of the main shopping/eating street, so it’s relatively quiet.  The rooms here are simple, comfortable and very clean.  There is plenty of hot water, and the beds are made up and clean towels provided every day.  The staff is amazing - Ashraf and his team are very warm and friendly and very attentive.  The restaurant is beautiful -situated right over the Gulf of Aquaba with a long bank of windows to enjoy the gorgeous view.  Food was great!  We enjoyed delicious and plentiful breakfasts each morning, with lots of choice (Egyptian breakfast/eggs/pancakes/fruit and yogurt….).  
The very friendly and relaxed dive master, Mohammed , runs the well equipped  dive shop.  We did multiple dives with him over several days.  He and his staff are well organized and very safety conscious..  I did notice that some of the dive equipment we rented was a little worn.  That said, our dive experience was excellent.  I especially recommend a dive at the “house reef” - you walk into the sea essentially from the restaurant.. it’s a beautiful dive!
reviews.title: An excellent six day stay at the Shams Hotel and Dive Centre

photos.caption: The staff clean and make up the rooms every day
diving the blue hole with the excellent dive staff

reviews.text:
I would be sad if you don't stay in this hotel in Dahab. Because this is the most humane and best hotel in Dahab.

Food: Breakfast has a very diverse selection, and it's delicious! The restaurant is unbeatable with an ocean view!

Internet: Internet is everywhere, and it's all fast!

Location: unbeatable ocean view, and a 3-5 minute walk to downtown!

Room: The bed was very comfortable, I felt cold at night so I asked for a sheet and was given one immediately. The toilet was very clean and the water in the shower was very strong and the temperature could be adjusted just right.

I am most grateful to Ryu, the receptionist, who assisted me in booking a trip to the Blue Hole, helped me book a car to the airport, etc. She is a very sweet girl. She is a very sweet girl and really helped me a lot! Also a very nice person to talk to.

The restaurant staff, the staff who helped me with my luggage, every one of them made me feel welcome and they were the kind and gracious kind of people!

When I checked out, I was so sad to leave Dahab and everyone at this hotel, so I hugged Ryu and cried, I really liked this hotel so much!
reviews.title: I would be sad if you don't stay in this hotel in Dahab

reviews.text: The staff here is amazing and took really good care of us the whole month we were there! The rooms and grounds are very clean and comfortable. Right on the Red Sea with beautiful views of the Saudi Arabian coast.
reviews.title: Great Resort

reviews.text:
The hotel is very good and very clean and high recommend .
The staff was so friendly 
Place near from every thing what u want
Just amazing place 
Just pls u can put some cups and ashtray this what was missing 
Thank u
reviews.title: High recommend

reviews.text: Shams was the perfect place for our digital nomad retreat! We stayed for a month with a group of 25 remote workers. The staff were exceptional, so kind and helpful and really went out of their way to make sure we had a great experience. Also you can’t beat the sea views - the restaurant was directly on the sea and the most beautiful place to work and socialize! The food was also great. I would love to go back. ❤️
reviews.title: Amazing 1 month at Shams

reviews.text:
I'm not one to go out of my way to recommend places, but after the last four days, it would really be a crime not to spread the word about Shams Hotel.

 Like a good Israeli, I went in to read recommendations on worthwhile places before my first visit to Sinai (which opened a window in my soul and will definitely not be the last).

 I came across a post bursting with amazing comments not only about the hotel itself, but about Ashraf Shams who runs the place.

 The best decision I made was to contact Ashraf personally to close a place and from the initial interaction I discovered a golden man.

 Ashraf answered all my questions (many, it should be noted) with patience and a lot of understanding, and really made me feel at ease.

 I felt that I had someone to trust and the intuition really did not disappoint.  From the moment we crossed the border Ashraf was interested and asked and literally took care of all our needs.
 From taxis, arranging a snorkeling tour, without our asking, the man brought us falafel when we were hungry until the room and before we said goodbye, he even went and bought us drinks and snacks to have on the way back to the border.
 Personal attitude will be an understatement.  🥹

 Dahab is a wonderful and magical city, but our experience would not have been the same without the amazing hospitality of Ashraf and the entire hotel staff.
reviews.title: Amazing staff, beautiful location, a perfect vacation!!

reviews.text:
Great location, great restaurant, AMAZING diving club, very kind service from all staff.
Only thing is the cleaning of the rooms that is not that efficient and no sheets for the blanket.
We had amazing time and for sure come back!
reviews.title: Great place!

reviews.text:
Honestly - a perfect stay. All 5 star reviews for a reason: Nadia and Bassem have made a little oasis in Dahab. Thank you so much guys! I can only say good things and will 100% be back!

Location/Grounds/Staff/Rooms/Atmosphere/Diving/Breakfasts (special praise for the free-flowing coffee and fresh juices) – amazing. 

I did my PADI Open Water course with Emilio, who was the best! So thorough and reassuring in teaching, as well as incredibly fun to hang out with. All of the other staff (shout-out Salam for fun drives, Ahmed and Smiley for other awesome dives!) are wonderful; equipment and dives were so easily organized and stress-free. 

Magical spot.

Definitely book!
reviews.title: The Best

reviews.text:
We are a group of 6 divers and spent a week in Xmas 2022 in The Bridge Dahab hotel. The hotel rooms are very cosy, spacious and clean. The hotel premises in general are very well looked after and always clean. The Liquid Adventures Dive center is within the hotel premises. It's one of the best organised dive centres we have visited. Each diver has their own hanger for suits and locker for diving gear. There are 2 big washing tanks for washing diving equipment after the dives. All of the premises are manned 24/7 and there are security cameras in common spaces which adds a level of security.
The hotel staff is just wonderful and always eager to help. 
The Dive Center guides are great, with vast knowledge of the dive sites and very accommodating in diver's preferences.
If you are visiting Dahab look no further. This is the place to stay. If you are diving in Dahab then go with Liquid Adventures - you won't regret it.
Overall 5 stars rating from us !!
reviews.title: Amazing hotel with Dive Center in Dahab

owner_response.text: Thank you George for your nice words and we hope to see you again one day soon :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Fantastic small hotel hosted by the lovely Nadia and Baseem. It’s so well thought out and the rooms are stylish and spotless. Every room has a balcony and each room is large and comes with a kettle, tea and coffee. Lovely modern bathroom that is spotless. Cleaning is done on a request basis you just hang up your key in the morning on the cleaning request hooks. The cleaning is faultless. The breakfast is served outside on lovely rustic wooden tables and there is a selection of breakfast types you can choose all delicious including freshly made juice each morning. I don’t dive but the dive set up looks very well thought out and equipped. There is a weekly event timetable on the board by the office for the divers. Baseem and Nadia organised their driver for me to take me to meet my friend near 3 pools and organise the permission for the checkpoint amongst a few other local car journeys too I really appreciated this and felt safe being a solo female traveller. Baseem was contactable on WhatsApp so I never felt alone. The hotel is set back from the main boulevard and is like a little oasis in the area. I was there at Christmas and New Year which was a busy time for tourists but the hotel has a sense of calmness. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend it’s the best in the area.
reviews.title: Fantastic small hotel an oasis in Dahab

owner_response.text: Thank you so much, Jane. was great having you with us really and glad that you enjoyed your stay, really looking forward to seeing you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
We spent one amazing week in The Bridge and just can’t wait to go back. 
From the moment we were picked up at the airport until the moment we were dropped off everything was so well planned and done. The hotel is beautiful, located in the middle of Dahab yet so peaceful.  But it is the people that make it even better - from the night guard to the owners - everyone was more than helpful and always with a smile.
reviews.title: Can’t wait to go back

owner_response.text: Thank you Ivana. was great meeting and knowing you and really looking forward to the next time :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
The bridge is an amazing place, where you can feel at home everytime! 
Nadia and his husband are 2 Beautiful people, and all the staff work there is absolutely lovely! 
Everyone takes care of you for everything, they listen your needs advising you for the best options! 
Breakfast is very nice, fruit juices for sure the best we had in our life, tasty fresh… Delicious!!!! 
We absolutely recommend this amazing place and we are looking forward to come back  again soon!
reviews.title: Simply Amazing

owner_response.text: Thank you so much and it's always nice having you with us. looking forward to the next time :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
We have spent 8 days in this small new 'boutique' hotel in Dahab, The Bridge Hotel and Liquid Adventures Dive Center, on a bed and breakfast basis. Owner Bassem, together with all employees, does everything to ensure that you have a real holiday feeling. Fantastic location in the center on the Boulevard so that all shops and restaurants are a short walk away. The location is such that you do not hear the crowds on the Boulevard. The rooms are spacious and clean, lovely bathroom and good bed. The house reef out front is one of the best in Dahab, we think, and for diving at other locations, transport is perfectly arranged and the guides listen to your diving wishes. They can also arrange your pick-up from the airport.

The rooms look great. Neatly finished, good bathroom, cleaning and fresh towels when you want. Hang your room key on the hook and your room will be cleaned when you are gone. The room has sufficient closet space and a fridge to keep your drinks cool. Next to the hotel is a small supermarket where you can buy soft drinks, chips, candy, etc., but there is also a small liquor store if you want alcoholic drinks.

Every day you can get clean bath towels, which you can use at the pool or take to the beach.
The breakfast was very good every morning, there were a number of dishes to choose from, but if you let the cook know what you would like, it will be made for you. A nice surprise was the smoothie of the day at breakfast :).

The diving facilities are superb. Enough and clean sinks, drying room and lockers to store your belongings. A nice instruction room for when you follow a course. The rental materials look great and are kept well organized. 12 and 15 liter bottles are more than sufficient and it is possible to dive with Nitrox.

There are many different dive sites in the area and the guides adapt to the wishes of the group. They have a lot of knowledge of the diving equipment and of the flora and fauna underwater. Besides good guides, they are also very nice people :-).

The atmosphere at The Bridge is friendly and familiar, the guest feels King here, everything is done to ensure that you have a great stay.

Can I point out a side note or 'minus'...sincerely not.

Bassem and Nadia, thank you for the super fun days and your hospitality! I'll gladly come back again!
reviews.title: Fantastic stay and top facilities for divers!

owner_response.text: Thank you so much, my friend. I'm glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and really looking forward to the next time :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: The Bridge is a wonderful, clean, cosy hotel with great facilities and even more amazing people. The staff is truly committed to making you feel at home and succeeds in doing so. Many thanks to everyone who made this first encounter with Egypt to a pleasant experience.
reviews.title: Pleasant first encounter with Egypt

owner_response.text: Thank you so much Willem. was great having you with us and really looking forward to the next time :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: They call it home, and it really feels like home! It is a wonderful place to stay, and the people are great. They do everything to give you the best experience you can get. Special thanks to the nice people making our breakfast every morning and make sure there was enough coffee and tea. This place is a real oasis in the Sinai. Special thanks also to the guys filling our tanks every day and the great dive guides Emilio, Smiley, Robyn and Nubi! You have made my first visit to Egypt a very special one!
reviews.title: A beautiful oasis in the Sinai

owner_response.text: Thank you Mark. was great having you with us and looking forward to the next time :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

photos.caption: You are never alone in The Bridge
Roof top view from The Bridge hotel
Nice wall paintings walking North along the sea
It is still early morning in Dahab
Nice view of my room while having a wonderful breakfast

reviews.text:
Absolutly the best hotel and dive center in Dahab, if not maybe even all Egypt. Not only the rooms are are very nice but all the beatiful humans working there make you comfortable under and adove surface.
Thank you so much for having us again! ❤️
reviews.title: Again and again and again!

owner_response.text:
Thank you for your lovely review, Nico.
You are always welcome here and we hope it's not too long until we see you :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
Where to start... This place is incredible! I've stayed in a fair few hotels abroad but none that have such amazing staff. From the night security guy to the room cleaner, 10/10 all round. The owners Bassem and Nadia couldn't do enough to make our stay one of the best ever. Such genuine beautiful people who will go out of thier way to help you as much as they can.

The rooms are beautifully kept with all mod cons including fridges and safes (not that you need to use the safe) A choice of AC or ceiling fan and a spacious balcony to enjoy the evening before you head out to explore Dahab. Oh and of course the pool for an afternoon cool down dip!

The Bridge is located right in the centre of the strip with an amazing roof terrace to soak up the stunning views both day and night. Simply breathe taking! You are literally a 5 min walk in either direction to some amazing bars and restaurants and a 45 second walk to the sea for a spot of snorkeling. Couldn't be better situated.

The guys in the kitchen are absolute LEGENDS! All included breakfasts to die for and such amazing variety. I'm already missing my star shaped pancakes with lemon and powdered sugar!  

The hotel has its own dive school with all the trimmings! Some of the best instructors around and will make you feel at ease if you're a beginner, or take you out to do some super cool dives if you're an expert. Literally all bases covered. I've met some truly beautiful people that I'm hoping to stay in touch with for life. I can't wait to come and see you all again. You 100% made my holiday! 

If you're looking to stay in Dahab (whether you dive or not) then I HIGHLY recommend The Bridge. You won't regret it. 

10/10 Thank you, thank you, THANK YOU.

Merco x
reviews.title: The BEST place to stay in Dahab....

owner_response.text:
Merco! Thank you for such an amazing review and great pics :)
We loved your energy and great conversations, you'll be missed and we hope it's not too long until we see you again.
you've definitely made friends here and I'm sure it'll last a lifetime.
All the best,
Nadia & Bassem

reviews.text:
Regardless you are a frequent hotel-er or not, Ladybird will deliver you all what matters to make your stay at Dahab a joy every time you enter the permise until the very next moment you exit.

- Corridors are clean and quite

- Rooms are tidy, and sufficient 

- Breakfast options will certainly give a run around; delicious, filling, so fresh and with a chilling view 🌊

- Breakfast rooftop view is something 👌 

- Tops ‘em all, the staff is significantly decent (I kid you NOT, this point is worth your drive/flight)

- Uhhh forgot the location, you go and see (I won’t spoil this for you)

I had a chance to deal with Mr. Ehab as well as Mr. Anwar,  and that was fortunate 🙂 and Kudos to the rest of the team they saved no effort to offer a service to the best of their abilities.

I would not miss a chance to second, third, fourth, fifth, …. this experience the moment I am any close to Dahab walk 🙃

Dahab offers very different vibes, setup, topography, and activities then Ladybird makes this all a whole awesomeness!

reviews.text: We stayed 2 nights at Skyrock Dahab. Small guest house (6-8 rooms). Staff/owners were amazing! Included breakfast was incredible. Also had lunch (chicken shawarma) and it was fantastic. Terrace overlooking the water was lovely. Room was very clean. Dogs and cats were fun. Enjoyed just walking along the water in Dahab. Some great restaurants! So affordable.
reviews.title: So much better than expected!

reviews.text: Fantastic little hotel thank you for a lovely 3 night stay few days near Christmas, would have stayed longer had you a room free. Rooms well equipped including a microwave and very nicely decorated and excellent bathroom and shower. In a quiet area of Assalah beach. They were so kind even when I left to go to another hotel they lent me a little Nokia phone so I could make emergency calls to them if i needed to as my phone had an Egyptian data only sim card.  Breakfast was delicious and staff so helpful and friendly. Can’t fault it well recommended. There are only 8 rooms so book well in advance.
reviews.title: Fabulous small hotel

reviews.text: Spent a wonderful week in Skyrock. We were greeted with such a warm welcome and generous hospitality. The room suited us perfectly, house keeping was thorough and the view of the magical red sea was unforgettable. The breakfast was delicious every day and the team always ensured we had a coffee or drink if we wanted. Thank you so much Daoud and the gang for making us feel like a family in Dahab. Would definitely recommend Skyrock if you're thinking of visiting Dahab.
reviews.title: Spent a wonderful week in Skyrock.

reviews.text:
I was amazed by everything, the cleanliness, service, location and breakfast. 
Everything is simple and ideal. Every one strives to serve you to the best. Breakfast is great and has a different taste every day. The rooms are neat and have everything you need. Hats off for everyone responsible for this wonderful place. Will definitely stay at skyrock Dahab every time i visit the city.
reviews.title: Great place with great people

reviews.text: We just passed buy to check out the skyrock boutique hotel since it was very close to the one we are staying in. Omar in the reception was very friendly. He showed us around.The hotel is super clean and  cozy . It has all what  one is looking for in a comfortable stay in Dahab. Will definitely stay there if I come to Dahab again.
reviews.title: A hidden gem

reviews.text:
Skyrock was amazing!  Friendly, personal, helpful, good value!  I would 100% stay here again. Rooms were clean with a beautiful view of the ocean, which was 10m from the front door!  Easy 10 minute stroll to the main Lighthouse area. It was a safe place to stay and the hosts spoke great English and also arranged Taxis and day trips for us. 10/10.  Thank you!!  

Xavier & Paulina ☀️

reviews.text: The team is always there for you, day and night. They genuinely love pets and my dog also had a wonderful stay. Vegan breakfast is ready everyday and their Bedouin tea is to die for. Must stay in Dahab <3
reviews.title: Rejuvenating stay

location.address: Assalah, behind cultural centre, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text:
This was my second stay at Red C Villas, this time with my teenage boys. Maggie and her staff are so lovely, welcoming and helpful. Rio and his family do everything they can to make you feel at home including helping with questions about the apartment and booking taxis etc. 
The villas are comfortable and roomy - there were 3 of us in a 2 bedroom place on the ground floor and we had plenty of space. The kitchen was well equipped, there was always water to fill up bottles and the wifi was pretty reliable and strong.
We didn't use the pool but we did hang out on the rooftop terrace as the sun went down. Could maybe do with some more furniture there.
We enjoyed beautiful walks into town from the Villas - takes around 20 mins. 
Asala Square is not far for groceries and supplies.
A taxi from town to the villas was 50 egyptian.
We had lovely walks up the mountains at the back of the villas to watch the sunsets. Absolutely stunning.
I wouldn't hesistate to recommend Red C Villas to my friends.
Thank you Maggie and team for a wonderful stay - hope to see you soon, Inshallah
reviews.title: I'll be back!

reviews.text: This is a villa complex, with four villas, two of which have been split into two apartments.  They have been built to a very high standard. The whole complex can sleep 28 people plus there’s a small studio on site for a further 2 guests. There’s a lovely pool in the centre of the villas with the apartments / villas facing into. Our villa also had a lovely roof terrace plus there’s a small patio outside of the main door, great for watching the early morning sunrise. We had two bedrooms in our 1st floor apartment; 1 with king sized bed and one other twin bedded room which we didn’t use. Plus two bathrooms, one of which was en-suite to the master bedroom.  There was a good shower, I found the bed comfy but my partner found it quite firm.  There is a kitchen / lounge / dining area with TV (although we didn’t use).  The kitchen is fairly well equipped but we didn’t dine in so didn’t attempt to cook as such but you could. There’s a decent sized fridge freezer plus a separate water cooler so you have everything you need. The villas do have Wi-Fi but it was patchy and sometimes not available so it’s advisable to buy a SIM for your phone. Rio and his family (who look after the villas for the owners) are on hand to help with any issues and he is very friendly. There’s also a communal washing machine which guests can use.  Although the villas are away from the centre of Dahab you can easily catch a taxi into town or better still hire a bike (as we did) and cycle in and out of town.  Although you do get a bit of road noise, once inside the gate, the villas provide a calming, relaxed place to stay with views of both sea and mountains. I’d  recommend earplugs as we found the air conditioner in the bedroom was a little noisy, plus it takes care of any background road noise. Overall we had a nice relaxing stay at the Villas and would definitely recommend.
reviews.title: Lovely spacious air conditioned villa with beautiful pool

reviews.text: On arrival we were greeted and made to feel right at home, the flat was well maintained and well appointed, spacious and  comfortable The pool was refreshing. Great location, beautiful country, beautiful people and the scenery is to die for
reviews.title: Red C Villas

reviews.text: The Red C Villas are really quite nice and actually better than the pictures as the gardens have matured and are quite lovely.  The architectural elements and design create a beautiful, luxurious scene.  A few small touches such as a working TV and shampoo/conditioner with wash cloths included would push this place to excellent but in no way take away from the beauty.   The folks working here also demonstrate great hospitality and are very responsive which is appreciated.  One thing to note is those who are lighter sleepers and not early risers may want to reserve an apartment on the city side as there is fowl in the lot next door and the roosters crow quite loudly and early at dawn.  This is outside of the property, so hard to knock the place for this but it did cause me to wake earlier than desired each morning.  However, the pros outweigh the cons and we’d stay here again when in Dahab.
reviews.title: Beautiful place

reviews.text: Stayed at the villas with a group of 16 friends. We exclusively hired it out. It is exactly like the pictures - simply heavenly with the views of the desert mountains and the sea, overlooking the courtyard pool. The rooms were big and spacious, each kitted out with a proper kitchen. Water coolers were provided. There is on-site laundry machines too. Pool was excellent, great rooftop terraces for some yoga practice. You can walk into town - it is not too far - otherwise plenty of taxis around. There is also a cute beach the opposite direction to town. You can also get a masseuse to come to the villa. The owners and cleaning staff were all lovely and helpful. Would definitely stay here if traveling in a group or you want to stay a bit away from the busier Dahab beach front - it really is easy and safe to get home from town.
reviews.title: Exactly what you dreamed of

reviews.text: I just can’t get enough of this pool the new darker tiles are stunning at night along with the new LED light fittings making it a great place to relax and recharge we’ve had our laziest holiday ever spending hours beside the pool during the day and at night a massive thanks to Steve and Rio for making Red C Villas feel like home from home see you next year
reviews.title: Relaxed at Red C Villas

reviews.text:
We stayed at Red C Villas for 10 days during a diving trip to Dahab and absolutely loved it

I cannot recommend the Red C as an accommodation venue enough. The rooms are clean, well located, finished to a high standard and incredibly comfortable.

From start to finish, the process of staying with Red C was a breeze. After booking, we communicated directely with the management who helped arrange our transfers from Sharm El Sheikh, helped organise a dinner in the desert under the stars and were simply on hand for any queries that we needed. During the day, Rio, the onsite manager was there to help whenever we had a query. 

The accommodation itself is simply stunning. We stayed in a Studio apartment and were very happy with the space, the quality of the bed and the facilities. The poolside is a great way to while away an afternoon and a welcome place to rest after a day of diving.

Massive thank you to Dom, Maggie and Rio for helping make our trip to Dahab incredibly memorable once again,
reviews.title: Exceptional quality and service

We enjoyed ourselves and will definitely be back.

reviews.text: I stayed for a long weekend with friends. The Villas are great, comfortable, clean and in a great setting around the pool.  This would be an ideal spot for families to stay as it is a cut above most of the accommodation in Dahab.  You can find cheaper but you won't find better.  Dom and co the hosts are friendly and helpful and make sure you are happy in the villas.  The location is a little out of the town and away from the bustle, but getting a lift into town is very cheap - about £1 or £2 depending on your haggling skills.
reviews.title: Really nice villas and pool, a relaxing Oasis in Dahab.

owner_response.text:
Dear Kevin, 

Thanks for your lovely review.  It was a pleasure welcoming to Red C in Dahab.  We agree that though our location is away from the centre, it offers a more peaceful environment and as you say taxis are easy to come by and are very affordable.

We look forward to welcoming you again.

Kind Regards, Dom
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: The Red C Villas were by far the best accommodation of our 3-week stay in Egypt.  The property and apartments are immaculate, pristine, and modern with everything one might need for a long or short term stay.  We were upgraded to the two bedroom apartment and it was the perfect way to conclude our honeymoon.  We had intended to stay for 3 nights but our time in Dahab was so perfect we extended for 6 nights.  The sauna was welcomed on the chilly nights after swimming in the sea. The beds are super comfortable, the kitchen is stocked with everything you need to cook meals, the shower was piping hot, and though we didn't use it they were equipped with a/c and heat and television with cable.  The wifi was often spotty but that seems to be the norm in all of Egypt and didn't dampen our experience.  Steven and Rio took exceptional care of us and it was bittersweet to say goodbye.  If ever in Dahab this will be the only place we would consider staying.
reviews.title: Immaculate Large and Modern Apartment, Favorite Accommodation in Egypt

owner_response.text:
HI,

Many thanks for your excellent and informative review. We are glad you enjoyed Red C so much and benefitted from our new sauna.

We make every effort to keep the internet in the Sinai establishment up and running which can be tricky at times. Many thanks for your understanding that when the net does go down this is generally a Dahab wide issue. 

We look forward to welcoming you again soon. 
Kind Regards, Dom.

Sorry for now , but I am a little perfectionist :)

reviews.text:
Lovely hotel, a bit rough around the edges but has lots of character. We walked past several other hotels and thought that Swiss Inn had the most beautiful beach. 
We went end of February and the weather was hot - the wind made things more tolerable and was great for trying out windsurfing. 
Pool was not heated at the start of the stay but we were told that there was a fuel shortage - by the end of our stay the pool was a lovely temperature. But we spent most of the time in the sea. 
Hotel taxi to town cost us 60 EGP (4 people) and we had to find a taxi back. There is a coastal path which takes maybe 30-45 mins - a tad too long for little legs. 

Staff are very friendly, very attentive and gave the kids lots of attention. 
Kids loved Miss Samar in kids club and wanted to go every day. Lovely little kids club with play park. 
Stayed in a family room which comes with a massive double bed and a small double sofa bed. Plenty of space for a family of 4. 

This is definitely not your “Brits-abroad” holiday - very multi-national. We went half-board and found the food great, not repetitive. Every evening had a different theme, and was reflective of the variety of nationalities at the hotel. No chips etc, but they would make pasta if the kids were being fussy. Plenty of vegetarian food. I’m vegan and got by, although food not labelled with allergens. No dairy-free milk for morning coffee though! Loved Friday’s Egyptian food. 

My only two small criticisms:
1 - reception staff not as helpful as the rest of the hotel staff. Took three trips to reception to get our door lock fixed, didn’t help with a booking issue prior to our stay, and due to struggling to get change we found ourselves stuck at the hotel with no help for a solution from reception. But we happened to come across Karin who I think is guest relations and she is brilliant and has all the answers. MONEY TIP - the money exchange machine in the hotel does not accept GBP notes even though it is supposed to, it only takes EUR and USD notes. But the shuttle can take you to a nearby bank where the machine works. Also NO-ONE has change - not the hotel shuttle, hotel shop, taxis, shops in Dahab etc. So we couldn’t get a taxi or buy anything until we met Karin who changed some of our big notes within minutes. 
2 - the hotel is dead in the evening! No atmosphere at all. We didn’t want/expect entertainment and knew it would be quiet, but there is no music. Restaurant is a bit dull, and they haven’t made the most of the beach bar. The beach bar needs a bit better lighting and louder music playing Egyptian music, not quietly playing Meatloaf and Bonnie Tyler. Then people may want to chill and buy drinks rather than go to their rooms at 8pm . 

Overall great holiday which we recommend. We and the kids loved it and only wished we booked longer!
reviews.title: Great for families

We are always committed in delivering the perfect holiday experience for each and every guest and are very pleased that you and your family have enjoyed your stay here with us. It filled our heart with joy, seeing  that your kids had a lot of fun in our kids club with Ms. Samar, she is really great with children. Your criticism is much appreciated and the entire team is always ready to work hard, in order to improve our high standard service  and achieve better results.
It was a pleasure having you and your beautiful family staying with us, we are certainly looking forward welcoming you again soon, to enjoy our hospitality, delicious food, clean rooms and  our perfect location right on the shore of the amazing Red Sea, with clean-soft sand, direct access and a spectacular view to the majestic Mountains of Sinai. Best wishes from magical Dahab.

We had everything we needed, the food was great, rooms were clean and staff were so friendly and helpful made a great experience, especially Mohamed Hany at the restaurant and Ekrami at the beach bar were great. Would come back again.

They have molded a very good memory of Egypt and it’s people to me. I had a wonderful time here and my room was properly fitted with all I need. Surprisingly I made a lot of friends too, most especially Mohammed from the restaurant, very helpful guy. Very nice people, very nice place. Only thing I’d complain about is the internet, otherwise 5 stars.

Habibi,
Hachikaru from Nigeria.

Remon - Australia.

reviews.text:
Stunning hotel in a quiet street just a few minutes' walk from all the hustle and bustle of the Beachfront Promenade in one direction, and the recommended breakfast spot, Ralph's German Bakery, in the other direction.
The room has really comfortable beds, spacious bathroom, refrigerator, tea/coffee-making facilities, TV and lots of different lighting which make it easy to relax and unwind.
There's a few communal areas such as the rooftop terrace, tables in the small courtyard, and some indoor seating. You can help yourself to soft drinks, tallying them on a whiteboard so you can pay on checkout. Beach towels are freely available to borrow, and the wi-fi is superb!
The owner leaves you to freely enjoy the hotel so you feel really at home. But he is always available whenever you need any help or advice for any aspect of your trip.
Highly recommended; it really is a home away from home.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel in quiet & convenient location just a few minutes' walk from everything

owner_response.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us this nice review. We are happy to hear our facilities are appreciated by our guests. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
I only have good things to say about my stay here. My room was spacious and well equipped, bathroom was big and clean, the location was good and so on. They have taken great pains to ensure that all needs for short term and long term rasidents are taken care of.  The place has a well equipped common kitchen  and a common utility area. The part I liked the most  was the 3-4 sitting areas in the property , where one can just relax.

Khaled was kind , responsive and gracious. Will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: A gem!

owner_response.text: Thanks for your wonderful review.  We are glad to hear you appreciate the comfort, cleanliness and guesthouse facilities.  We look forward to seeing you back.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: For the second time I stayed at coach house in dahab. Such a welcoming lovely place. It’s everything that I need. Close to the beach and the diving centers. Lots of small terasses if you need some space. Lovely clean room. I will come back!
reviews.title: Wonderful place

owner_response.text: Thanks so much for your kind review. We enjoyed having you here again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
I was already for the second time in Dahab and at Coachhouse and I will do it again ;)
It's a great place to stay, everything is clean, the owners (Nina and Khaled) are very nice!

Can only recommend it!
reviews.title: Always great to be in Dahab - and at Coachhouse!

owner_response.text: Thanks for taking the time to review us. We are always glad to see guest returning. Hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Thanks again for a lovely stay in Coachhouse. I stayed here for 3 weeks and loved the place. The Coachhouse is located in a quite area but within one minute you reach the beach promenade with all the restaurants and shops. The rooms are very cozy and nicely decorated and the housekeeper does an excellent job keeping the rooms clean.  I will always return to this place. See you again soon.
reviews.title: Best place in Dahab

owner_response.text: Thanks for your kind review. It means a lot to us that guests keep coming back to us. We are looking forward to having you as our guest again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
First off, Nina was great checking me in.  The shared spaces make for a communal feel and meeting the other guests was very seamless.  The room itself is wonderful- good space, nice clean bathroom.  

Khaled totally saved me a few days before check out.  I had come down with severe food poisoning and was planning to just wait it out.  He recommended a trip to the doctor's and I'm glad I took his advice.  The food poisoning was accompanied by a 39C fever and the local doctor prescribed a few things that took away the agony that same evening.  I was good to go the next day before my long flight home.  Khaled also arranged the taxi to the doctor's, in addition to the follow up visit (the driver stayed with me, so I didn't have to worry about the ride back to the Coachhouse).  Khaled even handled a transaction with a restaurant I had booked with the night I got sick- he made sure the money I owed the restaurant was properly transferred to them.
reviews.title: Saved me during the last few days!

owner_response.text: Thanks for your kind review. It was our pleasure helping you out. We are lucky to have such a good doctor in Dahab. We hope to see you again in Coachhouse.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Thank you for yet another wonderful stay in Coachhouse. I must have tried most rooms there now, all very nice, comfortable and with different décor.  I especially like that it is small place with only eight rooms. The housekeeper does a very good job keeping the rooms and surrounding areas clean, and the staff is very helpful and friendly.  I enjoyed spending time in the beautiful courtyard or garden with all its plants. The place is very quiet even if it is just a around the corner from the beach promenade and everything you need.  I don’t mind not being served breakfast as the famous German Bakery is just 2 minutes walk away, or I will prepare myself some breakfast in the well-equipped  and spotlessly clean kitchen.  Airport transfer can be arranged and the owners will help if you wish to book trips or answer any questions you might have. For quality like this I do have to say the value for money is great. I will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Perfect place

owner_response.text: Thanks for your wonderful review. It means a lot to us that guests are returning to Coachhouse . We are glad to hear you appreciate the comfort, cleanliness and guesthouse facilities.  That is exactly what we want for our guests. We look forward to seeing you back.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
The Coachhouse is located in a quiet area of Dahab but within one minute by foot you already reach the beach promenade. It is a very familiar relation with the owners, Khaled and Nina. They take very good care of the customers and always try their best to satisfy their needs. The Coachhouse itself has a very nice ambiente. You can relax in the backyard or the front entrance. The kitchen is very clean as well as the rooms. The rooms are equipped with AC and very cozy. The transfer to the airport was managed by Khaled and went without any problems. If you go diving I would recommend Sinai Divers Backpackers!
Very very beauftiful house! Thank you for the wonderful time, Khaled and Nina!
reviews.title: Wonderful located accomodation with a beautiful atmosphere

owner_response.text: Thanks for your wonderful review. We are glad you enjoyed Coachhouse and hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: I spent two very nice weeks at the Coachhouse. It is calm, serene and clean, the rooms are cozy and tastefully furnished. The shared area can be used for eating, reading or relaxing, there are chairs and tables in the courtyard and also loungers on a small terrace. The location is very good, with the seaside, shops and restaurants within walking distance. The WiFi is also a plus. Nina and Khaled were wonderful hosts and I hope to come again to Dahab and the Coachhouse.
reviews.title: Beautiful and calm

owner_response.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us this nice review. We are happy to hear the cleanliness and facilities are appreciated by our guests. We hope to see you back  in Coachhouse soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: This is a very clean, Cosy guesthouse, the best in dahab, I think. The bathroom is very good, the location is nice. It’s Close to the sea and Close to the center of dahab. There is a Very nice garden with different corners so you can have lots of privacy. I will go back, certainly!
reviews.title: Feels like home

owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again soon.

reviews.text: amazing place, very helpful and friendly staff, especially Asmaa (best trip planner, you can ask her for anything around dahab she knows it all). I would definitely recommend going there for a peaceful stay!
reviews.title: Best trip

reviews.text: If you like basic and dirty this is the place for you, awful awful awful, nothing endearing about this place, the breakfast basic too, the only plus a short walk to the main activities, and the bakery around the corner very good, otherwise I would avoid.
reviews.title: Awful - Dirty and Basic

reviews.text:
Very friendly, clean, center of village, but not disturbingly close to tourism boulevard (awfull).
Funny Bedouin tent, however very smoking smell (people smoke lots inside). Bathroom very basic, staff extremely friendly, restaurant average.
reviews.title: Complete & simple

reviews.text: Been to Dahab a few times and this is by far the best accommodation i have stayed in.location is great and the room is spotless clean, we are grateful for both Ali’s and Asmaa’s flexibility and fast communication. Will definitely revisit!
reviews.title: Generous and friendly staff !

reviews.text: Good stuff specially Allí and of course the people in the dive center and the restaurant who were very good and nice. I had the best time thank you very much. Ease em is the best instructor I met. Aaa

The restaurant in perfect place on beach and hope to live there all my life..
Food was great in them new Lebanese restaurant. 
Sitting in front of sea at night and sunset was amazing 
Life there was not luxury but that is Dahab sample life

It is not just a village, it feels like home.
