location.address: Al Mellil Al Asla Street Qesm Saint Katrin, Dahab 46617 Egypt

name: Blue Beach Club
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
There are lots of options to stay in dahab
I wouldn’t recommend Blue Beach
Sure we were out of season but still…
The shower draining point was not located in the shower itself , therefore when taking a shower the water drains to bathroom and rest of room. On having mentioned this, a towel was left on the edge of the shower (to function as a dam?)
I almost slipped 3 times, despite using the squeegee multiple times to get the water back in the shower. Still a pool of water following day.
Water shower was hot end of the day, cold in the morning
No WiFi besides on the stair case - maybe more spots that I didn’t discover (not in room, balcony, nor breakfast area.)
The door to the balcony remains open in the room but locks on balcony side. Thank god we left window open and were able to climb back into room.
Bed was pretty comfortable
Room only cleaned if asked
A voucher is needed to get breakfast, reception not always manned. Breakfast mwah (mashed potatoes?)
reviews.title: Better places to stay in Dahab

reviews.text:
I arrived really late after midnight and the reception quickly sorted my room which was a deluxe double. I had a sea view, small balcony, decent double bed and a desk with a tv fridge and kettle. Bathroom had a nice shower with hot running water. I’ve spent a lovely week here, waking every morning watching the sun rise from my balcony. 
There is a great dive centre attached and a bar restaurant on the beach side of the hotel. 
The location is hard to beat with a short stroll to the centre. 
The staff here are really good, felt like home for the week!
Highly recommend
reviews.title: Excellent week at the Blue Beach Club hotel

reviews.text: Me and my friend had an incredible stay at the blue beach! It is an incredibly central location, the service was unbelievable, everything we needed, any questions we had we always were assisted and treated very well. Mohammed specifically was an absolute delight! Cannot wait to come back and stay at the blue beach!
reviews.title: Can’t wait to come back!

reviews.text:
My wife and I had the pleasure staying at this Hotel 1 month through December, it was amazing.
Firstly we booked a hotel room for a few nights, we liked it and Mr Ahrmed (General manager) let us view the "penthouse apartment " (flat)...it was so amazing we booked it for the rest of the month. It is a beautiful and spacious 2 bed apartment overlooking the sea and we adored it in every way. The roof top terrace was incredible to sunbath, have a drink and enjoy sunsets....wow!

The General manager Ahrmed even spent 2 afternoons of his free time to help me have a  further Covid vaccine in Dehab .We needed US currency to travel on(middle East tour) ...no problem he took care of it. This is an amazing lovely hotelier, perfect English and runs a very popular language school located in the Hotel.....a great Manager and a kind and decent man.

We often had room service from the restaurant which we thought was excellent by any standards. All the staff at blue beach were so kind, professional in their jobs.

We arnt into diving but there is an excellent diving club centered in the Hotel complex who also rent bikes, excursions etc.

I recommend blue beach  totally and we will be staying their , hopefully with Mr Ahrmed in charge next year.
reviews.title: SUPERB!

reviews.text:
I stayed at Blue Beach Club for almost a week and really loved it.

It's location in Masbat bay is great. You get the best of both worlds, as it's close to the heart of the village (about 10 minutes away on foot), but still manages to be away from the hustle and the bustle. There's also a clean, private beach of sorts just outside the hotel.

The rooms are in keeping with the prices charged. Nothing too fancy, but clean and comfortable. The inclusive breakfast is at the Steakout restaurant. It is a set menu, but the staff were more than willing to tweak it to my taste. It still didn't compare to a full buffet breakfast, but I always managed to eat my fill.

The front desk staff, Ahmed and Dina are a delight. They could help with all my queries including making arrangements for the COVID tests. Sandra was also very responsive and accommodating.

All in all a comfortable place to stay for a dive vacation or any other trip to Dahab
reviews.title: Good place in Dahab

reviews.text: A must stay place for a great experience when in Dahab.  Impressed with the staff who were professional and cordial and the process for COVID preventive measures with sanitization stations, mask and social distancing signage and implementation. Right on the water with nice beach viewing area. Restaurants with great food, bartenders and the view thru the all glass walls of the water was very good. Nice rooms and amenities with Poseidon dive center in the facility.
reviews.title: Great all around experience...

reviews.text: Located by the water (perfect for a morning swim), a bit off the buzz of gulf, this hotel offer normal but nice room for good value. Nice and friendly staff. Also has a bar wihtin the compound for a chill out after diving.
reviews.title: Nice and well located

owner_response.text:
Dear Christophe, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. We are thrilled that you loved your experience; our staff will definitely be happy to read what you wrote. We put customer experience and satisfaction as our priority, and your review reaffirms the hard work we put in every day. So thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

Cheers!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Very helpful staff couldn't do enough to help you clean nice pool and a great place, if you're planning a trip to Dahab this is a great place to stay, you are 5min from the center of Dahab so full of life, for a dive trip fantastic.
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Dahab

reviews.text: Nice breakfast  in blue it's near water side with great view and service we love this place and going  to recommend to all our friends  thank you  to joju who greeted with great email and polite  heist really nice guy
reviews.title: Breakfast  in blu

owner_response.text: "We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.”
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: We enjoy the food and moreover service was great.thank you kusum for such am amazing work and you are the assets to the teamm and we will come back and inform others the same .service is more than 5 star and recommend others for sure
reviews.title: Wow

reviews.text: Marine Garden is amazing! Its not the rooms (which are perfectly fine) but the atmosphere. Ahmed is a great guy who wants to help you with just about everything. You can sit in the garden or the pillow area and pet all the lovely cats. Sometimes there will be a fire and you can just huddle around it. It is hard to find the words to describe Marine Garden its a tranquil little garden of Eden close to everything. Great tips for Dahab and just allround gezellig! Thanks so much to all the staff but especially Ahmed for making us feel so at home😄 I miss the place allready!
reviews.title: Yes, Yes and yes again!!

photos.caption: The beautiful plants in the garden
One of the lovely cats sitting on a bed outside
Great sitting area in the garden

reviews.text:
We came with 2 kids and had great time here, ahmad and the crew are halping with everything we needed, 
We are very close to the beach and the center of dahad(light house),
defenitly will come back here next time.
reviews.title: Very good place

reviews.text:
I stayed in Marine Gardens in various sessions, winter, spring and this August was the first time I stay there in the summer. The best thing is they have many options for my stay, room, room w bathroom or suite. And they r all clean and convenient.
The location is gr8, if you use the street access u find the busy lighthouse restaurants, and from the seaside entrance, u find the calmness and the quiet beach.
In the location there is a beautiful coffee place and v good restaurant as well.
The staff are friendly and always helpful.
My favorite place to stay in Dahab
reviews.title: Everything I need

reviews.text: Marine Garden is the kind of place you can book for three nights and suddenly find you've been there three months. Great location with its own beach, close to restaurants, bars and bike rental places, but still very quiet and relaxed. Management are super helpful. Whatever you need, they'll help you arrange and there are people on site who run freediving and rock climbing excursions. Rooms range from very basic with shared bathroom, to more upmarket en-suite options. All are clean and comfortable and prices are extremely reasonable.
reviews.title: Great choice

reviews.text: We spent a month in Marine Garden. The atmosphere was chilled and relaxed, the staff were friendly and kind and the rooms were clean and well furnished. They arranged our airport pick up and drop offs for us and were happy to help us in every way they could. The location is perfect, right in the centre of Dahab's lighthouse area, close to lots of nice shops and restaurants, but also a short walk from peace and solitude by the sea. A great place to stay in Dahab!
reviews.title: Beautiful Relaxed Stay by the Egyptian Red Sea

reviews.text: Marine garden is one of the best places I've been to. The beauty of the camp relies on its simplicity and safety. It's so peaceful and everyone is so respectful and they respect your privacy. They have different types of rooms and accommodations. Ahmed (the manager) is so nice and he speaks really good english. The place has good vibes and positive energy and has its private beach. It's in the heart of Dahab, so everything you need and want is walking distance. I love the place and can't say enough.
reviews.title: Amazing and peaceful place

reviews.text:
Hello, I come here over 5 years because I feel that’s my second house, dealing with Ahmed, the guy who manages the camp push you to feel that you are more than welcomed
 He is humble and kind and he is respectful in the matter of the money

The camp is a real Heaven by the sea, you are in the middle of every where, you can go outside for the city and for the sea in minutes and you wouldn’t be affected by the chaos at all, it is quiet and clean and special

The people there are almost the same mindset, free souls and adventurers ❤️ Go go, that’s will be your home
reviews.title: Word of mouth

reviews.text:
Probably the nicest camp in Dahab. Perfect for nomads, it's cozy, clean and Ahmed will greet you and make you feel like home. The location is perfect, with a private beach two steps away.

Thank you guys for being my second family during my stay in Dahab 🤗
reviews.title: You will definitely love this camp

reviews.text: I spent several months renting a superior room in Marine Garden and I couldn´t choose a better place for my stay. It felt like home to me and the beautifull garden and cats and dogs around made my stay even more pleasant. Ahmed is taking a very good care of his quests and was always kind and eager to chat. The location is superb -  you have the sea just couple of steps away from your doorstep. It is also very safe environment to live. I am looking forward to return to Dahab und would love to stay there again.
reviews.title: Felt like home

reviews.text:
I love this place for its vibes and kindness of its owners. The place has a very nice location in dahab and its for nomadic people who love a simple time off. 
Its also really good of you're planning to spend time exploring as it a good budget camp.
reviews.title: A simple place for Nomadic people

name: Dahab Divers South Sinai Hotel & Dive center

reviews.text:
My dive instructor, Mostafa, was very helpful and explained everything thoroughly before diving. He was extremely patient and made me feel comfortable with important aspects of diving that I needed to know. 
This made the dives enjoyable because I felt like I could trust him completely.
reviews.title: Advanced Open Water

reviews.text: It’s easy to find good diving instructor, but one in million to find a diving instructor that his passion takes scuba diving courses to another level of professionalism & knowledge, thank you MOHAMED SHERIF for the great experience & positivity
reviews.title: Dahab divers center, Diving courses

reviews.text:
I haven’t stayed anywhere else in Dahab and don’t plan on doing that. The rooms are really clean, the breakfast is good and the staff are really friendly & helpful.
I feel like it’s my home away from home.
reviews.title: My favourite hotel & dive center

reviews.text: We did about 40 dives and a Nitrox course with Anwar and some of the other instructors. Everyone at the shop was extremely accommodating to our particular schedule, friendly and lots of fun! We dived a lot in Dahab, where the dives are all shore dives and have really beautiful coral, as well as a few day trips to dive off of Sharm, which the shop organized to our convenience. Highly recommend this shop to both new and experienced divers!
reviews.title: Excellent diving with professional and friendly instructors

reviews.text:
Spoke with a few shops and even dived with one, but got the best vibe from Dahab Divers. Turned out to be true. 

Mahmoud who oversees the shop is super nice and helpful. He organized trips to accommodate our work hours. And he even organized a trip to Tiran Island. 

We dived with Anwar, a well known instructor in Dahab, for over 15 days and has become a great friend! Will definitely miss him and everyone at the shop (and all the cats lol)!!
reviews.title: Dahab Divers is top notch

reviews.text:
I highly recommend Anwar for diving instructor. Anwar is the instructor for my boyfriend and I’d open water dive course. With risks of diving, you need an instructor that makes you feel safe and can depend on. We felt that with Anwar, after walking around and talking to several dive shops. Oh, and he’s been diving for 20 years! 

His entire course was very professional and he was very attentive to the needs of the students, allowing us to learn at our pace. He was also very fun. Overall an awesome guy and I would certainly recommend him if you are looking to dive in Dahab.

Also the entire Dahab Divers dive center has been amazing. Mustafa really knew his gears and helped me with a blister. 

The owner also loved film photography and had really cool underwater film camera casing displayed. 

Overall, when it’s a hotel+dive center, it’s a more sophisticated operations than just a dive shop. And this one is a really well-run place.
reviews.title: Amazing & professional open water dive program

reviews.text:
You’re sure to have made a good choice if you dive with these guys:
1. a cheerful attitude in the whole team guarantees a  experience
2. Quality teaching: took the Open water course here (it’s a proper PADI centre) and in a few dives we felt comfortable and safe in the open water with our excellent guide Anwar
3. Overall, a very professional attitude, clean and well managed business
Hoping Dahab Divers stay around for many years because we’ll be back!
reviews.title: a truly fantastic team

locations.name: Dahab Divers South Sinai Hotel & Dive center

reviews.text: The absolute perfect place to come dive and relax. Excellent equipment to rent and the hotel is right on the front with all the restaurants and bars. Owner always has a smile on his face as you can see from the pic!
reviews.title: Diving and Relaxing

locations.name: Dahab Divers South Sinai Hotel & Dive center

reviews.text:
Be careful when booking
These are 2 different places
I thought i booked for DDL by accident I booked for DD
i had sent many emails to Mohammed owner of DDL re organizing private snorkelling, seems my accom
was for DD when I thought had booked fir DDL
Anyway Mahmout is Manager of DD and also helpful, although his presence there is limited and other staff have limited English
Mohammed helped me a lot and organized Amra who was the best snorkel support (am 69, older solo travelling unfit woman)
It all worked out fine in the end
I LOVE DAHAB and it really is easy to get to and there's lots of buses and and an airport
reviews.title: Dahab Divers v Dahab Divers Lodge

reviews.text:
Stayed here for a week, and it was a fantastic experience that I would completely recommend to anyone.
We went for diving and I completed my open water and my friend completed her advanced open water with Madany and Anwar. Both instructors for diving were fabulous and were we to take the next step on the different courses we would come back here and do it with these guys.
Rooms are exceptionally clean and the food was ok good too. 
The hotel is located just a few steps from the beach which makes it amazing for diving, or even just spending some time to chill out. The pool is lovely with sun beds to chill on- a great spot to unwind!!
Looking forward to going back someday.
reviews.title: Fantastic

location.address: Light House, El Fanara Street, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text: Very nice basic hotel with very kind staff very nice pool with friendly cats and dogs  every day did different activities lots to do beautiful beaches very nice bazar market in the town everything is in walking distance excellent experience looking forward to seeing you soon
reviews.title: Mr Hassan

reviews.text:
NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL. 

The staff and the manager is very rude and veryy irresponsible. 

The toilets were unclean and smells bad and when we asked to change the room the manager refused and talked with us with very unrespectful and he closed the call while we are talking so we decided to make a check out and we need our rest of our money and again he refused and told us to leave the rooms now and after we called some friends in dahab he changed the room for us  . 

Please dont go there ever never every thing was very bad from the staff to the manager to the cleaning to the pool every thingggg was very awful and the manager really is very rude .
reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED!!!!

reviews.text: Very bad hotel, ugly oily breakfast 🤮🤮🤮, and they have 2 husky dogs 🐕 every day pooped 💩 in the corridor in front of our room and no body wanted to clean it , also very loud music after 12:00 mid night and my son couldn’t sleep many times, no professionalism at all and in the last day they destroyed 4 pieces of our clothes with Clorox when I get back my clothes from their laundry. HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED 👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
reviews.title: Highly not recommended 👎🏾

owner_response.text:
I was hoping you would talk about the real issue, and the only real point is the clothes that went to the laundry and lost the shorts and T-shirt.
And not to talk about dogs and breakfast, because they weren't real at all, and you are not the only customer who stayed in the hotel, but there are thousands and no one has commented on these points.
Your clothes are of poor quality, the T-shirt and shorts, and you asked to wash these clothes with colored Clorox because they had stains, and the work was done and what happened
We compensated you financially and gave you two free nights and I apologized to you
However, you defamed us in several locations, and the reason is that we took you out of the room at the official check-out time of 11 in the morning because there was a reservation for the room and you wanted to sit in the room until seven in the evening after all we did for you
This is my fault. I could not satisfy you and compensate you for something erroneously made, but what we did with you is an appreciation from us that you do not deserve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: My stay at the Plaza Hotel was perfect. The staff were incredible, showing us around Dahab and allowing us to store belongings long after we had checked out (shout-out Mohammed). Food is great, rooms are clean, and location is central. Highly recommend you stay at the Plaza Hotel!!
reviews.title: Trip in the Sinai

reviews.text: The quality of beds and rooms are a little bit below average also the buildings are quite outdated but the hotel is alright, pros are: the pool, free breakfast and the location of the hotel is very close to the city center of Dahab.
reviews.title: Not bad

reviews.text:
Old place 
Many things are broken or not functioning 
Salty water in bathroom 
Some rooms are very bad

Not worth the money 

Location only is good

مكان قديم وسيء واغلب الاشياء لا تعمل
السباكه بايظه في الحمامات
والمياه في الحمام مالحه
بعض الغرف لا تصلح 

موقع المكان فقط جيد
reviews.title: Very bad experience

owner_response.text:
هو حضرتك دخلت الغرف كلها ؟؟؟؟؟؟؟؟ 
فعلا الفتره دى كنا فى ظروف صاعبه بسبب كورونا وكان فعلا فى تنقيط من بعض المحابس ولكن الدنيا مكنتش غرقانه 
اما موضوع المياه فطبعا لانها مياه ابار و ثلاث ارباع دهب مياه ابار ومياه التحليه كلها كلور فالابار بالنسبه لينا افضل 
اما مشكلتك الاساسيه هيا كانت ضد القوانيين واللوائح فكانت مرفوضه وليست الغرف والكلام ده
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
Good things

- Nice hotel and quiet

- Less than 2 minutes from the center on foot

- Bright colors and original style

- Reception staff was helpful and friendly

- wifi service

- air conditioning

Bad things

- Salt water

- I stand 3 hours of my day in my room to repair the toalet, and in the end the toalet was not repaired

- The key of the room doesn't work right, evry day i stand 5 minute just to open the dor... i asked 3 times to change it, but nothing...

- Her owner who treats the staff very badly in front of clients
reviews.title: Not bad, it's ok

reviews.text: We spent a very pleasant few days there. First time back to Dahab in 25 years and found Amed and his staff really nice people to be around. Was nice as a family to stay and always felt very safe with the kids. Great breakfast and good advice from Amed on what to do, prices and what to check out.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay with kids!

reviews.text: Stayed as a family, kids loved the pool and the pooltable area. Close to everywhere in town. Great choice. The guys in service do their best to help. Facilities are basic and that makes Plaza to make each one feel at home, within hours. We'll be back, for sure.
reviews.title: Simpliest & best in value.

reviews.text:
breakfast is good.
swimming pool is good.
it is near restaurants and markets
furniture is too old
TV was disconnected
rooms are not clean, no room service
stuff is not qualified but they are trying to be helpful
reviews.title: bad experience

location.address: Al Masbat Area City Center Before Bridge In The Heart Of Dahab City, Dahab 11511 Egypt

reviews.text: Highly recommended for anyone who seeks to have a great time in Dahab, great place that has all the essentails you will need in a room, very clean, kind, very nice people and so helpful. Thank you for the experience
reviews.title: Full moon

reviews.text:
Once we stepped into the hotel, we got a very warm welcoming from the owner.
In general, the hotel is very clean, has an outside area and roof to chill around.
Also, during our stay there the owners were helpful to recommend and book few trips for us for adequate prices.

Definitely will recommend for families and a small group of friends.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel!

reviews.text:
I just got an awesome experience with them.
Great and friendly staff
Clean rooms 
Quite place
If u r looking for a place to stay with quite and clean for chilling or study or doing ur research I think it’s the place for you.
reviews.title: Great staff

reviews.text:
Best place ever in dahab..Mr Ahmed and Mr Yasser are so freindly ,nice and cooperative...place very clean Quiet near to beach restaurants diving centers any service you need..you feel comfort there 
I recommend it for any visitor..thanks fullmoon❤️
reviews.title: Dahab

reviews.text: Fullmoon is an amazing hotel, it has clean rooms, friendly staff, a very nice and helpful owners and a lovely rooftop it's one of my favorite places to stay in Dahab and I would definitely stay there again in the future.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text:
Thanks to mr. yasser and Ahmed very welcoming and amazing hosts room was very neat , hot water and all details about room was excellent .
About location so calm and near to everything you need also the bicycles available to rent as well as helping with ordering taxi if needed , will sure come back already missing  the  morning coffee in the terrace , full moon thanks to all staff and owners
reviews.title: Happy client

reviews.text:
I took the hotel because it was good place - for exactly my requirement - (3 min walk from diving center, 3 min walk from, and not inside touristic zone).

The place is nice and clean. Simple place.

The best is the staff.

Very nice people - Yasser the owner is a great person - you will understand what I mean after you are here and speak with him.

Do not expect “Sinai touristic-like place” - no one will try to sell you here something unless you request a specific thing, they will help in whatever you need.

As I wrote in the title, I am so happy I got to this place.

The best that I am taking from here is knowing Yasser.
reviews.title: I am very lucky that I got to this place

reviews.text:
Hotel is simple and cozy. Owner is superb and friendly, extremely helpful. Definitely going back there on my next visit.
Hotel is very close to the beach, and also close to downtown. Walking distance to restaurants and cafés.
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.text:
This is the 2nd time for me staying in Full Moon, clean, owners are so friendly, have a good roof to stay at night, budget friendly and You feel like you are in home.
I would definitely stay in it again.
reviews.title: I like it

reviews.text: reasonable price to stay in dahab , very clean , owners of the hotel are super friendly , very close to the center of the city and they have a rooftop u can have a drink or chill up on the roof , very quite and relaxing i would ofcourse come back again
reviews.title: highly recommended stay

reviews.text: During my 16 nights at Jowhara, I truly felt like one of the family. Suleiman and the entire staff showed me consistent kindness and patience. The cuddly cats and the sweet, friendly dog were a delight! I will definitely be returning, hopefully for a longer stay next time. Inshallah!
reviews.title: One of the Family

reviews.text:
The is the most comfortable, clean, cozy and friendly service i have ever been in ! 

I recommend this place in Dahab ! 

I had the most interesting experience ever with those guys 
😍

Thank you guys for everything you’re the best. ♥️
reviews.title: El Mashraba

owner_response.text: Hi Omar, thank you so much for such a positive review! Happy to hear you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. We are looking forward to seeing you again next year.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
We stayed here a week in november, had a great time. It's located about 5-10 minutes from the beach, and the street leading down there is full of stores, supermarkets, restaurants and basically all you need. Supermarket for water, etc is right outside the hotell. 
The rooms are simple and not high quality, but its also one of the cheapest hotels in Dahab, so you get what you pay for. We got new towels whenever we wanted and they cleaned the room on request. Aircondition and wifi in the room. 
The backyard is very cozy, we hung out in the lounge both for breaktfast and in the evening. The staff and the owner, Soliman, was very helpfull and always friendly. We had a late flight back home the day we checked out, and he offered us to keep the room the whole day without paying more. The also helped us book our Sinai-trip with Jimmy from the hotel just up the street. 
If your fine with living in a simple room and dont want to pay extra for luxury, this is a great place to stay, felt like home!
reviews.title: Great place, friendly staff, you get what you pay for

owner_response.text:
Thank you Giske for taking time to write your review.We are pleased you had a great time and felt like home in Jowhara Hotel. 
We hope to see you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: I had a great stay at Jowhara. The rooms are comfortable, breakfast is delicious, and the staff went above and beyond to make sure that I was comfortable and happy. I felt very safe and cared for (which is especially important for me as a solo female traveler). It’s very quiet and in a great location—tucked just a short walk away from the main downtown.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel!

owner_response.text: Hi Cassidy, thank you for your lovely review. Glad to hear you had a great and happy time with us. Hope to see you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
Jowhara is great in every aspect: price, location, atmosphere... but the people here make the real difference. Everyone on the staff was super friendly
They kept our bags after checkout, offered us free diner with staff and let us use the bathroom for shower until the departure of our bus to cairo, at 10pm
reviews.title: Amazing people

reviews.text:
We stayed for 4 nights at the Jowhara hotel and completely loved it.
It is a simple hotel but our room and bathroom were very clean and we had everything we needed. They provide you with towels but no soap/shampoo.

For us the major selling point was the wonderful staff who were a complete delight and made our stay. Imad, Mohamed and Mostafa in particular were fantastic. Imad even woke up on our last day to make us breakfast before our taxi to Sharm El Sheikh Airport at 5am!!! What a superstar. 

The location is good, in the sleepier/less touristy part of Dahab which we much preferred. 

Overall would highly recommend.
reviews.title: Friendliest stay in Dahab

reviews.text: We are traveling with our two children and stayed in Jowhara Hotel for a week while we were in Dahab. It was fantastic. They were very easy to book with and responded promptly to emails inquiring about availability. They were very helpful with any tours that we were interested in doing but did not once “push” a tour on us that we had not asked them about. The breakfasts were great and the staff was exceptional. Especially Suleiman. He is wonderful! We would highly recommed Jowhara Hotel to anyone passing through Dahab.
reviews.title: Great stay! Highly recommended!

reviews.text:
tge place is very affordable and includes all types of rooms , w/without AC ,ground floor , 1st floor and family room as well with 4 beds ...
love the easy , simple and basic life there .
they do anything we ask for , and they clean tge rooms once we ask for it ...
lovely and friendly ppl ... will go again and again <3
reviews.title: mini Dahab

reviews.text: The hotel is located in the city center and near to most of the markets there, rooms are simply furnished and small. some rooms have a mini bar and some not. Staff there are trying to help you all the time. Fast Check in process.
reviews.title: Perfect price and value of money

reviews.text:
Excellent hotel and cute room with average rooms,cheap price , v.clean ,very friendly stuff and very helpful and the manager soliman was very friendly and trying to help us by anyway and always asking us if we need anything to do and if we need any help.
 
Thank u Jowhara Hotel
reviews.title: cute room :)

reviews.text:
Checked it aproximately 9pm I entered to a room that did not abosultely match with what the establishment was offering at the online site. 
As pictures attached the walls were dirty, the door slightly broken,  shower and toilett sink tap dirty and rusty( I did not even dare to have a shower ).
The bathroom window was broken and they covered the hole with a plastic bag. Shameful.
I asked for a room change a couple of times and the hotel staff who is so difficult to reach was completely unhelpful with excuses.
Cherry on top of the cake Wi-fi does not work at all.
 During the night, after 11 pm the public space is noisy and it is hard to conciliate a good sleep.
reviews.title: Awful stay

reviews.text: Very friendly staff and so co operative .. their advice about so many places here in Dahab are valuable and honest ..the rooms are clean and neat... the prices are so handy..they're very organised and of course the breakfast is so deliciois❤️🥰
reviews.title: One of the best palces in Dahab ❤️🥰

reviews.text: Enjoyed this simple and authentic place. Single rooms with big bed and AC. The special thing was the staff. Amazing people.  Toni. Ahmad. Nada.  All been welcome from check in till I left. They helped in arranging doctor for pcr. Everything available in short walking distance. Good value for money. Central location close to the bridge. Close to most of diving clubs and restaurants. The place is safe and quiet
reviews.title: Nice stay in Dahab. Feel at home

reviews.text: I had the best time staying at Alaska Camp and Hotel. The staff were amazing. They were super helpful and friendly, recommending places to go and going the extra mile to help the guests. The location was excellent, near the beach, cafes, a supermarket, diving center, bike rental and GoBus station. The room was clean and comfortable. The decor of the hotel is so artsy and beautiful 💗
reviews.title: Best place to stay in Dahab!

reviews.text: Good place to stay. Room was nice, hygiene was average and location is perfect. Staff were friendly and the camp overall is quiet and cosy. Outdoor area can be improved and breakfast can have more variety
reviews.title: Good place to stay - great location

reviews.text: Staff are amazing, place in the middle of Dahab and got amazing location. Breakfast was good and people are so helpful specially Maha from the reception . So looking forward to being back soon. The place doesn’t have any facilities for entertainment and I hope this will be changed
reviews.title: Feedback

owner_response.text:
Dear Mahmoud, 
We highly appreciate your review and hope to see you again soon.
Kind Regards, Alaska Camp & Hotel team
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Simple and quiet room. Friendly staff. Got good breakfast and coffee each morning. AMAZING location. Would recommend! They were very happy for me to leave my bags for the day after check out and returned late evening for them on way to go-bus station (5 min walk).
reviews.title: Enjoyed my stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Connie,
We highly appreciate your nice review and are very happy to know you're satisfied with our service.
We're looking forward to seeing you again at Alaska Camp & Hotel
Best Regards, Alaska Camp & Hotel team
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
Spent a week in Dahab diving, and staid at the Alaska for the whole duration. The staff were super friendly and helpful, and took the time to talk and get to know you. Esmat who worked at the hotel came with us when we went on a beduin evening, which felt nice and that we were taken cared of.
The room was clean and simple, there were no insects or weird mold (like you get in some places), and you decided for yourself how often they cleaned.
It's located right in the middle of town along the promenad, so you have lots of restaurants, shops and dive centres right on your doorstep. Despite this it is very quiet and calm, and we had no problems with loud noices at night.
I would definitely recommend people to stay here. We were recommended to stay here by H2O Divers.

(picture from the beduin evening we went to)
reviews.title: Friendly place with friendly people

reviews.text: I stayed 10 nights here in Nov. I loved my simple room and view from the room. hotel has very nice public area you can take a rest or have a cup of tea. Staff there are so so nice.. they treat you as a friend:) Plus, you can get 10% discount on your drinks&food at Yalla bar. i would definitely come to stay here again if i go back to Dahab. Thanks so much Sabry, and wonderful staffs.
reviews.title: Perfect oasis in Dahab ;) I

reviews.text:
Good location, very close to all Dahab attractions. Alcohol shops is just on the left side of hotel entry. No in-house restaurant, but dozens nice restaurant near by. 
No kettle or coffee maker in the room.  Bring along with you if want to have coffee or tea in the room specially in the morning where most restaurants still closed. 
The room is very basic and small. With 2 single bed room, there is not many space available. Room cleaning and change blanki/towel upon request only. 
Not too bad for somebody who will spend most of their time not in the room, and just need a place to sleep.
reviews.title: Budget hotel, good location

reviews.text:
It's like returning to your family home when you arrive at Diver's House.  Everyone there gives you a warm welcome and it makes you feel  like you've never left,  even though this time it wasn't our usual annual visit, but a 3 year gap due to Covid travel  restrictions.
Thank you guys for your smiles, fun and friendliness as always.
reviews.title: Always a warm welcome

reviews.text:
A really fantastic place to stay in a great location. 
The hotel is right by the sea in a quiet part of dahab.
All the staff are really friendly and helpful and make you feel really welcome. 
The rooms are nice and clean. 
There are lots of good places to eat and drink a beer after a day of diving.
reviews.title: A really good place to stay and enjoy dahab.

reviews.text: Very nice and friendly team, love every second of our stay, definitely will do it again. YAser from the diving center is fantastic he was quite helpful and calm with the new divers. Highly recommend it for diving and staying in dahab  and looking for serenity and calmness
reviews.title: Love this place

reviews.text:
The hotel is amazing & the staff is very very helpful.

The diving instructors are velly skilled and great teachers.

I had a problem with my diving open water  licensce which was issued from the hotel in 2013 & Tamer was more than helpful.
reviews.title: Amazing Service

reviews.text:
Perfect atmosphere, perfect view, perfect people, perfect vacation
We stumbled upon Divers House when we were looking for another hotel in Dahab. 
We are so happy to find this place. We got a really nice room and the staff and service was amazing. We will have to come back!
reviews.title: Diving Holiday

reviews.text: How nice was to find this place! All the staff is super friendly and efficient and they make everything they can to make you feel at home. The room was simple, clean and with a beautiful view. The diving lessons were great, Yasser was a top instructor, full of energy and always with a smile on. I had an amazing time and I’m definitely going back !
reviews.title: Great stay and scuba diving in Dahab

reviews.text:
We were at Divers House for 10 nights. Airport pick-up and drop-off was flawless and all our needs were attended to and taken care of by the Team.

We dove every day we could and Yasser (Divers House's in house instructor) made this diving vacation very special for us. It was fun adventorous relaxing and fascinating at the same time.

You could not ask for a better guide to show you all the major and also the secret spots underwater.

We will most definitely be going back as soon as we can.
reviews.title: Amazing Dahab diving

reviews.text: Thankyou for another great holiday  I can’t say how much fun we had   Thankyou everyone for all you help it was great to see you all and we loved all the diving with great friends and the best guide  Yasser  to everyone there we can’t wait to come back to our home in Dahab. You are all the BEST. mr Magdi , Tamar, Adham,Ali and Hamid.
reviews.title: The best of the best

reviews.text: I would like to recommend Yasser Mohamed with Diver's House for all your future diving trips in Dahab. He is extremely knowledgeable, professional, funny, friendly and makes you feel safe before you start suiting up. He sits with you and explains everything you will be doing before you even touch your gear. His briefings are clear and detailed. He is also very patient, so ask him any questions that may come up, or to repeat anything that wasn't clear. Highly recommended!
reviews.title: Diving heaven

reviews.text: The hotel offers great value for money with an excellent service. Get the room with the balcony for an unbeatable view. Also it has the beat dive center in Dahab. The staff is very friendly and will help you with your overall experience.
reviews.title: Best Value for Money

reviews.text: The food was very nice. Most of the guests have been working on their computers which was not very supportive for a nice ambiente. The service personnel was present but not really interested in offering a good service. 10% service charche was included in the bill so it didn't seem necessary to be friendly. We didn't really feel welcome or like in a lounge, it felt more like an open working space which we aren't looking for in our holidays.
reviews.title: Ghazala Lounge/Restaurant

reviews.text:
I travelled to dahab in November 
And I was a little bit nervous as it was my first time as a solo traveller..but it turned out to be unforgettable.. you really get to know yourself when you are alone.

So I started my trip at athanor lounge.. which is in a perfect location in Al fanar street , the neighborhood feels very familiar and people are nice.. right down the lounge there is a restaurant and Caffe called athanor pizzaeria and it is one of the best in Dahab ♥️

I have reserved some amazing trips to abou galoum, blue hole and the blue lagoon and stayed for 1 night in el omda camp 
Price for night was 100  egp and the dinner was for 100 egp breakfast for 50 egp 

I also visited the 3 pools , enjoyed some amazing places on beach like ghazala cafe and restaurant ( I didn't like their food) 

I visited wadi star ( twilight mountains)

I also enjoyed my stay at planet oasis for 3 nights  
, But if you are going to stay there , stay away from the budget room
reviews.title: It was my first time to visit Dahab ♥️

reviews.text: I have been coming to ghazala restaurant for 4 years but this trip was my first time to stay with them and it's delicious food as always and even when i had comment with food the chef came and gave us complimentary dessert, the staff is friendly and service is excellent. Thank you ghazala hotel
reviews.title: Delicious food and excellent service

reviews.text:
I think the title says it all. 
The food was so horrible we almost didn't touch it.
Tasteless, not fresh at all, service one of the worst in Dahab. 
Our food was returned to the kitchen and no body wondered what was wrong or why we didn't eat.
We asked for the bill and left quietly but there is no way we will set foot there ever again.
Don't recommend this place at all.
reviews.title: The worst meal i had ... in my life maybe!!

reviews.text: The last day when i made checkout the guy who wear  glasses told me that  I destroyed the shower and you must pay 150 Egyptian pounds and when i told him that i take the room and the shower don’t work   Probably he told me you must pay
reviews.title: Bad

reviews.text: I stayed in this place in November 2019, in a double roome. The only positive thing in the room was a dome-shaped ceiling. The rest - I have to admit - was terrible. Especially the bathroom: without even a shower curtain, all the tubes were leaky, the window in the bathroom was broken. After taking the shower I had big troubles with stomach - obvioulsy something was wrong with the water (which I didn't use for brush teeth) . I am sorry to write it but if you want to stay in a nice CLEAN place - go somewhere else. Ghazala is a kind of hostel for very unpretentious persons.
reviews.title: Hostel

owner_response.text:
Hello Dear,

We apologize that you had this experience with us, and it is not usual for us
We have renovated all the rooms, especially the bathrooms
It was an emergency circumstance that we used unsweetened water for conditions beyond our disposal, but the situation was modified within two days, no more
I hope that the following experience will be better for you

see you soon again

thanks so much for your review

Have a good day our friend
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
Lovely location and a wonderful lodge..great to relax and having a nice ambiance. Food is great, view is beautiful and rooms are very good. 
One of the best places in dahab, lovely beach quite and clean, friendly staff and descent management.

reviews.text: A very cozy hotel with a gorgeous sea view, a friendly staff, and nice food. It has a decent diving center with great dive guides and instructors. I really enjoyed the diving trips I had with them. The place is quiet and comfortable. It is animal friendly raising a big number of cats and a dog.
reviews.title: Great stay!!

reviews.text:
An amazing divers' home run by people who clearly love diving and hosting people! Located in a rather quiet area slightly outside the center, but still easily within walking distance of the pedestrian areas.
We always felt very welcome and comfortable, almost like being among friends or family. All the staff from both the hotel and dive school are very friendly and attentive.
Our room, although not the most modern, had everything necessary for a comfortable and enjoyable stay, plus a balcony with a fantastic sea view where we could relax after a long day of diving.
Their diving school has great instructors who take excellent care of their students, and as far as I could tell the course groups are kept small.
Even the house reef is an unbelievable diving or snorkeling spot where there's a lot to be seen.
They also offer regular tours to the desert and mountains around. We did one and were very happy with the experience.
reviews.title: A real divers' home, run by and for divers!

owner_response.text: Thanks Pedro, for your always smiling face! Hope to see you both soon again
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: everything was perfect, room price, staff, room view, very close to everything, it is inside mamsha area actually at the end of it, I love everything there and will visit soon we enjoyed so much there.
reviews.title: very lovely and cozy place

owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: My little boy and I spent 6 days at INMO and absolutely loved it.  The location is perfect.  Everyone is so friendly and helpful.  Breakfast was delicious.  Our room was great and we were so tired after 9 days of touring ALL the popular Egyptian tourist attractions, that we hardly left it. When we finally managed to make ourselves move we had great dive guide who were so patient and sweet with my old self that hadn't been on a dive in 20 years and my somewhat fearful son who could not get his ears to equilibrate.  I also loved the fact that it was so quiet. Now one of my major goals in life is to get back here with the rest of my family for another week of relaxation and diving!
reviews.title: Wonderful, chill week in Dahab!

reviews.text:
INMO is the true treasure of beautiful Dahab! 

The entire hotel complex is situated 1 metre away from the Red sea and a gorgeous massive coral reef, perfect for snorkelling. INMO's location between the lively Mashraa street and the sea promenade means a great access to dozens of grocery stores, cafés and restaurants, pharmacies, bike rental shops and bakeries. It takes ca 5-7 minutes to walk to the GoBus, BlueBus and WeBus bus station, or 15 min to the East Delta bus station (regular bus services to (Sharm el Sheikh). 

The atmosphere at INMO is what one needs to relax and rest... and the big size of the complex offers a great choice: either relax by the pool or go onto a nice wooden structure with many comfy chairs and sunbeds. Breakfast is always included and served by the pool by the amazing Rafat, with delicious Egyptian omelette, coffee, fruits and yummy local treats.  You cal always get tasty lunch and dinner at INMO's restaurant. 

The rooms are fantastically comfortable and cosy. The wooden interior design creates a great, natural and relaxing atmosphere. There is a wide variety of rooms with different amenities, so make sure to look into what you book. The rooms are cleaned every single day and the bed sheets are changed regularly, you don't even need to as for it. The cleaning is very thorough and the hygiene standards are high! 

Overall, highly recommended! The owners and their family are phenomenal people, too. Always caring and ready to help. AND be ready to meet many gorgeous cats!
reviews.title: Dahab's treasure

owner_response.text: Thanks a lot, noseas, for your nice comment. Always welcome again
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Not the most luxurious hotel - beds could be better - but we had a wonderfull time. Staff is very friendly and they have great dive-guides. For Egyptian standaard is pretty clean, although I had to get used to seeing cats in the restaurant. And now we miss them ;) The location of this hotel is absolutely awsome. Right on the beach, you can see the sea when you have breakfast. Sufficient place to dry & store your dive-gear. Very close to shops and plenty restaurants & bars. Dahab has a very lively boulevard, but this hotel is just so relaxed! And you will love the exotic building-style there. We are already planning another trip there!
reviews.title: Very friendly, very relaxed

reviews.text: I stayed with some friends in Dahab at Inmo Divers for some relaxed diving in the Gulf of Aqaba. We booked 2 double fancy backpackers rooms for a week.The hotel is quiet but on walking distance from the center so you have the best of both worlds. The dive center was rather busy with 5 groups of divers leaving every morning. Excellent service and very friendly staff compensate for the little bit outdated infrastructure. The restaurant serves local dishes at a reasonable price. We believe that at Inmo you get the most bang for the money in Dahab.
reviews.title: One week of no stress diving with friends

reviews.text: We stayed there for a few days and we really enjoyed a lot. The stuff at the hotel, restaurant as well as the diving center are very friendly, flexible and relaxed. The atmophere was very good. We also met a lot of nice people there!

reviews.text: The Bedouin lodge is tied to the dive centre on the sea front with a wonderful relaxing view of the Bay of Aqaba and Saudi Arabian mountains in the distance. The room is clean and air conditioned and just a few steps from the dive centre and restaurant. I have visited a number of times for diving and each time has been fantastic , always with new sites to explore and excellent dive guides. For me it feels like a second home as the staff are so friendly and really go out of their way to make your stay as wonderful and stress free as possible.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money and such a lovely, genuine group of people in attendance!

reviews.text:
I made the reservation through Bedouin Divers, the dive center attached to the lodge, and they also arranged for my transfer from and to the airport.
The lodge is in the perfect location, as it it not exactly in the busy center which can be reached by ten minutes walking, and it is near the end of the beach strip, so a little more tranquil and can reach the lagoon by 10-15 minutes on the bicycle. Just outside the lodge there is everything: markets, bakery, bicycle rental, food.
My room was spacious. Yes, it could use some maintenance on some details, but everything worked. It even has air conditioning, a small balcony, a refrigerator and a closet. The room rate was very affordable and it included breakfast and my very own room cat. This sweet cat was dedicated to keeping me company.
The restaurant has one of the nicest terraces on the strip. The atmosphere is really chill, with lots of friendly cats, a couple of sweet dogs, beautiful colours, breeze. And of course the food! Everything I had was very good, and the portions are generous (as I found them to be also in other bedouin establishments). But the best part of the Bedouin Lodge are the people, from the reception, to the restaurant, to the owner, to the dive center. Everyone was so nice and accommodating. It was very easy to make myself at home and leaving already wanting to come back.  Thank you for a wonderful stay.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay at the Bedouin Lodge

reviews.text:
The perfect hotel if you're looking for the true Dahab experience and want value for money. We stayed for one week and loved it. The highlights are the service, which is incredible, and the restaurant sitting area, which is beautifully decorated in the traditional Bedouin style and is the perfect place to chill out after a day of diving. The location is ideal too, a 5-minute walk to the town centre but very quiet and relaxing and right by the beach. The people are extremely friendly and everyone went out of their way to make our stay as good as possible, arranging a taxi to and from the airport, letting us check in at night, and planning day trips to tourist sites. We always felt extremely welcome and cared for.

As for the accommodation, we stayed in a double room on the second floor with a balcony and a beautiful Arabic domed ceiling. The room was the perfect size for us, and we loved having the balcony to sit and read in the evenings. If you're looking for a spotlessly clean room then this place probably isn't for you (you might struggle to find that in Dahab anyway), but we didn't mind it so much. After all, with free breakfasts and amazing personal service it's great value for money!

We especially recommend this hotel to anyone going to Dahab for diving. There’s an amazing dive centre (Bedouin Divers Dahab) at the same location, which was so convenient. There’s even a great diving spot right in front of the hotel: we just walked straight into the ocean in our gear!
reviews.title: Amazing service and great value-for-money!

reviews.text:
The bedouin lodge was recommended by some friends of mine. As it should be! First of all the vibe is very relaxed. As soon as you arrive you experience the Egyptian hospitality. You easily feel part of the community because of all the good people there! I went there to learn how to dive at the bedouin divers. If you’re lucky you have Ahmed to teach you. Great teacher, he always reflects calmness and peace of mind, I always felt safe underwater. But it’s as good as a place for non-divers too. Close to the sea, Dahab center, bike rental, shops and the lagoon. 

Pricing is also very good (I’m a backpacker on a budget) but that doesn’t really matter, what matters is that after staying in the bedouin lodge you can call this place a home away from home. Last of all whenever you don’t feel like going out to eat you’re in luck because the food at the bedouin lodge is very good. The Egyptian breakfast is definitely the way to go!
reviews.title: Home away from home

owner_response.text: Hey Mauritzt, we really enjoy reading your review - and we even enjoyed more, having you here as our guest. Just come back soon anytime you feel like. Warm regards from all the Bedouin Lodge & Bedouin Divers Team

reviews.text:
My first time to Egypt was a magical encounter!!

Not sure what to expect, I was taken away by the beauty and hippie charm, Dahab offers. And Bedouin Lodge is the best place to stay! I have met some incredible people and 3 weeks flew by in a heartbeat.

A hidden gem just a short walk away from the hustle and bustle of the town center, offering the most beautiful beach and full moon views whilst relaxing in their outdoor lounge. This place felt like home in a heartbeat, whether that's because of its outstanding food (Saad, best chef in town - hands down!) or the warm welcoming atmosphere and all day smiles from Abu Shadi. 

The rooms are basic but nice and clean so def great value for money. And if there is something missing or you want to book a trip other than diving, Mohammed and Osama will go far and beyond to make it happen. From laundry service to horse back riding, Bedouin nights in the mountains, hiking St. Catherine - nothing that can't be organized.

And then last but not least, if you are a passionate diver - jackpot! The inhouse dive center is run by one of the best and most passionate as well as professional divers I have ever met, taking you to some of the most beautiful dive sites Sinai has to offer.

As you can imagine - I left the Lodge heavy hearted but my next trip is already in the making!!
reviews.title: Best stay in Dahab that was hard to leave!

A recommander sans restriction...

reviews.text:
• My experience was not good at all. 
• I went with my friend in December 2022. We had a double room garden view. 
• First of all the stuff there were not friendly at all and not welcoming. 
• They didn’t check on us at all or asked to help us. 
• The room was okay but the bathroom has a horrible smell. 
• I didn’t notice at first as they added so much air freshener. 
• After our first night they didn’t clean our room and when we asked to clean it. They said the worker left and will clean it in the morning. 
• The room window was on street not the garden as promised. 
• The street was very noisy and they had like arcade games infront of the hotel and it was so loud all night long. 
• So we had to stay an uncomfortable night between the loud noise and the horrible smell. 
• The value for money was not worth it at all. As I payed the same or even less money in way better places in Dahab. 
• I will never go back for there sure.
reviews.title: Not Worth It

reviews.text: I have been here three times and i keep geeting back, very friendly people, very tidy and clean rooms with very good open buffet breakfast, highly recommended if anyone comes to dahab, also good location next to center of markets, but still quiet place. I love coming here.

We stayed in Golden Star Hotel for almost 3 weeks. David and Mohamed will make  sure you have pleasant stay. If you have any problems, thay will try to solve then ASAP.

reviews.text: i feel like a family in this warm, clean environment, right by the sea. Rooms are clean,quiet, safe and secure and nice friendly staff. Minute away from the sea, the shops; the night life, a great value and the perfect place to stay in Dahab!  i stayed ther several time  and i love it
reviews.title: best place for the price

reviews.text:
I had the opportunity to stay in this Hotel in more journeys I did in Sinai and I found people and place very nice and friendly. Every time I go in Golden Star I really feel at home. Prices too are good.
What is most relevant for me is the feeling to be in a little oasis in the desert, where birds comes chatting and cheering up your day!
Try and enjoy the same experience as I did.
reviews.title: Friendly and Clean

reviews.text:
Stayed for nearly 2 weeks here in Dahab May 2012 and loved the place. I had a large room with twin beds, fridge, cupboard, bedside cupboard, dresser, air con, toilet with hot water..check their website. 

The hotel was central, yet quiet, and within 3 mins of the reefs, restaurants, bars and a 24 hr supermarket...oh, and my diving centre, who found me the hotel as part of their special deals ( Poseidon divers).

Mohamed and his staff were very friendly and helpful, and the garden area was great to relax in, have a drink, and catch up on your (free) wifi needs.

Thank you Mohamed and the other staff for an enjoyable stay...I'll be back to your hotel if i ever get back to Dahab.
reviews.title: Central, clean, quiet and great value.

reviews.text: Felt like family in this warm, clean environment, right by the sea. Rooms are clean,quiet, safe and secure and nice friendly staff. Minute away from the sea, the shops; the night life, a great value and the perfect place to stay in Dahab! Would stay there again and hope to do that soon! Americans, Egyptians, all are welcome here!
reviews.title: Perfect place; friendly service, came as a stranger, left as friends

reviews.text: My girlfriend an I stayed for a couple of nights in this hotel : the people who own privately the hotel (mohammed and david : ask for them) are very friendly ; we had a very good stay for the money paid ; for sure this hotel don't have a sea view but the location is in the middle of everything ; the rooms are clean, simple and there is a "center" in the middle of the hotel where you always find someone else to talk with if you'd like to
reviews.title: a very good value hotel with a friendly service

reviews.text: Все понравилось, еда вкусная много разнообразия, фрукты овощи! С морем все в порядке, единственное что нет места и захода для детей! Погода радовала, в это время не особо жарко, но защитными средствами нужно запасаться в любом случае! На баре ребята молодцы, вежливый персонал! Хороший менеджер в этом отеле также! Все понравилось, вернёмся сюда ещё раз!))

Nos hicieron muy buen precio, visitamos todos los hoteles económicos de dahab, y este además de ser el más barato, fue el que mejor estaba la habitación. El dia q nos íbamos nos dejaron la habitación hasta las 21:00 horas sin cobrarnos ese dia.
Cuando vuelva a dahab volveré a este hotel sin pensarlo. Altamente recomendable

reviews.text: If you're looking for a place that has great service and takes excellent care of their customers, this spot has you covered. It is a small location in the center town of Dahab. The rooms have AC, toilets and a shower. Depending on the room it's either one bed or two twin size beds. If you're a traveler looking for amenities and all that this might not be your spot but if you're someone who just needs a bed for sleep, GREAT service and a beautiful view, Said (General Manager) and his staff have you covered. They put together an incredible wedding on the beach with music and food. It'd be five stars if the rooms were bigger but again, the service and hospitality is TOP NOTCH.

reviews.text: The Amanda Hotel made our first trip to Dahab amazing. Said, the manager, was incredibly friendly and helpful. We attended a wedding here and they went out of their way to make it a memorable event.  This is a great place place for a young couple on a budget.

reviews.text: We stayed a week here after 2 weeks traveling around other parts of Egypt with our family.  It was a perfect location away from the main 'hub' of town,  but only a few minutes walk from everything you need. The 'Residence' side of Christinas is a bit run down, but our family room was spacious and clean. Breakfasts at the main hotel were excellent, my children looked forward to them each morning. We ate dinner at the hotel restaurant a few times which was also delicious and good value. There's so much to do in Dahab with older children (snorkeling, sand boarding, camel riding, canyoning), and prices were very reasonable  (coming to Egypt with $US). Highly recommend for families if you need good value for money in a small and friendly beach town.
reviews.title: Great staff and location

reviews.text:
Been here a few times for lunch & once for breakfast. Ordered Calamari, Steak with Butter and the Egyptian breakfast. All were very good. Since there's not a lot of tourist nowadays in Dahab, you need to go to the reception area and ask for the waiter so they can serve you. The breakfast was around 40 Egyptian pounds, Steak was 75 EGP and the calamari was 65 EGP. They also serve alcohol. 

I'm rating the restaurant and not the hotel.
reviews.title: Great restaurant!

reviews.text:
I stayed at christina hotel Dahab earlier this year, my first trip to Dahab.
So happy with this great hotel, with such good value for money, with comfortable rooms, perfect beds ( firm and supporting but not hard ) and no nighttime noise so great sleep quality. Room attended when required. The hotel pooli is ideal size - for just dips or doing laps for fitness. The hotel food is great and very flexible to meet your food requirements. By no means least I should praise the great staff, always helpful and friendly and willing to help and advise any request.
 I was combining a holiday with post operation re hab after knee surgery with an extended stay over a number of weeks- the price reducing the longer the stay - just call the manager to discuss this as you plan your holiday and budget. Everything you need for your holiday is close by. So please support the local people and choose Christina hotel with confidence.
reviews.title: Great Hotel with great staff

reviews.text: We always stay at Christina Residence when in Dahab. Across the road from the main hotel it is reasonably priced but gives you access to luxuries like a pool and good breakfast. Would always recommend the place. Although basic the rooms are clean and of a good size.
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.text:
First off, there are 3 separate types of rooms at the Christina: the Residence, the Pool and the Beach Palace. My review is for the Pool rooms only. Based on the website, these rooms are all different with different fee structures. Christina Pool is right in the middle. I would definitely call this a budget price but not a budget feel. I'm a foreigner (American teacher in Cairo) but I reside in Egypt, so I inquired about a different rate and I got it!  Yay for me! The room is quite large for a single, though my bed is a double. The bathroom is also large with a nice sized vanity area. There is adequate room for clothes, and all your personal belongings. Oh and there are lots of outlets to charge up all your electronic gear and gizmos. The room does not have a tv, but do you really need one?  But there is a small fridge for soda, juices, yogurt, etc. And the wifi in the room is free and fast! It always amazes me how upscale, luxury hotels always charge for wifi. My room had a pool view, and is on the first floor (I'm used to thinking second floor).  There is a breakfast buffet included...it's simple, but I don't need a big breakfast: rolls, croissants, fresh fruit salad, eggs, and a few other dishes. There was also fresh, cold karkada (hibiscus tea)...it's sweet, and cold and yummy. Since this is budget, please note to bring your own shower necessities. A small soap and shampoo packets were provided. If you don't bring any, no worries, there are enough pharmacies and markets to get what you need, just steps out of the hotel. Also, no hairdryer in room. While there is a safe in the room, it's not large enough to stash electronics.  There was also no hot water kettle or a few packets of tea or Nescafe. This isn't a huge deal breaker though. The bed and bedding might be the ONLY negative. But it wasn't a bother to me, I just thought I'd better share this. The bed is firm, again, not a problem for me. The sheets, while clean, were a little rough, though the pillow cases felt nice and cool. Speaking of cool, the room has a/c which is a BIG PLUS!  Some type of mattress pad between sheet and mattress would have been nice, but still not a big problem. I just thought it would be best to post the particulars. 
The location is excellent. If you leave the grounds by the pool area, this will take you to the beach and along the Corniche which has countless shops and restaurants. If you leave by the lobby, this is really the village side parallel to the Corniche. This side will also take you to the souk/marketplace and loops right back to the sea side. It's lively and colorful and yes, the business owners want your money. Tourism is down. Just be polite, say "no thank you," or "later" and walk on. They do take it quite well...but they will also remember you!
The staff at the Christina are warm, and helpful as well without being ingratiating. 
Dahab is my favorite place in Egypt. I've been to two hotels in Dahab and the Christina is by far my favorite of the two.
reviews.title: Budget Price, but VERY NICE!

reviews.text:
This small, perfectly located hotel is clean, cozy, and boasts a beautiful pool and rooftop chill area. Staff is kind, friendly and eager to help. Mr Magdi and Maria are wonderful! Free coffee, tea, water & juice are a lovely bonus.

reviews.text:
We went for Christmas and New year in Dahab. We were with 8 people so we rented 2 apartments in 3D house. If you rent 2 apartments it is much cheaper then staying in a hotel, plus you have more privacy and a nice living room for entertaining with friends. 

The location is absolutely perfect and we made good use of the outside space. The apartment was clean and everything we needed was in there. Hot shower, good wifi which was very important. 

Dahab is a beautiful place and I hope we can come back. I will definitely book an apartment in 3D house again!

reviews.text:

Clean, new, cozy. Will recommend it to my colleagues
reviews.title: apartment  Perfect location

location.address: Al Fanar street Franks Road, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text:
DownTown Dahab hotel is located right in front of the water. It is in the middle of everything in Dahab. There are grocery stores, restaurants, shops all around the hotels but yet it is quiet inside the hotel. The exterior of the hotel has a theme of a ship with a sailing mast. The view from the hotel top floor is breathtaking. You can see the entire bay of Dahab from the roof top. There is a sitting area in the very front of the 2nd floor overlooking the street and the bay. It has some soft and conformable chairs and sofas to enjoy the view.

This hotels is a small boutique hotel with less than 15 rooms so each guest gets a very focused attention from the staff. The rooms are not that small. It is adequate for 2 people and is clean. The beds are comfortable and the beddings are clean. Each room has air-conditioning, closet, refrigerator and a TV. The windows are not properly seals but that is not a big issue because it hardy ever rains in Dahab. They are currently renovating the hotel and is currently expanding to a slightly bigger hotel. They are adding a new swimming pool in the back plus if not mistaken about 10-12 more rooms. 

The hotel staff is one of the best I have seen in a long time. They are absolutely super friendly and super super nice. Being a small hotel if you ask anything to one of the staff members then everyone knows about it and therefore things are done a lot faster. The hotel employees will go beyond the normal steps to ensure that every guests are happy and satisfied. During our stay we were dealing with Sahab, he has an excellent attitude of hospitality and customer service. His vision and expertise of helping the customers is a very important and valuable asset for the hotel. 

The restaurant is located just in-front of the hotel across the street over looking the bay. Every day there are various breakfast options which are all very delicious and healthy. The sitting area is just over the water so you can see the water below. 

I would say this this is an excellent hotel in my opinion but one advise to every one is that Dahab by its nature is neither similar to Sharm el Sheikh nor to Hurghada or Cairo. So the level of quality of the hotels cannot be justified by comparing with the ones in other larger cities. Dahab is a very laid back mellow village and so are its inhabitants. You can not expect the same level of a 5 star hotel in Dahab compared to other modern cities. 

Over all the hotel is absolutely fantastic, when the renovation and expansion is fisnihed I believe it will be one of the best hotels in the city center. Most importantly the employees are the best and so I give this hotel a 5 star review.
reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic Location and Extremely Friendly Hotel Staff

reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay at Downtown, the place was in the middle of the turistic walkway, surrounded by restaurants, cafes, and souvenir shops. The staff was very friendly and extremely accommodating, especially the receptionist Shehab. The rooms were fairly clean and there were different options for breakfast all very filling. The only downside was that the weather was a bit too cold for us to go swimming so we definitely look forward to coming back when it's gets a bit warmer.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text:
What a joy it was to stay here. We will definitely come back one day.

The communication with Rochelle beforehand in the booking proces was smooth, and the caretaker, Amr, is always helpful and available, either in person or by Whatsapp.

Red Rock Apartments is located a 20 minute walk from the town center. We rented bikes there, so we could get around quicker with ease. A lot of people use bikes in Dahab, and you can make the trip from the southern part (Laguna Beach) to the north (Red Rock Apartments) in about half an hour.

There are four apartments, so a lot of the time you have the whole place for yourself. The pool is huge, our apartment had e v e r y t h i n g we needed, and it is also suited for longer stays. Cooking facilities, a huge fridge, a freezer, microwave, an oven, a washing machine, dishwasher, even a Nespresso machine. The interior decor is also very, very tasteful. 

The roof terrace is a bliss. There's a jacuzzi and plenty of opportunities to enjoy a 360 view of the surroundings. We loved kicking back during the evening listening to the sounds of the city. People walking by on the street below laughing or arguing, a barking dog, a waiter dropping a plate, the nearby ocean - the atmosphere here has middle east written all over it, since Red Rock Apartments isn't situated in the more touristy part of Dahab. So you feel you live amongst the locals.

There are plenty of local restaurants and small supermarkets nearby. The well reviewed Ralphs' German Bakery is also close by, if you opt for a more traditional western breakfast.
reviews.title: An oasis within an oasis

owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your amazing review Zeki, you’ve really summed up the essence of Red Rock & it’s surroundings & we’re so happy to hear you loved your stay in Dahab.
I hope you’ll return at some point in the near future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
The place is amazing. Very clean. Kitchenware is decent. Quiet neighborhood. Very nice pool that is somehow always warm. 
Our host, David, was always available and made things very easy.

reviews.text:
We arrived at the David Hotel and immediately felt wonderful and fun
The hotel is Irish-inspired and the entrance has a huge and luxurious pool with clean water. The apartment is very spacious and luxurious and contains everything a family needs to spend a few days there.
There is a huge, luxurious bathroom with a stream of mascara. Fridge and freezer, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave, huge cooking gas, kettle for ovens and basic cooking utensils.
The apartment with a strong air conditioner in the rooms, the living room has a slightly weak air conditioner. The apartment does cool, but as soon as you open the door you feel warm. The apartment has an attic for a fun corner for hookah and barbecue, as well as a hot tub. The atmosphere itself is very pleasant, which is what the hotel owner David and immediately get
The apartment itself in the area is very rested, with an amazing beach suitable for diving, very close to the city 
and the market
In conclusion,
Highly recommended hotel
Excellent ratio
I'm sure I'll be back
It is very useful to pre-arrange according to the season that the hotel is always occupied
reviews.title: Great place, service, atmosphere and location

owner_response.text: So glad you enjoyed your time at Red Rock. The apartments are perfect for families & you and your family are welcome back anytime. David was very happy to have met you. Thanks very much for the great review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Everything about this place was perfect - starting from the communication with Rochelle, the trip management, the place itself. Its very peaceful, the street is well lit at night, so it looks charming both during the night as well as the day. Apartment is equipped with everything one may need, but even if any extras come to mind or unexpected situations appear, manager Amr is there for it all. There was a welcome kit which helped a lot as the transfer times were crazy late. Views from the roof are mind boggling. Our stay in this lovely place made the whole experience very special, we came for the family get together, and we had the best time. A true gem in Dahabs diverse but yet very specific apartments offer. Thank you!
