reviews.text: Last year we stayed in Red Rock Apartments for 2 weeks with 2 families. It was amazing! Beautiful apartment, amazing rooftop and great pool. Upon arrival there was food and water in the fridge and a baby bed for our little girl. The area where the apartment is situated is quit, but still near to all facilities. Also walking distance to the beach. All in all we had a great time and we would love to come back one day.
reviews.title: Amazing!

owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your lovely review of Red Rock, so good to hear it was such a great experience for you all! We really hope you will come back to stay in the very near future!
Kind regards from the Red Rock Team
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Wonderful, comfortable apartments, with a great swimming pool and a fantastic view. Great to stay by the pool and relax but also in a good location to go and explore the rest of the city. the staff are incredibly friendly and will help you make the most of your holiday.
reviews.title: Fantastic place, amazing people

owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your great review, so happy to hear you loved your stay at Red Rock & we really hope to see you back again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Stayed for a week with a few friends to do dive courses. lovely apartments with rooftop and banging views. 20 second walk to the beach and only 2 mins cab into town centre. lovely pool also. would 100% recommend,
reviews.title: Great apartments

owner_response.text: Thanks so much for your great review, we’re so happy to hear you loved your time at Red Rock. Come back & stay again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
I had the pleasure to stay for 10 days. The appointment large clean very well furnished. Kitchen has all the required equipment for cooking.  The master bedroom and bathroom very large and nice. Daved and Marwan  where very friendly and helpful. We left as friends. If you are looking for the best accommodation  in Dahab this the place.  Diving with Reef 2000 excellent experience and safe staff is made my trip enjoyable relaxing and fun 
Bu Faisal from Kuwait
reviews.title: Red Rock Apartments exceptional place and people

owner_response.text:
Thank you very much for your wonderful review, we are so happy you enjoyed your stay at Red Rock. From start to finish you were the most polite & easy guest to liaise with, we really hope you will come back again as soon as possible!
Best regards
Rochelle, David & Maruan
owner_response.title: Owner Response

location.address: Beach Street, Zarnoug El Assalah, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text:
Absolutely fantastic!
Thomas and the team make this lovely place a home away from home.
The rooms are very spacious and well kept, pool area is inviting and comfortable.
The hospitality, caring and big heart of Thomas making Casa D'or a place to return to.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

reviews.text: We stayed at Casa d’Or for 3 nights including New Years’ Eve and had an overall positive experience. The owner and host, Thomas, is extremely friendly – he makes his guests feel like they are being welcomed into his home. He served us fresh orange juice on arrival, cooked up dinner and shared many drinks with us on New Years’ Eve, helped us schedule transportation from the hotel, and was able to collect our laundry when we were away from the property. That said, the hotel leaves a lot to be desired. It is seemingly a passion project built by the owner and is run more like a guesthouse than a hotel. For instance, the design is unique and incohesive, though it may appeal to others. There is no formal reception, we just interacted with Thomas via Whatsapp prior to arrival. The hotel is tucked away from the main strip of Dahab and there is no road leading to the property, which made it confusing for our taxi driver to find. Because it is situated a ways from the main road, there isn’t much of a view from the hotel, just desert and construction sites. Finally, we had some issues with the room itself such as dusty floors on arrival and no hot water for 3 days. Overall, the host made our stay very enjoyable by making the experience personal instead of purely transactional but without Thomas, I don’t think we would recommend the place.
reviews.title: Unmatched hospitality but has issues

reviews.text:
We loooved staying at Casa d’Or. I mean, you truly feel like you are in a fairytale, the house is just sooooo magical! As well as the rooms, they are super spacious and beautiful. 
Also, the team working there is so truly welcoming, especially the amazing Dina!! These guys will make sure your stay will be amazing, that’s for sure. They truly put their heart into their work snd business and you can really feel it.
The breakfast was really lovely and generous, and the diving program they helped us signing up for was really good!
I can’t wait to come back. Dahab is such a special place and staying at Casa d’Or  will make it even more special!! Thank you again for the wonderful hospitality and this amazing hotel that you have built up!
reviews.title: Making the fairytale come true!

reviews.text:
Astonishing hospitality. Impressive style. Firm standards. High hopes. Homey atmosphere. Unblended silence in the night. Wonderful stay. Will be back. 
P.S. Thomas, you are really exceptional host, thank you 🙏
reviews.title: A stay full of wonders ♥️

reviews.text:
I recently stayed at Casa D’OR for just over 10 days. I must say that this is one of the best boutique hotel experiences I’ve had hands-down. The owner was absolutely incredible. I felt like I was staying at a A world famous Hotel. Every single thing that we wanted was organized and there was just nothing that  the Casa D’OR team would not do for us. I loved the bedrooms they were spacious and modern. Exterior was great too, we spent many days by the swimming pool bathing in the warm Egyptian sun. The breakfast was crazy. Every morning the owner and his team would rustle up a delicious homemade breakfast.
When it comes to diving this is the spot. Thomas (the owner) took us out two to three times a day, held our hands all the way. I don’t think you could ever have a better dive master than Thomas. We felt so safe deep under and had the best time of our life.
 I am now proud to say I have my Open Water license. It’s just crazy out there. You stick your head under the water with a mask and it feels like you’ve suddenly arrived in paradise.
So to conclude an excellent hotel with superb service and one of the best hosts I’ve experienced. Diving I believe speaks for itself in Dahab!
reviews.title: The host with the most...

reviews.text:
I have stayed in Casa D’or Dahab from 8th of October 2020 till 10th of October.
It was my first trip to Dahab, and I was very lucky to find such a nice and comfortable hotel, it was a holiday period most of the hotel was fully booked.
From the minute I arrived, I felt so welcomed, the hotel has a unique style that made me feel in my own home.
Room are very clean, very good shower free WiFi, smart TV and view of the pool and the mountains.
The hotel team are very helpful and they can get you anything that you want.
The hotel is very well located, just few minutes walking and you are in the heart of Dahab.
This is certainly a hotel to try and it became my best hotel in Dahab.
reviews.title: Hotel like your home

reviews.text: Das schönste Hotel in Dahab! Nahe zum Zentrum und trotzdem sehr ruhig gelegen! Haben uns von Anfang an sehr wohl gefühlt und das Morgenessen war besonders lecker! Thomas, der Hotelbesitzer, hat sich jeden Morgen etwas neues einfallen lassen! Unser Masterroom war wunderschön und kein Wunsch blieb offen! Wir möchten an dieser Stelle Thomas und seinem Team nochmals sehr herzlich danken und falls wir jemals wieder nach Dahab kommen, dann ganz sicher wieder ins Casa d'Or! Shukran!
reviews.title: Gerne wieder!

reviews.text:
Am sehr frühen Morgen angekommen, wurde wir von Thomey herzlich empfangen und bekamen auch gleich unser schönes, geschmackvoll eingerichtetes Zimmer gezeigt. Die gesamte Hotelanlage hat unsere Erwartungen weit übertroffen, wir sind einfach begeistert. Die in den vorherigen Bewertungen genannte familiäre Atmosphäre können wir nur bestätigen, wir fühlten uns nicht als Gäste, sondern wie bei Freunden zu Hause.
Das Frühstück war täglich ein Highlight, super lecker und für jeden Geschmack immer etwas dabei.
Die Tauchplätze wurden von Thomey vorgestellt und entsprechend unseren Wünschen ausgesucht und organisiert. Sollten innerhalb der Tauchgruppe mal unterschiedliche Vorstellungen zu den Tauchgängen bestehen, machen Melanie und Thomey es möglich, auch diese Wünsche zu erfüllen. 
Ich komme gerne wieder.
Jörg
reviews.title: Casa d`Or - einfach ein Traum

reviews.text:
Das Wichtigste vorab: Solltest Du auf der Suche nach einer Unterkunft in Dahab sein, hast Du mit dem Casa d'Or einen Volltreffer gelandet.

Wir waren im Dezember 2019 für 13 Nächte bei Mélanie und Thomas, den Gründern und Gastgebern des Casa d'Or zu Hause. Bereits bei der Buchung konnten wir individuelle Wünsche für unseren Aufenthalt äußern. Um diese zu erfüllen, setzte Thomas erfolgreich alle verfügbaren Hebel für uns in Bewegung und führte uns sicher zu den besten Unterwasser Hotspots im Roten Meer. Durch seine professionelle Ausbildung und jahrelange Erfahrung war jeder Tauchgang, ob von Land oder vom Privatboot ein großes Vergnügen :) 

Das Hotel wurde erst dieses Jahr nach den Wünschen von Mélanie und Thomas erbaut und ist daher super modern und hat eine tolle persönliche Note. Unser Zimmer war sehr sauber und wurde jeden Tag vom Staff aufgeräumt und gereinigt. Ob am Pool, auf der Dachterasse oder in der offenen Küche, überall kann man gemütlich zusammensitzen und bis tief in die Nacht Spiele spielen und Mélanies Drinks genießen.
Das Frühstück ist wie bei einer großen Familie: Man steht auf wenn man zum Tauchen los will oder wann man eben einfach wach ist und bekommt super leckeren Kaffee. Wenn alle da sind, serviert Mélanie mit ihrem Team das vielfältige Frühstück, bei dem man sich perfekt für lange Tauchtage stärken kann.

Trotz der familiären Atmosphäre kommt die Privatsphäre nicht zu kurz. Man kann sich auch Essen aufs Zimmer liefern lassen und den Abend vor dem Netflix-fähigen Fernseher ausklingen lassen. Zum Ausgehen, ob zusammen oder alleine haben Thomas und Mélanie immer eine guten Tipp und bestellen auch gerne ein Taxi, falls nötig.

Danke für die tolle Zeit! Für uns seid ihr mehr als die Eigentümer des Hotels in Dahab in dem wir unseren Urlaub 2019 verbracht haben!
reviews.title: Der Name ist Programm!

reviews.text:
Im Casa D'or fühlt man sich gleich wohl. Auch wenn man mitten in der Nacht ankommt, wird man von den Gastgebern Mélanie und Thomas herzlich empfangen. Da das Casa nur 8 Zimmer hat, besteht eine familiäre Athmosphäre. So wird individuell auf die Wünsche der Gäste eingegangen und die Mitarbeitenden sind bei diversen Belangen hilflich. Die geschmackvoll eingerichteten Zimmer werden täglich gereinigt und die Minibar mit den gewünschten Getränken aufgefüllt.

Das Casa D’or liegt etwas abseits des Zentrums, wodurch es auch für Ruhesuchende geeignet ist. Denoch ist man in ca. 5 Minuten zu Fuss am der Strandpromenade mit zahlreichen Shops und Restaurants.

Es gibt keine fixen Frühstückzeiten, das leckere Frühstück wird nach vorabendlicher Absprache serviert oder einfach wenn du aufstehst, auch wenn es bereits Nachmittag ist. Zum Nachtessen sind wir entweder mit Mélanie und Thomas in eines der Restaurants an der Strandpromenade gegangen oder haben Essen ins Casa bestellt. Dabei konnten wir von den Empfehlungen unserer Gastgeber profitieren und haben immer gut gegessen.

Das Tauchen läuft auch sehr flexibel und unkompliziert ab. Wir haben jeweils am Vortag mit Thomas besprochen wer wann wo tauchen geht und er hat alles organiasiert. Ein Taxi holte uns zur vereinbarten Zeit ab, dann wurden die Tanks an einer Tauchbasis geholt und ab gings zum Tauchplatz. Nach dem Tauchen wurde unser Equipmen vom Staff im Casa D’or gereinigt und dort zum trocknen gelagert. Zum Service gehört auch eine komplette Reinigung des Equipment vor der Heimreise, so dass die Sachen zuhause einfach wieder verstaut werden können.

Ich kann das Casa D’or wärmstens weiterempfehlen. Mélanie und Thomas machen den Urlaub mit ihrer herzlichen humorvollen Art zu einem echten Erlebnis. Auch Taucheinsteiger sind hier gut aufgehoben. Als leidenschaftlicher Taucher und erfahrener Instruktor führt Thomas die Tauchkurse mit viel Herzblut durch. Wir haben im Casa D’or ein zweites Zuhause gefunden und kommen auf jeden Fall wieder 😊
reviews.title: Klein aber oho - in den Ferien zuhause

location.address: Peace Rd. El Mashraba, Dahab 46617 Egypt

name: Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
We were really happy staying at this beautiful place. Very friendly neighbors,and all stuff became our friends. We felt like home in Canyon. We had an excellent time in the evenings cooking “batata”, and smoking shisha. Our lovely apartment with all equipment was great, thank you for the owner;)
We learnt free diving with our neighbors who are also professional trainers for free diving,kiting,etc. We tasted real Italian pasta and pancakes in the restaraunt. We did yoga by seaside. 
Thank you,Canyon Estate. 
We will come back for sure! 10/10!
reviews.title: It’s like our new home ;)

reviews.text: When we arrived we were very impressed of this awesome place, we didnt set out expectations high, as its a natural place, but if you want just run away and found a quite place you are here one the right place. There is no luxus, the room condition is very good, everything is clean, there is a small kitchen where u will find plates, kettles, cans and pan. The place it self is done with lots of love to details, just a place to take energy and relax.the food in the restaurant is also very tasty. We enoyed it so much. Cant understand if someone could complain from here, as even everybody is very kind, polite and try to make you happy.
reviews.title: Wonderful place

locations.name: Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence

reviews.text: With full honest , the hotel is the best in dahab , location is just perfect , more than delicious and very healthy food , beach is wonderful , rooms is more than expected , cleaned , it's facilities always working well , more than professional staff , recommended by one thousand percent , will come again for sure
reviews.title: Best hotel in dahab

locations.name: Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence

reviews.text:
It's a calm place, looks nice outside, close to the beach and with cool swimming pool.
However our room was terrible. First when we came, the beds weren't even done, even though it was 5:30 pm. There was only one thick cover. But the worst was yet to come. We killed at least 30 mosquitoes, just to realize there is a HOLE ABOVE THE DOOR! So the mosquitoes just kept coming all the time and there was no way of sleeping with them trying to bite us every 2 seconds.
reviews.title: Hole above the door, sleeping with 30 mosquitoes

locations.name: Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence

reviews.text:
I am a free diver and I was looking to spend a vacation near the sea.
I found this great place in the Canyon State, the calm I found and its proximity to my favorite Blue Hole diving spot. The professional management of Muhammad Buta is truly hospitable to the very limits and also the employees are at your service anytime. I spent a whole month and will be back next year. Thank you Canyon State
reviews.title: It was really best holiday for me ever

reviews.text: The place is nice but staff isn’t welcoming and the doors wouldn’t lock . They said they’d send a locksmith to check it out , no one came . Doors can be opened with other room keys so totally unsafe . Owner and staff have trouble understanding guests and they don’t really have much of a reservation system . Also sheets are unclean, we found previous guests hair on them and stains. Lastly there is no wifi as was stated on the site and lots of ants in the room .
reviews.title: Never Staying Here Again

reviews.text: This was our second and last time.staying at Canyon Estate. The customer service is poor at best. The manager Bota doesn't make you feel welcome, in fact he treated us like.second class citizens. The pool was.nice until.it started looking dirty. Another customer asked them to clean it which they did not and by the time we left the pool had turned green in colour. Disgusting. The rooms are getting run down and they supply you with limited linen and towels. They want 8 euros each time to change the sheets or clean the room. They even had a problem with us hanging our clothes to dry on our own lines. On top of all that they charge you extra for electricity . That in itself is not a problem, except they charge nearly quadruple the normal.rate. When we approached the manager ( Bota ) about this he informed me that if you don't like it , we can leave. All in all it has the potential to be a nice place, but for that to happen they will need to refurbish the room increase levels of customer service dramatically , and just be genuinely more nice and approachable. I would Nott recommend booking in to Canyon Estate. You can find much nicer rooms with clean swimming pool.and better customer service in other parts of Dahab
reviews.title: Going downhill

locations.name: Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence

reviews.text: Room was stylish, all is clean, all was working. Pool in front of the beach, beautiful aria around. 3 km from blue hole. We enjoy our visit to this hotel with all our pleasure to owners . And thanks for the small princess who make our day !
reviews.title: Hospitality place

locations.name: Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence
Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence

reviews.text:
Lovely and unique place. Very nice atmosphere with magical view, peaceful, quiet and relaxing. Very nice place to get rid of all husle and enjoy nature. Also perfect spot for diving, snorkeling and kite surfing.
Rooms are clean and staff very friendly and helpful.
Will diffinately come back.
Highly recommended
reviews.title: Wonderful place!

reviews.text:
Simple yet comfortable, located in the nature with direct sea and mountain view, Canyon Estate is the perfect destination to retreat and recharge away from the buzz of the modern day life. 
Whether you are a hiker, trekker, snorkler or a seeker for quieter secluded relaxation - it is the place for you to stay at. 
We will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Retreat and recharge

locations.name: Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence
Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence
Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence
Canyon Estate Dahab Beach Hotel Residence

reviews.text: Very nice hotel, very clean rooms and utilities.. All hygiene measures are considered.. Staff is very nice, friendly and comforting, The place itself is very cozy.. Hotel is close to all shops, restaurants and Cafes.. I very much recommend this hotel..
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.text:
“Everything was great:
- The location is good; quiet and next to the Delta Bus Company Stop that can take you to Sharm.
- in a couple of minutes away you can reach the main street in Dahab with plenty of shops, cafés, restaurants
- In front of the Hotel there is a bike rental store
- The breakfast was big enough and delicious, and every day was slightly different
- The staff is super nice and they are there for you if you need something (Mohammed is a super good guy and helpful)
- The swimming pool is a plus and it is cleaned every morning
- I would indeed go back there in case I am in Dahab
- I felt really at ease at the hotel
- It is very safe down there”

Well done guys, keep it on :)
reviews.title: Excellente accommodation (cosy, helpful staff and good location)

reviews.text: Enjoyed my stay there, rooms are spacious and clean with reasonable prices. The room had a kitchenette with a partition, making it more comfortable to stay in. The water was filtered and not salty at all which is uncommon in dahab. Totally recommend it.
reviews.title: Spacious rooms.

reviews.text: The hotel staff are very friendly and flexible. We actually had to adjust our stay more than once and they were very flexible and understanding. The rooms are clean and practical. The ACs are excellent. The pool was great and they clean it twice a day. We had unlimited access to wifi, huge smart tv, and huge bluetooth speakers. We enjoyed several movie nights and pool parties! It’s located in the heart of Dahab, just a walking distance from Dahab’s main street and everything we need. Also just a 2 minutes walk to the sea. 30 minutes walk to the Lagoona, which is the best beach in Dahab in my opinion. It’s also a 5 minutes walk from the bus station. The prices were super affordable for a group of young adults like us. Amazing experience. Will definitely go again. Totally recommend this place!
reviews.title: Amazing experience!

reviews.text: I really wanted to congratulate you Mohamed Dahab I recommend it! A small hotel in the heart of Dahab where you are greeted with familiarity cleanliness and courtesy bravo bravo we will be back to see you soon heartfelt thanks we stayed 4 days in full relax 🎉🎉🎉Patrizia and Shady from Italy
reviews.title: Wauuu🎉💐 see soon

reviews.text:
Don’t look any further!:) The place has great location (way more quiet than places near pedestrian area), still very close to the anything you may need (markets, restaurants, bars, etc.). 
The room are big, have high ceiling, AC and fridge.
Beds are super comfy with hard pillows - never slept better:).
Pool is being kept in a good condition all the time.
Service is way beyond your expectations and Mohammed is as helpful as your Mum;).
You can communicate in English of course and he knows anything you are interested in.
The place is tidy and secure. 
The rates are affordable and competitive taking into account what you get.
As I wrote in the beginning: don’t look any further - if there are availabilities book and you are all set to explore Dahab and the surroundings!:)
reviews.title: Totally recommend it!:)

reviews.text: Stayed for 11 days really enjoyed my stay. Mohammed is a great host, nothing to much trouble and always genuine concern for my well being and enjoyment. Location great near local top rated restaurants Yum Yum and King Chicken ,shops and supermarkets. Beach is around 5 minutes stroll. Rooms have a/c, hot water,TV, fridge and Mohammed provided a kettle for morning cuppa, many rooms newly decorated. Pool was great and very clean, nice sitting areas to relax. Mohamed arranged trips for me which where excellent and very good value. Really enjoyed my stay came as guest left as friemd
reviews.title: Great Hotel Outstanding Manager

reviews.text:
We stayed for a week. The room was big. It included 2 bed rooms (3 bed + double & single) . It was great for family of 2 girls, 1 boy and parents. The room has nice entrance with minimal kitchen and big fridge. We used the fridge to cool 2 giant mineral water and had supply of cold & fresh water for our stay. 

Muhamed is excellent host. Friendly and helped us a lot to organize activities around Dahab.

The hotel pool is great. The location is 5 min walk from the Lighthouse. We loved the place and hospitality.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel. Muhamed is excellent host.

reviews.text:
i stayed 4 nights with my friend in delta dahab hotel
first the location is exactly in city center of dahab and 3 mins on foot from the bus station
& stuff is decent & friendly and respectful
they helped us with organizing our trips to blue lagoon and blue hole 
and let us stay at the pool to shower and wait for our bus after we checked out 
completely recommend this hotel for all the travelers
reviews.title: best hotel in dahab

reviews.text: The hotel was affordable, clean and the location was great. Mohamed was super accommodating with our needs. Breakfast was delicious and healthy. The pool was a wonderful treat to cool off on hot days and was kept immaculately clean. Will stay here again when I come back to Dahab!
reviews.title: Great hotel in Dahab

reviews.text:
Great service. The hotel is great. The room is practical, clean and nice. The location is difficult to locate for the first time.

The area is still in devolpment.

Because of the devolpment in the area the view is not that great.

Lovely team members.

Hope to visit you soon :)

With love
reviews.title: Great service and quality

reviews.text:
It feels like home but with extra services! 
Clean, cozy, calm, safe for girls , and the staff are very friendly and welcoming, all with reasonable price for the night.

The whole place consists of hotel designed studios with all the needed amenities, with the price of the camps in Dahab.

First we had a problem in reservation but the owner didn’t let us leave without being satisfied and they offered us a free trip just to make sure we’re having a happy stay.
Although the place is a little bit far from center but there is a private car to drive you wherever and whenever you want so we didn’t feel this as disadvantage. Also, the place has a nice pool, swings, good music all day, juices bar and sometimes they make some events like BBQ parties or oriental nights.
reviews.title: A really nice place!

location.address: Cinderella Coumpound Close to Lagona, Dahab 46617 Egypt

name: Star Of Dahab
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: Loved this place. Right by the waterfront, air conditioned rooms, very clean. Friendly staff who went out of their way to help us! Cannot recommend this place enough. The waterfront restaurant is great, and the dive centre is awesome! Our room had a lovely balcony with views of the water!
reviews.title: Fantastic stay, amazing staff, great value!

reviews.text:
- the lighting was poor and many lambs are missing.
- the carpet was dirty and sheets smells bad.
- All booking.com reservations have no view .. only in ground floor & our room balcony was seeing stinky closed backyard between buildings.
- the reception always empty and you have to wait and search everytime for the responsible person.
- Breakfast is repeated, boring with no drinks.
- Many annoying flies will attack you through breakfast outside, as they don't have a fan or even Insecticide.
- They refused to give us a payment receipt as they don't have any system for receipts probably because they doesn't pay taxes. 
- The shower space was such a disaster, no glasses .. only 10 cm hole down, and the water always spread out and of course there is nothing to swipe it with it. The bathroom was always wet and dirty because of that ugly design.
- Wifi is weak in rooms.
reviews.title: Horrible experience

reviews.text:
Good location near the water and close to the stores and restaurants but far enough away to be quiet. 
Spacious, clean rooms with balconies. Bathroom fixtures old but usable.
Breakfast is basic. A choice of either Continental or Egyptian.
Right next to Big Blue diving center. Very convenient.
reviews.title: Basic and clean

reviews.text:
This was a great place to stay in, beautiful location, very friendly and caring staff ask for Ehsan, Gamal and Sayed who will be taking care of you from the moment you enter the hotel till the moment you leave. 
You will feel like you're at home and the rooms are clean and tidy. 

Definitely recommend it.
reviews.title: Great place recommended

reviews.text: The place is so amazing and located directly on the shore. The team is so cooperative ( Jamal and Ehssan are so friendly). The room is clean and the AC is working properly. The TV is good and the food is yummy.
reviews.title: Star of Dahab

reviews.text:
Star of dahab 

I stayed here for 3 nights as I was diving with The Big Blue who are based on the same site as the hotel, which made everything very convenient. 

When I arrived I had a lovely welcome from the staff and was offered a refreshing welcome lemon drink sitting in their beach cafe

My room was typical Egyptian style and was very clean.  I asked for an additional sheet which came quickly and if I wanted the room cleaned daily. The shower pressure was fine for washing but not powerful enough to wash my hair. (However I used a complimentary room at the end of the day and the shower pressure was great so may have just been my room) I used a jug which was fine with me to wash my hair. I had a lovely balcony which directly faced the sea with a table and chairs to sit at. 

The hotel is literally on the sea front - 20 metres from my room. 
They have a Bedouin style cafe/ lounge area where you can have you breakfast looking out onto the sea. 

A simple breakfast is served between 8 and 10am. Omelette, a few
slices of fruit, natural yogurt, toast with jam and honey and a good cup of tea. A big thanks so to Sayed for making me a cup of tea each morning.There is also a comprehensive menu of traditional and European food - I recommend the falafel sandwich. 

A lovely lady called Ashaan was very kind with a beautiful smile. She cleaned my room and refilled any bits I needed. 

She made the most wonderful Mashi (stuff vine leaves) and shared them with me. They were absolutely delicious. You must try them. 

The hotel is a ten minute stroll from the centre of dahab which I loved. You then have the choice to have a busy evening (not that anywhere in dahab is busy). I chose to sit at night on a sunbed outside the hotel cafe listening to the waves with Egyptian music playing in the background reading my book. I couldn’t think of any better way to relax.  I think the distance from the town adds to the charm of the hotel. There is a street at the top of the road where you can eat at different cafes and there is very small supermarket.

I would definitely recommend The Star of Dahab - it gets a thumbs up from me 👍👍👍🤗
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.text: Such a pleasant stay at this hotel, very welcoming and respectful staff, rooms are amazing and so clean, all the services they offer are wonderful and professional, hope to get back there again for such an enjoyable stay.
reviews.title: Pleasant accommodation

reviews.text:
Staying in Star of Dahab during my trip in Ramadan felt like home to me.

The place is very well located. Directly on the Mashraba with capturing view over the sea and a surrounding with all needed facilities made it the perfect place to stay.

The rooms are air conditioned, bed sheets were all clean and periodically changed, overall comfort, hygiene, services, crew were simply a top notch!

The internet connection was a bit erratic but in gusty weather, this was totally understandable.

Big thanks to Mr. Khalid, the owner, and his beautiful family for hosting me and make me feel like home.

Trying this place is fully recommended and a come back is totally guaranteed!
reviews.title: Big family house

reviews.text:
Two friends and I stayed in the spacious family room at Star of Dahab for five days.  Besides exceptional service and staff (shoutout to Sayid!), this place has the added benefit of being right next to Big Blue Dahab where we did scuba diving.  There were lots of restaurants in the area and a more bustling town area just a 5-10 minute walk away.  Had the smoothies and Egyptian breakfast everyday. 

The location was great for diving and it was super safe - you could set your belongings down and come back to it later (which is helpful when diving).  Lots of friendly and healthy cats and dogs in the area too.

As an anecdote to the exceptional service and safety in the area - I lost my wallet two hours before when we were supposed to leave.  Sayid from Star of Dahab as well as the staff of Big Blue Dahab went above and beyond to track it down, making calls and looking through security footage.  It turns out that it had fallen out of my pocket and someone turned it in (money and cards in-tact) to the local police station.  Not so sure you'd see a happy ending like this at any other city.
reviews.title: Great room and location

reviews.text: Star of Dahab is a pretty basic hotel. Offers decent value for money. The hotel is very quiet, probably because of its distance from the city center, but it's by the sea, and while I don't think it offers any rooms with sea view (Not sure), it does offer breakfast by the beach, etc.
reviews.title: Basic

location.address: Al Mashrabah Street South Sinai Governorate, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text: It is very well located at the center of the light house it’s new and very clean, it has a decent swimming pool with really nice seatings around it. The rooms are small so I don’t advice it for double. I took the double room for myself which was barley fitting
reviews.title: Our new year was different

reviews.text:
Great small hotel on the main street in Dahab. You can't get more central than this!  Staff is very friendly and the next door diving center (Sea Dancer) is great. 
Enjoyed my stay there and the beach access just across the street.
reviews.title: Cozy and great located Hotel

reviews.text:
كنت في المكان من فتره بصراحه مكان مميز جدا بسبب موقعه وشكلو حلو جدا غرف كويسه جدا في. حمام سباحه وقعده بدوي وغير كدا في خدمات ممتازه جدا
احب اشكر المكان 
وشكرا خاص جداللرسيبشن استاذه ساره  استاذه محترمه وبتساعد بطريقه كويسه 
واكيد هاجي تاني في. اقرب وقت
reviews.title: مكان متواضع ومحترم والاستف محترم.

reviews.text: Amazing clean place for travelers great location close to almost everything in Dahab. Mr Trbouche is an amazing host always offering help and directions if you’re new to the city. Very friendly safe neighborhood and good vibes. Cheers
reviews.title: Would definitely come back.

reviews.text:
We so enjoyed our stay in Dahab, but staying in Tarbouche house made our stay truly wonderful. 
The room was nicely decorated and spotless. We had a comfy bed, nice hot shower and a fridge and kettle. There was a basket with fruits and a bottle of water for us upon arrival.
Location is just perfect. Close to all the excitement and snorkelspots but also easy to go for a walk to the less busy areas. At night we couldn't hear any noise so a good nights rest was guaranteed after full days of activities.
Yasser and his wife were always there to help. Whatever question we had, they were there to respond to us. There is only one thing we regret and that is that we couldn't stay any longer...but we'll be back for sure! 
Future guests...don't hesitate twice to book this place. You'll have an amazing stay!
reviews.title: Best hosts ever!!!

reviews.text: I Really Recommend this awesome place, I stayed there 3 weeks. awesome place with awesome people. Very clean and modern Rooms. it's in city center beside the sea, diving poitnts, bazaars and restaurants
reviews.title: I Really Recommend this awesome place

reviews.text:
Chambre spacieuse et très propre , Yasser et sa femme sont vraiment gentils et  "aux petits soins" si besoin d infos ou autre ... nous devions rester 3 j ,nous sommes restés 10 :) 
Hotel à 2mins à pieds de la playa bref au top !!! 
Nous reviendrons avec plaisir :)
reviews.title: Top :)

location.address: Al Fanar Str. Center of Masbat Bay, Dahab Egypt

reviews.text:
Room is clean & tidy, location is good. Staff is helpful. But not all items listed in the room description on booking.com were actually available  sad  😞 😔 😕. Loud DJ  from the Villa's rooftop was very annoying.
Special thanks to chef Maher & his assistant Hamada, who made yummy pancake, and chef Maher was kind enough to share his pancake recipe with me.  
We had a nice stay  @Villa 22.
#Dahab#villa 22#
reviews.title: Villa 22 ...a nice spot in Dahab

photos.caption: Pancakes at villa22, Dahab, by Chef Mahet 👨‍🍳 😋 👌

reviews.text: Wonderful place with wonderful people. Great home base for all trips or even remote work. The terrace is amazing and the whole atmosphere very chilled and relaxed. Helpful friendly staff. Clean rooms. Best bedroom ever (with balcony). Close to everything that is important.
reviews.title: Best bedroom

location.address: El Mamsha El Tourist Street, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text:
The room was nice and clean and bathroom also.
It had an Air conditioner and that helped much and scenic views of the mountains.
Very friendly staff and excellent service!
A lot of convenience store and eating places nearby. 
It was my 1st stay in this hotel and i’m 100% happy
reviews.title: Very nice experience

reviews.text:
Hotel pequeño y cómodo a pie de la playa y cerca a todo personal amable. Habitaciónes cómodos con buen aire condicionado  y bastante limpio para Egipto.
Piscina bonita y limpia
En total vale la pena Seguro volveré
reviews.title: Hotel pequeño y cómodo

location.address: El Fanar Street Building 16744, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text:
VERY CLEAND And very simple and all staff are gentle .breakfast are open buffet .
swimming pool clean .rooms very quite and clean .i advice any one going to dahab visit dahab holiday .also they have trip desk.
reviews.title: QUITE

name: Lagona Dahab Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: I’ve been many times at the Lagona in the past. The first was in 1996! It has always been a Spartan hotel but in any case clean, with the staff very cooperative. Not anymore now. Either the rooms and the location is very dirty. Nobody cleaning. The manager is not managing anything. You ask several times to make up the room and nobody comes. At breakfast they don’t serve any tea or coffe. You have to pay them apart. According the reception breakfast start at 8.00am but, in reality never before 8.30 and after 30 minutes everything is finished. Outside it is full of rubbish and scrap. It is a pity because was really nice place. Anyway, in future, I will not come anymore here.
reviews.title: Decay of a hotel

reviews.text:
Nice hotel with a very friendly staff and wonders 
Food was not a perfect but it was a do
Rooms are clean 
Pool is nice
Rock beach but u can go easily to the lagona beach next to it
I loved its location, so close to the lagona beach and the center of the city also
reviews.title: Good location and clean rooms

reviews.text:
I would like to thank all hotel team for their hospitality specially Mr.Ahmed and the uniqueness Mrs.Sarah.
I really enjoyed my time there ,one of the best hotels that won’t let u go out, there are amazing view ... see and mountains and one minute walk by the see to be on with the most famous and fabulous sight seeing (Lagona) also 20 minuets walk by the see to be in famous street bazaars and restaurant (Al-Masharaba) or 5mint by car or 10mint by bicycle.also u can stayed their there are a supermarket and they helped u to deliver for any restaurants.plz contact with the office if u wanna organiz any trip not the fake trip u get nowadays.
In night at the beach it’s amazing stars view and clearly Milky Way its quite place and there are a night guard so take a safety nap time.
The room are special clean and quiet it’s built by Hassan Fathy architecture with different vibes it orders helps to relax its awesome to be under dome.
Don’t worry about traveling alone because with them u can easily sense evolved privacy and respect . 
Highly Recommendations for families , girls and grooms. 
Really they are over expectations.. keep going 💙💙💙
reviews.title: Different hospitality

reviews.text: It is a good place if you are looking for cheap place and meeting the minimum cleanness, but not fancy. It has it own its beach which is really good. It is so close from the lagoon, but 25 minutes walk from elmamsha if you like walking.
reviews.title: Value for money

reviews.text: Good location in terms of beach front. Swimming pool water is sea water, imagine swimming with you’re eyes in pain all the time unless you’re using goggles. Beach front has a lot of dried seaweeds. It wasn't maintained very well.. We use this hotel as part of the package of our tour.. Restaurant serves breakfast and lunch (part of the package). I'm not sure if they have housekeeping because NO one seems to  clean our room and no one collects garbage on daily basis. Employees has no uniform, hard to identify who is staff and who is guest.
reviews.title: Family Vacay 2020

reviews.text:
Despite the hotel beautiful location it turned out to be a big disappointment. Unclean rooms, unclean pool, even the plates inthe restaurant are covred in dust. 

The hotel corridors are totally dark at night with so many rocky stairs risking a bad injury. 

The pool is dirty and unusable. Dust everwhere in the room and left over gum stuck to the bed.

The AC is noisy making sleep very difficult  and its filters are full of dust.

For the similar price tag you cab get a much better room and view just a couple of meters away.

I hope management can turn things arround because the hotel location is great otherwise it is going to waste.
reviews.title: Bad experience

reviews.text: We picked that hotel during St. Catherine Monastery sunrise trip for short stay. Place like place near the sea but the Manager is worth best words. So grateful for the flashlight and sandwiches. Kindest regards, Aiste.
reviews.title: Nice staff

reviews.text: We had a grand time at Lagona Village hotel. The room was right between the sea and the swimming pool, the staff was very nice and helpful, they even gave us extra pillows and they offer to help us with everything. We would definitely come back. Thanks a lot! :-)
reviews.title: Recommended

reviews.text:
I picked up this resort for a long weekend with friends in Dahab after looking at its photos online. The resort is very pretty and special. Wherever you look, you will find a perfect spot to take a photo! Authentic style of the buildings, mountains and desert on one side and the sea on the other, nicely designed territory. 

The room was very clean. The beds were with comfortable mattresses and clean white linen. The only problem was in the bathroom that needed some maintenance: poor pressure of water in the shower, rusty faucet, the bathtub looked old and scratched. 

Breakfast was nice. It is not a buffet, they serve you a basket with bread and a plate with a boiled egg, jam, several kinds of cheese, cold cuts and sliced cucumbers. The coffee was very delicious (proper brewed coffee, not instant powder!), hot milk and powder orange drinks were also available. It was very lovely to sit on the terrace and enjoy the fresh sea breeze.

Security was present on site at night, so it felt safe. The hotel is located about 20 minutes walk from the downtown, but reception can also arrange a taxi. The staff was friendly and polite.

Overall, I really enjoyed my stay. I didn't expect much from a 2-star place, but this resort really exceeded my expectations. I would return for the next stay.
reviews.title: Charming Place

reviews.text:
Actually it was like they were surprised to have a group of people.
they have uncleaned pool, no room service, no soap, bad plumbing, small beds, no hot water.
the only pro was the location.
i wouldn't recommend it unless someone need a bed to sleep
reviews.title: Disappointment

reviews.text: Everything always efficient, clean, clear and friendly. Perfect service, outstanding location, swimming pool, very comfortable structure. A very trustable place, easy. Decent breakfast, amazing shower, comfy balcony.
reviews.title: Professional, clean, high international standard.

reviews.text:
Stayed few nights there.
Reception lady was friendliest who I have met, very helpful. She made me feel welcome. Other Staff members were also very friendly and helpful.
Nice clean hotel, quiet, middle of all, everything is near.
Will visit them again!
reviews.title: Warm welcome!

reviews.text:
We had a 4 night stay in New Yalla. It was amazing. I have been to many hotels in Dahab, but this one was great! 

Check in: We called them right before we came because we had a problem with the hotel we were staying in and they said they had 3 rooms available, so we booked them and went. The staff were super friendly, helpful and welcoming and made sure we were settled quickly in our rooms as we were very devastated with the other hotel. Thanks a lot to Mr. Sabry who made sure that happened. 

Rooms: The rooms are new with reasonable space (I assume it's a new hotel), the ACs work perfectly, clean sheets, clean bathroom and a free internet connection (although very poor connectivity, but it's something); However, just like most hotels, the lighting wasn't the best, but it was fine. Our rooms had a pool view and a little balcony. The toiletries weren't the best, only towels and tissues, but it's fine. It's recommended you get your own shampoo, water and stuff (it's a budget hotel after all).

Location: It's like a 3 minute walk from the Lighthouse. It has its own bar "Yalla Bar" which you get a 10% discount for on food because you're in the hotel. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants, cafes, shops, diving centers and supermarkets. 

A very highly recommended hotel.
reviews.title: Absolutely the best

reviews.text: I stayed for one night there, Thursday 20th April till 21st April. Rooms are clean and equipped with tv, refigrator and a.c . The only problem me and my friends had was regarding the staff (receptionist) he was very unpleasant and talked to us in a very rude way. Even the person who came to notify us for check out turned his back to me while I was talking to him. Very disappointed with their approach wouldn't recommend
reviews.title: Very clean rooms

reviews.text: Das Zimmer war sauber, hatte eine Klimaanlage und einen Kühlschrank. Das Hotel war ruhig und ich habe gerne auf dem Balkon gesessen. Der Pool war für Erwachsene nicht so aufregend, aber das Meer war ja nur 20 m vom Hotel entfernt, wozu soll man in den Pool?
reviews.title: Klein und schlicht

reviews.text:
Единственный плюс отеля - местоположение: прямой выход к морю (через бар, в котором можно отлично позавтракать).
Но! Возможное неплохое впечатление от отеля было полностью разрушено в последний день пребывания. С вечера предыдущего дня была договоренность о продлении одного номера на группу на 3-4 часа за цену половины дня. Но, к сожалению, в день выезда нам отказали без озвучивания причин, и все, включая двух детей вынуждены были покинуть отель (при температуре на улице в +37 градусов). Кроме того, в тот же день семейной пары пропала сумка со всеми документами и деньгами.
reviews.title: Не рекомендую

reviews.text:
On the day of departure, my bag, with foreign passports, money was stolen from the wardrobe in the room of this hotel.
Behavior of the owner and the police officer who arrived at my request was mildly inadequate .....
About the bag you can forget, because I was not even given the opportunity to write a statement about the theft.
I and my friends are still shocked by the incredibility of this event, but unfortunately it was the place to be.

В день отъезда, из платяного шкафа, находящегося в номере этого отеля, была украдена моя сумка, с иностранными паспортами, деньгами.
Поведение хозяина и приехавшего по моему требованию полицейского  было мягко говоря неадекватным.....
Про сумку можно забыть, так как мне даже не предоставили возможности написать заявление по поводу кражи.
Я и мои друзья до сих пор в шоке от невероятности данного события, но к сожалению оно имело место быть.
reviews.title: Theft of bag with passports and money from the closet in the hotel room

owner_response.text: Our hotel is equipped with a security camera system all over and there you can see that you left the hotelroom with the bag, that was supposedly stolen from the wardrobe, in your left hand. We have already shown you the video several times. So please don't blame us for losing your bag!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Отель отличный. Довольно комфортный для таких цен. Очень великолепное место. Имееться парковка. Из минусов хочу отметить что Wi-Fi  здесь не очень. Нету столовой но есть кухня где каждый может разогреть себе что либо. Вообщем хороший отель.
reviews.title: Хорошо

reviews.text: Ubytování čisté, malý balkonek u téměř všech pokojů. Personál úžasný, zařídí vše, co potřebujete. Před hotelem restaurace s barem a lehátkama na pláži, kde se můžete celý den válet a nechat obsluhovat. Přinesou vám čaj, džus, jídlo, prostě nádhera. Na programu jsme měli akorát jíst, pít, šnorchlovat a válet se. Není co vytknout.
reviews.title: Ubytováni téměř na pláži

location.address: Al Masbat Lighthouse Area, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text: Me & my mum stay at Moon House every year because the place is so clean & nice. Wifi is great, European satalite tv, good kitchen with everything you need. The guys are really cool & funny & help with anything you need. The beach cafe has tasty food & is reasonably priced. We sometimes look at other places but always come back to Moon House cos it’s like our home away from home. Totally recommend this place 11 out of 10 stars!
reviews.title: Brilliant Moon House

reviews.text: Мы посетили  с мужем Дахаб с 23 декабря по 5 января 2020 года. Апартаменты Moon  house -  прекрасные двухэтажные дома у моря. Рядом площадь и рынок. территория ухожена и охраняема. Номера чистые и пригодны для релакса на пару недель.
reviews.title: Лунная дорожка в море.

photos.caption: В Дахабе рядом  с Moon house апартаментами

reviews.text:
I was very happy to find this place! The vibe is cozy and very welcoming.

The managers are chilled and always willing to help. They got you covered with local recommendations for any taste and with trips to attractions close by.

Simply a great spot to enjoy Dahab!
reviews.title: Nice chilled spot with great value for money!

name: My Hostel in Dahab - Dive Center

reviews.text:
Basically it's the best! not just offering great hotelling services but most importantly providing the atmosphere you love! the roof is a perfect place for solo travellers from around the world to chill out and socialise.
For digital nomads, they have a unique co-working space with stable, fast internet with the mountain view in your back and the sea in front of you (depending where are you sitting).
Also, they organize hiking trips, bonfire by the beach in the night, transportation to/ from SSH.
Plus, they've a quality diving center attached to the hostel, so you can a permanent discount if you book both ;) 
Check the reviews on Booking.com, Hostelworld, and Google..
For some reason, those reviews aren't reflected here!
reviews.title: Incomparable!

locations.name: My Hostel in Dahab - Dive Center
My Hostel in Dahab - Dive Center
My Hostel in Dahab - Dive Center
My Hostel in Dahab - Dive Center
My Hostel in Dahab - Dive Center
My Hostel in Dahab - Dive Center

name: Coral Coast Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: My holidays were ruined by extremely loud parties at the beach of hotel Coral Coast. The awful “music” at the beach is a torture. If you have heart problems or a heart pacemaker, better don’t stay there, the loud subwoofer at the beach of hotel Coral Coast will let it explode! The arrogant hotel management laugh at you, when you complain or try to explain them anything.
reviews.title: A nightmare of a hotel management  :(

reviews.text: Our stay at Coral Coast Hotel was absolutely lovely. The staff is very helpful and flexible. No unexpected mishaps or costs. I also reccomend their dive center FantaSea who are skilled, velcoming and informative.
reviews.title: Very nice staff.

reviews.text:
From 11 to 25 January we stayed at the Coral Coast hotel in Dahab. 
What a great hotel, the location, the view from your room and right on the beach. 
The center of Dahab can be reached within 10 minutes. 
The staff helps you with everything, nothing is too much and I would like to thank Moses, Achmed and Mohamed for the service, what nice people. 
Always up for a chat and a joke. 
The restaurant and bar are also top notch. 
In the evening there is a lot of atmosphere, nice music and very nice people. 
The room is spacious and clean, the beds are good but the bathroom is a bit outdated. 
All in all, my husband and I had a great time at your hotel.
Thank you so much for everything Coral Coast and we will definitely be back. 

Greetings, Corien and Ger Dijkhuizen from Holland.
reviews.title: What a very good and nice hotel.

reviews.text: Disappointing stay at Coral Coast hotel had booked as solo traveller for 3 weeks so could use yoga studio. I stayed just 2 nights the noise from the beach bar was unbearable seem to have a party every night there. The room was expensive for the quality the bathroom was old and didn’t feel clean. On a positive the staff at the bar are friendly and the food was good. I managed to find a wonderful small hotel nearby that was half the price and fantastic quality. But this hotel is over priced for what it is. I also stayed at The Bridge while in Dahab fantastic newish small hotel and dive centre same price as Coral Coast but fantastic quality and value. My expectations had been high but sadly not met.
reviews.title: Disappointingly poor

reviews.text: I can’t speak for the accommodation but the food in the restaurant in the evening is pretty good. I had chicken with chargrilled vegetables as I was craving something relatively healthy. This was really tasty and very generous. My partner also had a larger chicken dish (I think chicken stuffed and wrapped in ‘beef’ ham). We were both happy with our choices and both reasonably priced. The hotel looks ok and the wellness / yoga centre is also great (I tried several classes).  You can also sit on the beach and enjoy a sun downer… definitely one of my favourite spots, although quieter as it’s off the main ‘strip’. I’d definitely recommend.
reviews.title: Lovely evening meal at Coral Coast

reviews.text:
Everything is wrong with this hotel. The transfer was 3h late and hotel didn't respond to our messages (our flight was late but we kept the hotel updated). 
We booked the superior room. It looked like in the pictures but 50 years later. Every piece of furniture was broken and old. The pillows stink. Bedcover was dirty. 
After my complain we got another room. It was better. 
During 2 weeks stay nobody was cleaning the rooms or changing towels.
The breakfast was good. But every day the same. And no water to drink.
WIFI is not working at all. Only in front of reception you can connect. In our room, that was directly above the reception we got internet only close to the window.
reviews.title: Never again

reviews.text:
I have stayed at Coral Coast several times and would (and do) happily recommend it to anyone. The hotel itself has everything you could need  and in a beautiful setting. The rooms are comfortable and always clean. It is far enough from the main Dahab strip to be quiet but only a 5 minute walk away to be in the middle of it all. 

The staff at Coral Coast are also a huge factor in my decision to return each time. Every member of staff there is welcoming and friendly and will all go out of their way to accommodate every request wherever possible, especially the manager- Wael. The bar/restaurant staff are also always happy to help with both small and large requests, particularly Mohamed who went out of his way on this trip to provide a decorated birthday table/area for my friend. 

I wouldn't stay anywhere else.
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Dahab

reviews.text:
The hotel is very old and its apparent it has not been maintained for a while. We reserved two rooms for 4 nights and we have to leave the hotel the minutes we checked in and saw the rooms.

Smell of the room was super strong and nasty.
reviews.title: Very old unmaintained hotel

reviews.text: My first trip to laid back divers paradise Dahab was spent at the Coral Coast Hotel. Rooms vary a lot in comfort and standard. I pre-booked a Twin Superior room, which should have been top of the line among the rooms. According to the description: "Our newly-redesigned Superior Rooms are tastefully decorated, with a rich light soothing decor..". My room was nothing like that. Old, badly functioning run-down bathroom and the room..well, not anywhere near superior. I asked for another room and received one slightly better. Unfortunately a rain storm damaged the roof and it started raining in..I received a third room, finally of Superior standard. The best part of this hotel is the beach front restaurant with friendly service and good food/drinks.
reviews.title: Beach bonanza?

reviews.text:
Great hotel with an amazing view. Rooms are spacious and very clean. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful and the food is great. The hotel is qalking distance from all the good restaurants and cafés. 
I would definitely stay in coral coast again when I visit Dahab again :)
reviews.title: Amazing stay

reviews.text: Our room is good but the air-con broke down and it was in October. Got it fixed after the 3rd day. Very humid and hot. The floor is muddy and water has salt in it. Air-con leak but honestly, the services were good and they very attentive and cooperative. Even though our room is not great, we like the services they rendered. They definitely need improvement - esp dry rack, rusty tap, room service - clean. Love their pool and overall, good service that makes us a happy couple and recommended. WIFI reception not great has to get it worked in the balcony.
reviews.title: GREAT HOTEL

reviews.text: The rooms are clean and spacious. The pool is small but it is very refreshing in the intense SUNNY mornings. The location is great and is very close to the main pedestrian street, However it's relatively far from the beach (10 mins walk).
reviews.title: Overall Good

reviews.text:
The hotel is right on one main drags of Dahab, where most stores, mini markets and restaurants are.
The setting is quaint, clean, and pleasant.
Staff, and management have a very relaxed, and helping attitude.
They helped with, advice, and local calls when I was trying to contact the monks at St Catherine for a reservation, then they helped me finding a ride to get there.
They also arranged my snorkeling excursions in the nearby areas...
The "Three pools" one is beautiful and right by the coast.
For breakfast they found out I like fruits, and they prepared some for me... very kind.
reviews.title: Convenient place, helpful staff

reviews.text: Very warm welcome,staff could do enough for us.rooms spotless.great location,plenty to do.would stay again and again.brilliant place to stay.had all facilities needed,fridge,t.v,wifi,breakfast included,room cleaned daily,diving good prices,quad biking a must.bbl in the desert brilliant. Excellent value for money.
reviews.title: Cheap and clean hotel in the center of the country thanked my Cheap and clean hotel in the center of the country thanked

reviews.text: The hotel is very nice  and clean , staff was really friendly and helpful. The only strange thing that they requested to pay the whole stay upfront which is kindda wierd in dahab. It would have been great if they have a sea view but this hotel isn't located by the sea
reviews.title: Good place to stay

reviews.text: Very warm welcome,staff couldnt do enough for us.rooms spotless.great location,plenty to do.would stay again and again.brilliant place to stay.had all facilities needed,fridge,t.v,wifi,breakfast included,room cleaned daily,diving good prices,quad biking a must.bbq in the desert brilliant. Excellent value for money.
reviews.title: Holiday

reviews.text: Excellent hospitality big clean rooms best prices. Staff are helpful, nothing is impossible. Diving with Tamer Hussien.Thanks Ziggy, Amen, Siad, and all the amazing staff, for making an Aussie girl feel like an Arabian princess.
reviews.title: blessings in paradise

reviews.text:
One of the worst hotel experiences ever. The staff was extremely rude and imposing. We were for example not allowed to use our room or balconies for mixed-group gatherings even in the daytime; this was also not related to us politely or before booking, but by yelling and insulting (the female members of) the group. 

At the same time, the hotel or the rooms didn't look like anything promised, but they were shabby, grimy, and of questionable hygienic standards. I had no hot water, there were cockroaches in my bathroom (just spray regularly for godsakes), my AC only half worked, and the pool that looked so nice in the photos was grimy. And the management was so not interested.

It's not like this was a nice beautiful clean place with bad service, it was simply a sucky hotel. Goes without saying that we lasted in the hotel one day only.
reviews.title: Just terrible

reviews.text: I stayed in this hotel last summer (2014), and was pretty disappointed by the quality of the room and the service in general. The room was much more ascetic than it seems it the photos and the bath room was straight forward dirty. Once I entered the room and checked it, I noticed the bath room's condition and asked the staff to clean it, which they actually didn't do. Also, the remote control of the TV did not work and 4 out of the 5 lamps in the room didn't work. The staff was quite uptight and not helpful at all. I ended up staying there fewer days (actually only 2 nights)  than what I had planned, and looked for another option. I would not recommend this place unfortunately.
reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this place

reviews.text:
Our Egyptians friends (I am a foreigner) were treated terribly - with public accusatory shouting episodes, banging on doors, watching our every move - and even when the booking was made in my name, they insisted on talking to and negotiating with the Egyptians in the group because they knew they could pressure them much harder than me as a foreigner.
We would have left immediately were it not for the fact all of Dahab was booked up, when rooms elsewhere became available we immediately left the Octopus hotel.

Their treatment of us ruined the whole holiday and turned a much needed break from the city into an experience that made us want to return to Cairo as soon as possible.
We will never stay there again and I would not recommend for it anyone who is not a conservative Egyptian family.
reviews.title: discriminatory and accusing management

reviews.text: the scene that took place before my eyes was surrealistically messed up. the owner, Said, started beating up an older foreigner over a stupid issue that would normally be discussed in a professional manner but he didn't even leave room for talking, he instantly attacked with a sucker punch and carried on beating him up, also with the help of a younger and equally messed up boy that tried to push me away from stopping him and contributed in the beating. apparently this is not the first time he's done such a thing, and he's generally known for being mentally disturbed in several ways according to many people's testimonies. I could tell he's drunk the minute he got close by the obvious alcohol reek in his breath. he gave the foreigner he assaulted a ruptured eardrum which he could easily be jailed for. stay cautious as the beauty of the place could lure you enough into thinking it's such a peaceful space to be when in reality the person who runs it is the furthest one could be from peace or any basic quality of humanness, which would inevitably make your experience highly prone to being completely ruined. this is a serious warning sign as the guy is actually dangerous and could really lose it on ANYONE to the point of getting them hospitalized, literally.
reviews.title: BEWARE THE OWNER! HE IS A DRUNKEN SAVAGE

reviews.text: one night I was sitting in the lobby because I was bored of staying at the room. That old man from the reception said to me “ well, if you don’t like your room. You can take your money and go.” !!!!!! Seriously I will never recommend this hotel as this was the worst stay ever in my live.
reviews.title: Horrible stay

reviews.text:
Stayed at Amanda for 3 nights 
ten ft away was the sea practically on the beach, however the rocks makes the beach hard to swim, amazing views, room was clean and basic, free breakfast you order for a time and it’s cooked for you ,only a basic breakfast.
reviews.title: Escape From Daily routine

reviews.text:
Despite the high music sounds after midnight, the rudeness of the staff and their slow services 
If you are a girl traveling solo the place is not safe for you .. as one of the days I saw one of the staff kissing one of the guests in the kitchen. A day later the guest and I met on the beach and told me the story behind that guy who kissed her and that she feels that he’s using her. 
The beach is not safe as you have to walk over rocks and corals ( Hotel is not caring about the corals and their health ). 
I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone even for a one night stay.
reviews.title: Noisy place

reviews.text: We went to ask for the rates, the person who was at the reception was very arrogant in his replies and had no sense of hospitality demeanor.. left us with an awful feeling that would surely never have us returning
reviews.title: Really rude host

reviews.text: I really love every single part of this place, everybody here is great, its one big family..the food is great he people are great everything here is just PERFECT..and Dont forget to tell Luna hi for me..a really nice golder retriever that loves the place like me..
reviews.title: BEST PLACE EVER!

reviews.text: This hotel truly feels like your home away from home. Mohammed, Rita, Ali, and the rest of the staff welcome you with open arms and make you feel like family. Our room was basic but very clean, with a nice comfortable bed and windows that opened up for a view of the sea. The common areas inside the hotel and out on the beach are the perfect place to unwind and enjoy the views. A few minutes' walk along the seafront brings you into the center of Dahab, where you can find a host of restaurants, shops, and activities. The highlights of our stay were definitely the hotel's puppy, Luna, and the incredible breakfasts served by Ali. We'll be back!
reviews.title: Perfect stay

reviews.text:
The common saying in dahab is   Come as a guest, leave as a friend. At amandas its come as a guest leave part of the family. Mohamad, Rita"mom" are fantastic hosts and Ali makes AMAZING breakfasts everyday. We were only going to stay a wee or so but ended up staying 17 days. 5 min walk to the strip and as quite as can be. Eel garden is a 2 min walk for some of the better snorkeling around. We had the great fortune of "luna". A brand new puppy and got to see her grow up a bit. Hope she remembers us when we return. 

Ask for the chris and haleigh room
reviews.title: Best place in dahab

reviews.text: Sammy and his wife Rita are very welcoming, characterful, and warm hosts. They are knowledgable and helpful, and have good contacts to arrange anything you need in the area at very reasonable costs. The hotel has a very good location in an area a bit north of the bustle of the tourist 'strip,' on the beach, near a good snorkelling spot - eel garden. The rooms are large, comfortable, clean, the hot water works well, and there's a large common area for sitting around and relaxing. I really enjoyed my stay here, I extended my stay by two weeks.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

reviews.text: The hosts, Mr Mohamed and Rita, and both wonderful; they are wise, kind and well travelled.  Thus, they are both very open minded and will surely compliment your stay.  The accommodation is very nice, beautiful location - so close to some really amazing snorkel locations.
reviews.title: What a lovely place :)

reviews.text:
I stayed in Chillout Motel for 7 nights in July (summer, quite hot in Dahab). I enjoyed the experience. 

That said, there are a number of points I would raise for improvement of this lovely property: 
1. The toilet was loose, when you sat on it, it would move and felt like it was coming away from the wall/floor.
2. The fixtures in the bathroom were loose: the towel rack kept falling off the wall, the shower head fell out of the holder on the wall and the flush on the toilet would pop off.
3. The water pressure was low, so it felt like you were showering with extremely little water.
4. We had 3 beds in the room, and only 1 duvet.

On the other hand, we did enjoy the overall experience: there was a very efficient fridge, the AC was superb, there was decent wifi, the beds were comfortable, the staff went out of their way to help us with any request we had, the manager shared her whatsapp number so we could reach her anytime and the location of the motel is close to the beach, major restaurants and the dive centre we used. 

The restaurant downstairs was lovely - we had breakfast there 5 out of 7 days and dinner twice. Simple, yet delicious food and it was very well priced compared to other restaurants.

If the management could look at improving the fixtures in the bathroom it would have been a perfect stay.
reviews.title: Good, not excellent

reviews.text: I came for one night and stayed for 1 month. A great place, 5 minutes walk to the sea in a very chill part of town. I highly recommend this place, the food is fantastic :) The rooms are very clean :) All the people I meet are super friendly.
reviews.title: Amazing people Fantastic food Clean rooms

reviews.text: The apartments are beautifully decorated with fantastic sea views from the roof terrace. The hammocks are perfect for relaxing and reading in when you're not swimming or diving. It's only a 5 minute walk to the beach and a short walk to shops and restaurants. All in all a wonderful place to stay!
reviews.title: Fab location with great views

reviews.text: Great Location - 5 minute walk to the beach and 10-15 to the centre with restaurants etc. Communication was easy, Tim always responded quickly to any questions we had. The Roof terrace was an added bonus. Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Dahab!
reviews.title: Great Location + Roof Terrace

reviews.text: We fell in love with this place! Thanks to the amazing staff members for making us feel at home! We totally recommend it and we will definitely go back there on our next trip to Dahab! Make sure you go diving!
reviews.title: amazing stay!

reviews.text: The appartment is really cosy and offers space for 2-4 people. The roof top terrace has a great see view. All necessary things are in the kitchen. We've spent really relaxing days in Dahab - swimming, diving, reading...
reviews.title: Relaxing and diving

reviews.text:
If you want a luxurious, relaxing, clean, comfortable place, then this will defently will be ur choice. 
Amazing view, calm area, 1 min to the sea, 10 to 15 min walking to the light house and the mamsha of dahab. Price are very reasonable, our group also took the diving course, so the price was more interesting. Just check and confirm the rates with the owner to avoid any confusion, as the rates are in Euro and often the payment is LE. 
I recommend it for all.
Cheers.
reviews.title: Sea stars apartment

reviews.text:
Sea Stars Apartments were absolutely perfect in every way. Truly! 
Great location with a delightful sea view. Roof top for tanning and a wonderful sea breeze. Cute personal balconies and a garden area for chilling. Fridge was even stocked up for us upon arrival. We were very well looked after by Tim and Abdul, speakers provided for our tunes right away and children's toys provided for the kids. 
Perfect for all, couples, groups and families with children too. 
Nicely laid out, comfy beds, stylish interior decor with Dahab feel. 
We would definitely stay there again and highly recommend for long term and short term stays. 
Do it, book it and of course, enjoy!...
reviews.title: WOW, WOW, WOW! Lush and very lovely!

reviews.text:
Me and my partner stayed at Sea Stars Apartments for our holiday to Dahab.
the location was great just a short walk to the Eel Gardens, restaurants and bars.
The room was Great and the hosts super friendly and helpful.
The fridge even had cold beers, milk, eggs and cheese as a welcome pack, which was handy as we didn't have to spend our first day shopping to stock the fridge.
Abdul the boab was always super helpful.
Id recommend Sea Stars to anybody looking for a quality apartment in a great location.
reviews.title: Great location with great hosts!

reviews.text:
Eventhough my flight arrived after midnight with a delay, Tim managed that someone picked me up and drive me for around 20 EUR (not really sure about the right price) safe during more than an hour from sharm-el-sheik to the apartment in dahab; and the same when i went back home.
The flats are clean, Tim is when problems arises (like how can I get delivered some delicious food to the apartment the at 10 o'clock) always friendly and extreamly helpul! So the price/service ratio is definetely excellent!! So it's a question of time, when I will go there for a next time:)

I was there with friends but I would also recommend it for a family, because children can play outside without problems because of a big wall around the apartments.
reviews.title: Very friendly, perfect service

reviews.text: Beautifully appointed apartment, really clean, comfortable and relaxing.  Really appreciated the mosquito nets on the windows which meant we could have the windows open and not worry about the insects. Loved the location a little out of the main tourist area, with 'real life' all around in the form of goats wandering the streets, local shops and lovely people.  Tim the owner was on hand and was really kind and helpful.  The roof terrace was awesome with its canopy and cushions where we relaxed gazing out over the sea on one side and the mountains on the other. Books and backgammon were provided.  Simply loved Dahab and our holiday at Sea Stars, thank you, we hope to return!
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: Second time staying here and it was lovely! The apartment is bright, modern and spotlessly clean and the little welcome package was greatly appreciated after a late arrival. Thanks to Tim and his team for everything. This accommodation comes recommended and I will definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.title: Great beach front hotel

reviews.text: I have been there twice, didn’t really like it the first time but then I changed my mind the second visit. The location is heavenly, in the heart of eel garden, which is the quieter, calmer area in dahab now. You have access to a nice private beach (make sure you bring your beach shoes). Bakar is a lovely guy and has an awesome attitude. The owner might come across a little bit unfriendly but he was nice and welcoming.
reviews.title: a nice, homey hotel

reviews.text: Clean rooms and excellent breakfast. The place looks like a postcard.  We felt in a private paradise. Bachar the bartender is a kind and welcoming guy who will always be happy to help. Highly recommended
reviews.title: The best stay in Dahab

reviews.text:
I like it’s cleanliness, calmness and the fact that it is not in the crowded area but still few minutes walking away from it.

Pretty decent breakfast and a simple yet chique rooms.

The staff is friendly but assertive which doesn’t make a problem if your plans and needs are clear, but I haven’t tested their flexibility and I won’t count on it.
reviews.title: Good enough to make your stay a pleasant memory

reviews.text: His behaviour is threatening to the street animals and those who support them. It's a beautiful spot so such a shame. It creates quite an unpleasant atmosphere. If you love an open, calm, animal friendly environment  this is not for you
reviews.title: What a shame about the owner's  attitude to all the street animals.

reviews.text:
We stayed for 4 nights in El Primo and wished that we could live there... this place is just the best!! The rooms are clean, well organized and decorated... the bed is very comfortable (to my opinion).
The owners of the place are a wonderful couple with two children (don't worry, you won't hear kinds playing day and night) 
The staff are very friendly also and speak great English! 
Everyone there is smiling and really helpful!
The place has a really nice atmosphere, with its russian/Greek style... I just love it!
And let's not forget the food!!!
The best Egyptian breakfast I had in my travel in Egypt!!!
Everything on the menu is great, but the porridge with fresh fruits in the morning, for me was the bomb! 
So, go to dahab, book a room there, and it would be the best decision you've taken in a while ;)

@thomas_freediver
reviews.title: Little corner of peace in paradise
