location.address: El Melil Street Area Eel Garden, Dahab Egypt

reviews.text:
I had a great 8 night stay here. Staff are all really lovely and the hotel is a great budget friendly option that ticks all the right boxes. Daily breakfast was enjoyed by the pool, the sun loungers were great, the rooftop viewing (and lazing) area was great too - as was the firepit and undercover cushion area too!
This hotel delivers well! 
If you're looking for something that wont break the bank, has the amenities you're looking for, and still has a small intimate feel - you've found it.
It's not five star, you're not going to swim laps in the pool (it's small but perfectly adequate) and you're not looking for room service - it's fantastic!
No telly in my room - but who's watching Egypt's got talent anyway... I probably would to be fair.
Air con worked, bed was comfy, shower had water - I was happy!

I really enjoyed my stay and found the location to be perfect for all the things i wanted to do.
I'll be coming back and dragging my kids along next time too.
reviews.title: Great stay - lovely people and property

reviews.text: The staff was incredibly nice and helpful!! Especially our day snorkeling with Mowgli was absolutely amazing and he was the best guide and extra travel buddy!  When we first arrived we could even choose which room we wanted ourself, and the staff and manager was generally so helpful with everything we asked for.  The hotel and location exceeded our expectations and we’re definitely more than satisfied.
reviews.title: Lovely community and great facilities. Amazing for diving and snorkeling as well.

reviews.text:
Comfy, clean, simple with very lovely and friendly staff 
My children enjoyed the swimming pool even it is small but was very clean
Nice view with easy access to all the restaurants and shops really i would recommend it for relaxation trip to Dahab
reviews.title: Very good

reviews.text:
one of the best places to stay in Dahab, view is magnificent, location is suburb, service is marvels, owner is well expert and solve any problem in a second.
if you plan to visit Dahab club red is the choice.
 
Trips are available very well organized, access to any where in Dahab is very easy with the help of the staff.

Staff are fully experienced and offer their help before you ask.

Stay in this hoyel and you will never regret it.
reviews.title: Great place and area

reviews.text:
We booked one room. First of all they took money on our account and they take the double of the price. We canceled and tried many times to have a refund. Nothing. And actually the owner is used to those kind of action. 
I am not recommending this hostel at all. 
You can find way better for less money
reviews.title: warning scammer

reviews.text: Amazing hotel, friendly staff, very helpful hotel manager. It's the kind of hotel which makes you feel at home. Highly recommended. The location is brilliant, the hotel is very clean and the staff is at your service 24 hours. The pool is a great addition to the successful hotel.
reviews.title: The hotel that makes you at home

reviews.text: Dahab stays are usually casual and simple, but this property in terms of facilities and cleanliness surpasses all other stays I had in Dahab. The room is up to the standard  of proper hotels and the housekeeping made the room spotless clean. Staff  are also very friendly and accmodating. I would definitely recommend .
reviews.title: One of my best stays in Dahab

reviews.text:
Amazing amazing location and view… super friendly staff and they would do anything to help, i took the wooden cabin on the rooftop which gives me the real vibes of chill Dahab
But please note those 2 things: 
1- water in Dahab in general can be inconsistent 
2- it’s so windy in March and a rooftop cabin not recommended in this month 
Other than this it’s just perfect and will totally come again
reviews.title: The hotel that gives u the real Dahab vibes

reviews.text: After a terrible stay at another hotel we ended up at Club Red, what a difference. Friendly and nice staff and clean rooms, even the wifi is (by Dahab standard) fairly fast. Perhaps a little more attention to the cleanliness of the breakfast area along the sea.
reviews.title: Diving is everithing at Dahab

reviews.text:
It was a great experience staying at the Club Red Hotel Dahab. Beautiful location, stunning views, pleasant atmosphere, friendly hotel staff, always helpful, responsive and pleasant. 
Highly recommended!
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

location.address: on the waterfront in Mashraba area, beside the Police Station P.O. Box 12, Dahab Egypt

name: Dar Dahab
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: There is so much I can say about this unique place where I come back again and again because you feel like at home..Back after few years due to the Covid restrictions its a pleasure to be back. Offer great sea views and during my stay i don't miss a sunrise alwyas different and sometime going for an early swimm even just after the sunrise...The apartments are have a kitchen  where you can cook with local shops offer everything you need and a fishmonger just few minutes u will away...But if you like they can organise breakfast and Ammar the manager can cook a great beduin dinner you will never forget!! Ahmad and Moustafa'too work very hard to run any cores to keep the place at very high standard and always ready  for any requests as Ammar can arrange e any request and suggestions what to visit in Dahab...Lady Nahid the owner is the soul of Dar Dahab and working as Ammar ralways helpful with any requests or any problems...Maintenance is at very high standard and if something is not wprking properly will be repaired in very short time...The peace at Dar Dahab is broken only by children at sea playing even football !! Guests should be more caring  when stay at Dar Dahab because its extra work if come back from a swim and come iand should be n without taking off or washing their sea shoes in the basket water outside!!! Dah Dahab is like home: I have seen the staircase been washed 3 times in a day!!! If you like to sunbathing there is a great terrace well stock with chairs and  there are cushions where at the end of the you can see a sunset over the mountains...This year was very special to be back and as a chef its a pleasure to do some cooking for the guests..Lady Nahid also try to help ;new people come ti live in dahab and doing their roots cooking food but also they can suggest places in town or have take away...Any problem at Dar Dahab is not a problem because there is a way!! the wish to make your stay very relax without any issues of any sort....There si much more to say about Dar Dahab for its eco furnitures with a booking area too!! Dar Dahab is home for me and the only bad time its leaving time because you feel like taking a piece of Dar Dahab and want to give back when you come back with a great new experience vacation!!! i love it!!! And will come back...Thank you Lady Nahid, Ammar Moustafa and Ahmad....Will be back...its a homecoming...
reviews.title: The gem of Dahab where you feel at home and will come back again and again..

owner_response.text: Thank you Alfonso! It's always a pleasure to have you here! Dar Dahab will always be your home :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

photos.caption: Looking on the left the mountains toward the Blue Hole
There iss story about this door....

reviews.text: This hotel is an amazing residence in Dahab with unique architecture and beautiful lighting.  Each unit has a small kitchen, many have sea views and the lobby area is gorgeous.  My family stayed here many times and enjoyed snorkeling in front of the hotel as well as walking to the Light House area. Ms. Nahed, the owner, is present daily and always friendly.  Mr. Gamal( fabulous cook) and Mr. Walid (excellent service man) make every guest feel at home.  It is the best place to stay in Dahab.  This New Year’s Eve,  Ms. Nahed hosted a delicious dinner for the guests.  It was perfect.  Dar Dahab has my family’s highest recommendation.
reviews.title: Best place to stay in Dahab

owner_response.text: Thank you for your nice review dear Kathleen :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Stayed for five nights with family and we had a sea view one bedroom as well as the two bedroom apartment (no view), So we enjoyed the best of both worlds: Space, and prime view. Rarely on the coast do accommodations offer any surprises. Dar Dahab exceeded expectations on all levels, service, welcome, comfort, space and tasteful design. Ammar, our hotel manager was there 24/7 and always ready to assist and accommodate all kinds of plan changes. He is so well connected that through him, we were guaranteed the best service bond the hotel, from restaurants to day trips and other water activities. We were treated like royalty and always told, Ammar is a dear client.  he gets an  array of eclectic clientele and all kids of purposeful trips: Yoga retreats, families, expats, hikers and more and yet, he spends time to understand his clients and manages to offer tailor made suggestions that always hit home successfully. I will definitely go back.
reviews.title: Eco designed but with 5 stars comfort

owner_response.text: Thank you for your nice review Laila! We hope to see you soon again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Well run, well decorated, well situated (if looking for quietness), right on the water, and very comfortable. Just a pleasant 10 min walk from the restaurants and some 20 min from the busy center of Dahab. It was lovely chatting with the owner, who even helped us get our covid test done on site prior to our departure.
reviews.title: Beautiful quiet place in Dahab

owner_response.text: Thank you for your nice review! We hope to see you soon again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
this hotel is known for last minute cancellation or demoting booked rooms and just tells you they would give you back your deposit leaving you on the hook right before holiday. VERY ARROGANT call their guests “naughty” 

NOT  a place you would trust.

They had a covid case in one of the rooms and did not even care to announce that on the fb page .
They keep deleting any negative reviews , so at least here is a safe space to write about their truth .
reviews.title: cancels rooms last minute

owner_response.text: Thanks for your review, we are very sorry to hear you had a bad experience with us. Since then , we replaced our manager and we are happy our management is now at a very high standard.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
We stayed there for around 10 days and we loved every moment. All from the start, the booking experience was smooth and very responsive and helpful. They helped us arrange pick up from Sharm’s airport. The place is right on the beach, the apartment was super clean and well equipped. 

Jamal and Wisam who take care of the place were so helpful, friendly and really great help. We even got to meet the owner herself. They also helped arrange for the PCR tests before we leave.

I cannot wait to book for my next vacation. Totally worth every penny.

All pictures are taken from Dar dahab
reviews.title: An awesome hidden gem

owner_response.text: Thank you for your nice review! We hope to see you soon again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: We stayed here for the second time in two years. It's a beautiful, well-run hotel. Dahab is a special place (you'll know why once you've been there), and Dar Dahab makes the experience even more special. I expect we'll stay again...
reviews.title: Still great

owner_response.text: Thank you very  much for your  kind review! See you soon hopefully
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: I com every year for 3 weeks and stay at Dar Dahab because its home for me....Travelling solo as my only diving holiday to feel at home its a great feeling...I get hook at the sunrise always a great event for me...to take a photo to share....The apartment are self containing very arty with family photos that are history like a wooden door on display in the hall with the sky for roof its unique....There is a sense of comunity with the guests...Being a chef is been a pleasure to cook for all no just the owner lady Nahed and the staff Ahmed and Walid but also for the guests....These evening are becoming a special part of the holiday with everybody cooking and cleaning after...Need a bigger kitchen....My last cooking evening we were 12 and was worth it!!! The apartments with their salt bricks are unique with a great light...near the shops and no far from the centre of Dahab make this place a retriet corner if you come for peace...sitting in the balcony an play guitar watching the children play in the sea its wonderful....And if go for nokerelling you will be surprise what you can see from puffer fish to nemos angel fish ecc ecc....They are family the place is magic for me....and the departure is always very had...So what i can say more? Thank you from my heart four great the hard work and for your sincere friendship and humanity.......You are family for me too!!!
reviews.title: Back at home...I feel like part of a family.....Amazing place....The jewel of Dahab....

owner_response.text: Thank you for your nice review! We hope to see you soon again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
The location of the hotel is wonderful. Thus makes it never hot and always windy.
The staff is so friendly and helpful especially ahmed and walid.
The decoration is very cool and suites dahab's atmosphere.
The sea view is priceless that overlooks the sea, the mountains and some palm trees as well.
The only comment I have is the beggars who's always at the hotel's doorstep.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay with a wonderful location

owner_response.text: Thank you very  much for your  kind review! We loved having you at Dar Dahab :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: The best hotel in Dahab and one of the best place we have ever been. Very clean, amazing view and architecture, unique place. The staff was very nice. Do not hesitate, this is what you need in Dahab !
reviews.title: Wonderful

owner_response.text: Thank you very  much for your  kind review! See you soon hopefully
owner_response.title: Owner Response

name: Alf Leila Boutique Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: The room was so dirty, the bathroom taps are rusty and the whole place needs maintenance. It’s location is nice and almost 3 minutes walk from the beach but that’s it no other advantage i won’t be repeating my stay
reviews.title: It’s not worth the money

reviews.text:
We loved our 3 night stay at Alf Leila! Ayman, the owner is so lovely, overseeing our every need from the moment we booked our reservation.  He is super attentive to all my questions of things to do, etc  He organized a pick up from Sharm El Sheik airport to the hotel and made the transfer seamless, even at midnight!

The hotel is so charming - the hotel is riad style and the rooms are spacious and unique.  I loved that it is just far enough from the beach walk where the bars and restaurants are to be quiet and calm.

Don’t forget to get the breakfast at the hotel’s breakfast restaurant!  It is a locally known thing that breakfast at Alf Leila is amazing. Anastasia and the staff was wonderful in serving my group of 5 in a hurry to make our flight.  

And what I loved the most - they make their own kamboucha! So hard to pick a flavor - so we got 3!

Can’t wait to return, inshal’lah.  Thank you for a beautiful stay, Ayman!
reviews.title: Highly recommend- you will love it.

reviews.text: It is a place of a great taste in design and architecture which is rare. Though it is center of Dahab, it is kinda out of noisy streets. And there is a nice trick about this place. They have a stylish breakfast cafe right inside the complex. Which serves the one and only salmon benedict in town. Rooms were clean and nice, though it is common. But the details are what catch the eye and make you fall in love with Alf Leila. All this Moroccan style musical instruments, plates and decor scattered around makes this stay not just a stay, but an experience. The owners told that they are renewing rooms to make them cleanest in Dahab, which is appreciated. Anyway, 10 out of 10, great job, loved it.
reviews.title: Vibrant, relaxed and comfortable boutique. Highly recomended

reviews.text: I’ve stayed in Alf Leila in January 2022. This is a very nice little hotel very close to restauants, cafes and the promenade is few minutes walk. I especially enjoyed the coffee corner in the garden and seating with a book in the Bedouin style corner. I highly recommend the room upstairs with Mountain View, the balcony is very nice there. I felt I stayed with my family and mr Ayman was very helpful in everything. Pretty sure anyone who chooses Alf Leila will enjoy their stay
reviews.title: Best hotel in Dahab

reviews.text: This place is very Cozy and nice and all the people working there from Mostafa front office are very welcoming , the place is clean and calm and the service is great , they have a very nice place for breakfast ( the breakfast cafe ) and also the Egyptian food with Reham of you like to taste the real Egyptian Culinary , I recommend this place for anyone who wants to feel the warmth and coziness in Dahab , they are not just a hotel they are family .. Special thanks to the people who run that place Ayman and Juliana for the help and support offered during my stay .. I would love always to come and stay here ..
reviews.title: Very Nice Experience

reviews.text: Beautiful place with very comfortable atmosphere clean rooms good wifi very good staff location in down town very near from all services breakfast in restaurant is amazing everything is clean sure I will come again
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.text:
I booked this hotel based on on the good reviews and nice photos on TripAdvisor. When I checked in I found the room extremely dirty, the bed sheet had stains and worn out. The bathroom had an awful smell that we couldn't stand. Immediately i went down to the reception to ask to leave as this is a place no human can stay in. Mostafa in the reception was so polite, decent, and understanding and this guy is the only good thing in this hotel, he Immediately called Ayman the owner to ask him to give me my money back.
Here was the surprise!!!
This guy called Ayman called me saying I can't leave and he will fix the issues I am complaining about and that's all he can do. He was very rude and didn't feel that they had any problem, he was even saying that in 5 stars hotels I may face similar situations and I am the one complicating things. This guy has zero experience in customer service, zero experience in management and zero communication skills. Finally after insisting to leave they deducted one night and gave me back the rest although I didn't stay 5 minutes in this horrible place.
reviews.title: A terrible experience and a very rude owner

owner_response.text:
Hello dear Bigad. First of all, we truly appreciate your honest feedback as a genuine opportunity to improve and offering us a path to get better. We addressed your issue right when you had a call with the manager although the conversation was on high tones from your side. We were truly shattered (sorry if you took the calm and polite tone of the owner as rudeness and being unprofessional, mentioning you even refused to meet him in person) We were willing to fix the room or offer you another one because we are as all humans can make mistakes and when we do we try to correct it. Unfortunately, our policy similar to the policy of the most local hotels don't entail an immediate refund if the second party doesn't accept a solution or an available alternative. 
 As you've mentioned, there have been a lot of good reviews and people who genuinely enjoyed staying at our place and they still do and we reassure you they are humans. Besides we keep learning and developing. We offer you and your wonderful spouse sincere apologies again and we hope you forgive us and maybe give us another chance one day.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
I like the stay in Alf Lyla it was the best vacation ever.
My family and I enjoyed everything during our stay the staff is really friendly and helpful we recommend it for everyone Egyptians or foreigners.
We will never hesitate to reserve a room in ALF LYLA in our next vacation
reviews.title: Cairo

reviews.text: On e of the best stays I had in Dahab..the owner is very very friendly. The staff is amazing.. the place energy is amazing. I felt right at home .Cleanliness is excellent and following up and taking care of thiet guests f!
reviews.title: Alexandria

reviews.text:
Our room was spacious and very comfy, the hotel’s vibe is just pretty! Everyone was friendly and advising on how to do activities at great rates and assisting with drivers and bookings.
We didnt get the time to try the food but the smell was good!
Also the outdoor seating in the front was convenient at all times ❤️
reviews.title: Alf leila boutique hotel

name: Oricana Dahab
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: I've met there some of the friendliest people. The food was nice and punctual. Any staff member would come out of thier way to fulfill your needs and ensure satisfaction. very quit and peaceful. One of my favorite activities was reading near the pool. Definitely would choose to visit here again.
reviews.title: Oricana Family

reviews.text:
We come here several times, very friendly staff, quiet at night, rooms are big and good mattress, 
Price is reasonabl  
They have swimming pool. Central by the dive schools. And the shops.hope tho come here back
reviews.title: Good hotel with nice rooms and friendly staff

reviews.text:
Its a hotel that has the basic, dont expect too much, the staff is easy going and friendly.
The problems faced were the water heater is inefficient and old, the breakfast offers the bare minimum and the room itself is old, there isnt a cattle in the room nor a hair dryer
However, it was a satisfying stay
reviews.title: Bare minimum service

reviews.text: My friends and I had a wonderful stay at Oricana. the room was clean and very well maintained, the venue with the pool was very nice. It's a very peaceful and relaxing place and the staff was the most welcoming and helpful. They made our stay even better thanks to their attention and warm welcome. I definitely recommend it and would return it when I come back to Dahab for sure!
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay at Oricana Hotel

reviews.text: We were 3 girls and we had an amazing time in Dahab while staying at Oricana. We enjoyed swimming in the pool as well as in the Red Sea (Lighthouse reef and Laguna Beach) thanks to the perfect location of the hotel.The rooms were clean and the staff thoughtful and reliable. We will go back there at any time!
reviews.title: Perfect location and attentive staff

reviews.text:
I stayed at the Oricana hotel as part of a diving trip. So what does a diver need? A comfortable bed, a hot shower and a decent breakfast. The Oricana hotel provided just that and more!

The twin room is spacious, has a working AC and fridge. The breakfast provides enough choice to suit anyone's taste. If you have special dietary requirements the staff will do their best to accommodate your needs. The hotel is located just 10 mins walking from most places in Dahab, providing a nice and quiet place to rest.

The personal service of the staff was excellent. All the staff made a real effort to get to know our names and room numbers. They also made me feel super special by remembering my birthday. My room was decorated and Mr. Hossam's wife baked a birthday cake to celebrate. I never expected such personal attention!

I really enjoyed my stay and would visit again!
reviews.title: Personal service

reviews.text: Due to my work as tour organizer, I have stayed in almost all the hotels of Dahab and from my experience, Oricana is simply the best one. The staff there are extremely friendly (especially Naeem the reception manager), the location is perfect and close to everything, the rooms and hotel in general are very clean, the buffet breakfast is exceptional and most importantly it's the best place to get value for your money. I would really recommend Oricana for anyone going to Dahab. Keep up the great work guys!!
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Dahab!!

reviews.text:
I visited Oricana Hotel for a diving trip with my friends. The staff was very helpful and welcoming especially Mohamed! 
My friend’s birthday was during our stay and they were very nice and gave us complimentary sweets to celebrate.

Breakfast is great and the overall stay was positive, I’d gladly re-visit.
reviews.title: Great Stay!

reviews.text:
If you want a bit of a relaxed stay in Dahab and you want to be a bit away from the noice and hectic scenary of lighthouse, whilst still be within walking distance of all the hustle and bustle, this a very good choice to make. 
Rooms are clean and have AC,  a large frigde, television and very nice hot showers.  The poolarea is great and the juices, smoothies and other drinks made by Joe are absolutely delicious!  Breakfast is very good and Ahmed makes wonderful eggs and panecakes!
When you have a problem Mohammed at receptions tackels it right away.  So a very nice hotel with a kind and  friendly owner that you will certainly meet have a talk and a laugh with.
reviews.title: Nice clean hotel

reviews.text: I stayed at Oricana hotel from 11 to 18 October, 2018 I had a great time there the hotel is very clean they change the bed sheets and clean the room every day the people are extremely nice very helpful, it is a small hotel and the owner is right there if there is an issue you could always talk to him. You get a really a great deal for your money, I would really give it a five star.
reviews.title: Evaluation Of Oricana Hotel In Dahab

name: Hotel Planet Oasis
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
We stayed for 3 nights in the sea view suit ... enjoyed it of course 
The hotel has a perfect location in the center of the town , luxury , has a small pool . They serve a good breakfast ( open buffet) 
The suit was spacious ,air conditioned , 2 toilets- despite the bad smell from both  - and amazing terrace view 
The staff were friendly , polite and helpful.
reviews.title: Good choice

reviews.text:
Was my first time there , I stayed for 3 nights , Overall it was good 
location was perfect
Breakfast was poor no variety
Clean rooms & nice staff
Loved the cats there , they were soo nice and neutered ;)
reviews.title: Good Experience

reviews.text: Clean, spacious, close to everything. Rooms are big and convenient. Staff is extremely friendly, breakfast options are varied, location is prime. Prices are very reasonable. The pool adds a nice touch. Cleanliness is truly noteworthy. We will be back:)
reviews.title: Good option:)

reviews.text: I stayed for 2 nights. The room was clean, except some mold in the toilet. The FCU was loud, and didn't cool the room very well. The staff was good and friendly. There were several families there, some from Sharm El Sheikh. It was fun for the kids. It's close enough to the main walk, but far enough that you don't hear it.
reviews.title: Relaxing

reviews.text:
The location was excellent , the atmosphere was perfect , the ppl were friendly the breakfast was very good 
But there wasn't shampoo at the bathroom
Overall the quality of service equal the paid money
reviews.title: Good one

reviews.text:
The hotel is very well located, near the Lighthouse.
The breakfast food is nice.
The staff is very cooperative and will help you in whatever experience you want to have in Dahab.
The rooms as nicely spaced and the bathroom os nicely equipped.
reviews.title: A very nice experience

reviews.text: This is not my first time in planet oasis but the best by far. I'd like to thank Ulka for giving me a nice budget single room, I got what I paid for, I loved the vast bed. Alaa from the room service was very kind. The bathroom isn't the best thing about this room but again I got what I paid for. I'm thankful for the hot water and the air conditioner. The breakfast is good enough and variable for me, I'd love to thank the omelette guy "missed the name" who memorized my exact order after day 2 and made my omelette the way I want it without even asking. Also the receptionists were very kind to me as well as Hadi from planet cafe. I'll certainly be back to planet oasis, my home in Dahab.
reviews.title: My home in dahab

reviews.text: Totally in love with the hotel ive been going there for years and they never fail to impress me, friendly staff great clean rooms love the breakfast buffet... and the location is amazing just close to everything
reviews.title: Lovely place

reviews.text: The rooms are comfortable and clean, the staff was friendly and helpful at anytime. it is located just a few meters from the sea and there is a beach cafe in front. in the back street there is a shop very close. there is a nice pool in the yard, shared with the adjacent hotel.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text:
It was very nice week we spent there as a bed and breakfast budget rooms reasonable prices it is a very good hotel with friendly helpful staff 
We enjoyed the pool too with the family and kids the view from the pool is directly across the sea and it’s 2 mints
 walk from the sea too and the market restaurants and everything near to you supermarkets too
And the German bakery is exactly near to the back enterance 
The rooms and breakfast restaurant are really clean
And they clean the filters of the pool daily.
We enjoyed also Ramadan’s breakfast on 10th of Ramadan and they invited all Dahab’s residences to this event it was so much fun and warm atmosphere 
And they do it again 20th Ramadan .

Will definitely visit it again ♥️
reviews.title: Enjoyed our vacation

location.address: El Fanar Street Lighthouse Area, Dahab Egypt

reviews.text:
Booking: 
-Contact with Daniel (owner) was super nice and efficient 
-From initial contact to booking we exchanged few what’s apps and after 30 minutes the deal was sealed 
-I got quite a lot of hints from Daniel (where to exchange money, COVID regulations, VISA regulations, …) 
 
Pick-up: 
-He offers connect to cab service 
-The cab was both times well on time (waiting for me) and price is unbeatable comparing to other offers

Place itself: 
-I had the „top floor apartment“ in the villa 
-Quite spacy for one person 
-2 bedrooms with total of 4 beds 
-Bathroom with shower and bathtub (incl. shower) 
-Kitchen with everything that is required 
-Pool looked nice and clean 
-Quite some areas to hang-out 
 
Neighborhood: 
-Feels very safe and relaxed 
-In nighttime no noise 
 
Food: 
-As Daniel was not in Dahab his assistant from the place next door takes care of breakfast 
-He was very approachable and helpful 
-Breakfast was actually quite nice 
-Breakfast is usually as of 0830 but the „chef“ proposed to open early for me… Was very kind and I got already breakfast at 0800am  
 
Distance: 
-Bank at the corner (exchange EUR – local currency w/o a fee at the ATM)
-Small store at the corner 
-Restaurants a few blocks 
-Ocean like 250m maybe (maybe less)
-To the middle of Dahab where like all the action is approx. 15-25 min walk 
-Basically every car acts as a cab but I have walked all the time as it’s just a nice walk 
 
What to improve: 
-Wlan was sufficient for streaming but I think speed and connection could be improved (I hear it is a general issue in Dahab) considering this it was quite good 😊
 
Highly recommend for everybody who appreciates space for a good price and does not need to be down-downtown.
reviews.title: Worth a stay if you like „space in quite neighborhood for good price“ and very friendly people

location.address: New Mashraba Street, Next to the National Bank, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text:
Triple Room was a decent size. Typically Overpriced tho. Breakfast was nice. Great rooftop view. 

Good place to go with friends. Live music at night. 

Restaurant was subpar. Used fake crab. Shouldn’t do that in a coastal town with an abundance of seafood.
reviews.title: Just ok

reviews.text: The hotel has a great location and a great view (5 meters away from the sea shore), rooms are very clean, the owner is very friendly and very helpful. Also the restaurant of the hotel serves super delicious dishes of all types. I always stay there whenever I'm in Dahab.
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Dahab

reviews.text: The owner is so friendly and helpful the place is quite cheap not so clean but it was clean enough to fully enjoy my time there,almost in the middle of everywhere , good view from the window in couple rooms as well and the roof is beautiful if they only give it a bit more care tho
reviews.title: Very friendly and helpful

reviews.text:
Didn't stay at the hotel but had a meal in the beachside restaurant. Lovely food , very good prices and excellent service.
The restaurant is new and and is very clean . It's just over the bridge and has wonderful views of the bay.

£7 for both of us which included a couple of drinks too !
reviews.title: Little Gem

reviews.text: I just returned from a trip to Dahab. I didn't stay at the Bamboo House Hotel, but I ate dinner in the restaurant several times. Wonderful food...wonderful selection...wonderful service...wonderful prices...wonderful view!
reviews.title: Bamboo House Restaurant

reviews.text: Бамбу Хаус - небольшой отель в туристическом центре Дахаба, в одной минуте от Моста(Bridge). В этом мини-отеле всего семь номеров, окна половины из них выходят на Синайский залив. Номера двухместные, холодильник+телевизор+ванна, всё как обычно. Но главное скрывается на крыше. Под бамбуковыми навесами стоят столы со стеклянными столешницами, плетёная мебель и летняя кухня. Тут вы сможете сварить кофе, приготовить завтрак или просто посидеть над набережной и съесть арбуз из ближайшего супермаркета. Да, в шкафчиках открытой кухни полно продуктов, оставленных для вас такими же туристами. А посуда - от заведения.
reviews.title: Дахаб, первая линия

reviews.text:
War letzte Woche mit meiner Partnerin im Restaurant zum Essen und kann die positiven Bewertungen leider nicht nachvollziehen.

Ich bin wirklich kein besonders anspruchsvoller und auch toleranter Reisender. Die uns beiden servierten Steaks waren allerdings definitiv alt und wurden nur kurz über dem Grill aufgewärmt. Total trockene, wirklich ekelerregende alte Fleischstücke, die wir komplett an die dort anwesenden Katzen verfüttert haben.
Leider schmeckten auch die zum Essen gereichten Suppen alt und tranig, so dass wir das komplette Menü nicht essen konnten.

Meine Vermutung: 
die Restaurants leiden wegen des ausbleibenden Touristenstroms unter Besuchermangel und können ihre Speisekarte kaum aufrecht erhalten.
Aber warum um Himmels willen wird dann die Karte nicht einfach reduziert und trotzdem Qualität geboten ???
Pikanterweise wurde uns das bestellte Menü auch noch empfohlen.

Ich war wirklich sehr enttäuscht und kann dieses Restaurant nicht empfehlen :-(.
reviews.title: Schlechtes Essen

reviews.text:
ホットシャワーは出ますが、塩水です。
部屋は清潔ではありますが質素です。
すぐ近くにクラブがあって、深夜までうるさいです。
セーフティボックスはホテルのフロントが預かってくれますが、朝チェックアウト後、責任者がくるまで出せないとずいぶん待たされました。
値段の割には良くないです。
reviews.title: 泊まらないかな

reviews.text:
Just as described this is a small hotel within easy walking distance of the restaurants, cafes and dive centres near and alongside the bay in Dahab.

Very comfortable bed in a room with good air conditioning and nice lighting that can be operated using a remote control.

Some rooms overlook the road so there is traffic noise including the tooting of horns much of the time.  This was not a problem for me and disturbed my sleep less than music and noise from cafes or restaurants would have done.

There are uninterrupted views to the mountains and also to the north of Dahab from the roof top.

The team were friendly and there was always someone around which I find reassuring.  

A simple packed breakfast was delivered in the evening with bread, yoghurt, fruit, jam, honey, butter and soft cheese.  The in room fridge had plenty of room for this and to hold your drinks.

The bathroom was large and fully tiled so there was no problem using the hand held shower  over the bath even though there was no curtain.  Water pressure was good and there was always hot water.

If you are happy with a short walk to the main bay area, a bit of traffic noise and are looking for a room to use as a base this could be a good choice for you.

A transfer to and from Sharm Airport was arranged via messages with Muhammad.  

Thank you to the team at the hotel for a comfortable stay.
reviews.title: Comfortable room a short walk from the bay and lighthouse areas

reviews.text: We came here first time but will come back here soon again.Everything was nice and clean.We was very happy staying here.The locatioin is good and the people is friendly.Everuthing was near and the weather was fine!
reviews.title: Beautiful place

reviews.text:
Für meine Zwecke absolut ausreichend! Da man in Dahab überall für kleines Geld essen kann braucht man ausser einem Bett und einer Dusche sowieso nichts.
WiFi gibt´s für umsonst.
Das Personal ist super hilfsbereit!
reviews.title: Mein Domizil während des IDC

reviews.text: Nous avons passées 1 mois super dans un appartement très jolis à baby-fish, très bon accueil et surtout les managers parlent francais et nous ont beaucoup aidés a trouvés des endroits parfait pour notre séjour, possibiliter de cuisiner et magasins a proximité et surtout très tranquillité absolue avec unecharmante palmeraie ajouxée a la résidence ou l'on peut se reposer en toute quiètude, a voir absolument.
reviews.title: traquilité, repos et bon prix

reviews.text: bonjour, j'ais été pendant un séjour de 2 semaines dans cette établissement. le prix et très correct ainssi que le personnel très chaleureux, j'ais pu me reposer ainsi de faire la plongée et avoir des prix très correct avec le menager de l'établissement, le personnel est très serviable parle, français italien et espagnol, c'est très rare de trouver des personnes qui parlent notre langue
reviews.title: un coin très chaleureux et en toute tranquiliter

reviews.text: I have been to Jaz Dahabeya in November 2019. I stay their the third time, and I think it is the best place in Laguna for serfing and relax. Three serfing stations 50-100 meters along the beach. I hope, i'll be back.
reviews.title: Nice place
reviews.partner_attribution: Review collected in partnership with this hotel

reviews.text: Sehr gerne sind wir im jaz dahabeya. Alle Mitarbeiter Vorort sind sehr zuvorkommend und Sorgen für einen entspannten Urlaub. Es bleibt kein Wunsch offen.  Alles ist sehr gepflegt. Gerne kommen wir wieder.
reviews.title: Sehr guter Service

location.address: Next To Sababa Hotel By The Main Promenadd, Dahab 46617 Egypt

name: Jaz Dahabeya
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: Located right on the best beach  the Sinai.  A well-run laid back establishment at a very good price. Not as glitzy as its neighbours, and more in tune with its desert environment. We chose the half board option, but actually ate out most evenings at one of the towns seaside restaurants, as dining is very inexpensive. For this reason we did not take the all-inclusive option. Try and secure a seaview room, but pool view is fine.
reviews.title: Laid back option on excellent beach

reviews.text: Great hotel in dahab. Stayed here for 3 nights in March 2023. The room was spacious and clean, the staff was helpful and friendly, the food was good.  They have a nice beach were you can swim, enjoy and relax. Overall I will happily recommend it.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in Dahab

reviews.text: The hotel is more than wonderful and we spent a fabulous family trip. I believe it is the best resort in all of Dahab. The food quality was excellent and there was much varieties, the room was clean and tidy  and the atmosphere in the hotel is fascinating. The staff there really friendly and spare no effort to serve us and work for our most satisfaction. I would like to thank the hotel management for their respectful response with my family when we had a road accident in Dahab downtown, they were trying to help us in every possible way. A special thanks to Mr. Hussein Mohamed from the reception who was care about us every moment and facilitating our movement and not only that, he also prepared lunch boxes for us during our long return trip. Special thanks also to Mr. Ashraf Barakat and the restaurant manager for their kind hospitality and generous service. We hope visting this resort soon to complete our unfinished trip right there.
reviews.title: Thanks Jaz Dahabya!

name: Dahab Divers Lodge
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
I was recommended this diving centre by my father, who is a diving enthusiast himself and was taken here by his colleagues and friends on a holiday trip. They were well known by the owner(s) of Dahab Divers Lodge. When he told me they were very relaxed but fervent at the same time, I was expecting a nice experience. The real thing, however, has still taken me by surprise. From the first moment onwards they treated me like I was a friend, cracking jokes and laughing throughout the first orientation of the course. Later, when we met our diving instructor, I was waiting to see what type of person he was. He seemed to have been selected for the same reason so many people enjoy hanging out at the DDL: very relaxed, thorough and passionate when explaining diving concepts and always ready to answer any questions.
To make a long story short: I fell in love with Dahab and with diving because of the Dahab Divers Lodge, and I recommend everyone go to this place if you’re a complete beginner. No matter from where you start, you’ll leave this place a diver.

Much love,
Hendrik
reviews.title: Simply the best.

reviews.text: We had an awesome time at the Dahab Divers Lodge where my brother and 2 friends of us had our first experiences with diving by taking the Open Water Padi Course! All was taken care of: wetsuits, snorkels, cilinders etc! And our instructor was a super calm, relaxed, experienced, skillful and friendly teacher (Ahmed Baahr)! Everyone we encountered was friendly as well :) We enjoyed it so much that we will also be taking the Advanced Diving Course!! So take a chance (and a dive) and definitely visit the Divers Lodge <3 We will for sure come back!
reviews.title: Amazing Dive Open Water Course!

reviews.text:
Dogs are everywhere, a lot of them on the street, also Egyptians young people have a dog as a status symbol, they prefer pitt bulls.
If you don't like dogs, stay away from Dahab till the government take good actions.
Its a crazy situation.
reviews.title:
Dahab. is changing in a not good way
First I call Dahab DOG CITY

reviews.text: Stayed there for NYE, very clean and comfortable rooms with great bathrooms and an amazing location and excellent price. The host was brilliant, very helpful and accommodating. Will always stay there!
reviews.title: Great place to stay!

reviews.text: It is the perfect place to stay. The location is central and  all the best restaurants and attractions are  between 1-5 minutes walking distance. The cleans are so CLEAN and COZY. The common area is beautiful and the atmosphere is chilled and comforting. I will only stay here and recommend it for everyone; families, couples, friends and even solo-travelers!
reviews.title: Best Place to Stay in Dahab

reviews.text:
We stayed 2 nights in the lodge, and it was perfect. It's the cleanest accommodation we have ever had in Dahab and super charming. The room was bright and colorful with basic furnishings with loads of character. The roof dome and the decoration made the room feel authentic and welcoming. Despite its location close to the Lighthouse area, it's very quiet at night yet close to all the restaurants and shops. 

We also dove with the Dahab Divers Lodge dive centre who never fail to impress us. They are super well organized with dedicated lockers and dedicated drying areas for all the equipment of each diver. They have great dive guides, very helpful staff and well-maintained rental equipment. 

All in all a perfect experience that we recommend to anyone going to Dahab.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text:
Review is divided into three parts, part 1 location, part 2 is for the lodge and part 3 for the dive center

Part#1 location
Location: 2 mins walking distance from light house diving spot- the main spot in dahab city

1 min from everything in Dahab, pharmacy, restaurants, cafes and amazing Ralph German bakery

—————————————-

Part#2 the lodge

The lodge is simply amazing

Rooms are simple with all basic facilities 
AC
Private bathroom
Hot water
Towels

Windows in many places
Beds are clean and nice
Design is simply beautiful

Hatem the lodge owner is a very nice, helpful and decent guy
He insisted to be there to welcome me and always offering help and making sure everything is going perfectly 

They use only eco friendly plastic bags :)

——————————————-
Part #3 dive center

Dive center experience is superb with a lot of help from Ibrahim the dive center owner and manager along with amazing staff

The system for diving gear storage, cleaning and managing is very nice

Amazing diving instructor whom are friendly and always helpful an offering nice tips and tricks
reviews.title: Super lodge & dive center

reviews.text:
We must’ve stayed in maybe 10 different places in our previous visits to Dahab, but this is the only one we came back to. 

With Dahab, you never really know what you’ll get, accommodation often goes into a state if disrepair and you’ll often find things like a faulty toilet or burnt out lightbulbs or sheets that seem to have bought in 1996. But Dahab Divers Lodge is newly furnished, and very well maintained. We came 4 years ago, and it seemed like it was exactly the same this time.

The lodge is furnished in good taste, and everything is clean and in great shape. You’ll find bathroom amenities in place, and rooms smell like freshly cleaned linen. ACs are new and the upper floor domes give a great, spacious feel, with beautiful natural sky lights in the morning.

Hatem is always available if you need anything, he is one of the friendliest hotel managers we know.

We’ll definitely be coming back here soon.
reviews.title: A gem

reviews.text:
it worm welcoming very nice and helpful people so supportive.nice cozy place 
clean rooms served with all your needs towels and candles  near to the beach and markets so easy to access.so ken to make you satisfied and happy.give you all help you need.
reviews.title: it was short trip to dahab

reviews.text:
Had 3 days diving with them canyon, pools, blue hole, Abu Talha, and moray garden
Thanks Nemo our dive instructor, Saadany, and Ibrahim the owners
Friendly staff, excellent gear, and reasonable prices
reviews.title: Well organized and friendly

name: 4S Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: Outwardly, we liked the hotel, settled in. There is a swimming pool, the rooms are small, but OK. At night we woke up from the screams of a man. He screamed as if he was dying from 12 to 4 o'clock in the morning. He was obviously very drunk. The staff didn't do anything to stop it. We were waiting for the next day to be normal. But the crazy man was yelling again. We couldn't live in this hotel and moved.
reviews.title: The man screamed for 3 nights

reviews.text: Disgusting! Very high audibility in the rooms. We had wild neighbors. They were screaming and running all night. There was nothing we could do to make them quiet down. We left this hotel, it's terrible!
reviews.title: Terrible

reviews.text: The hotel is just amazing it's very clean and has everything you might need for your stay the rooms are spacious and clean and its a walking distance from the lagoona and the board walk the breakfast is good but it doesn't have many items and the ping pong and pool table are a nice addition
reviews.title: Hidden gem

reviews.text: Apartment hotel, nice not big, cozy atmosphere. Very nice staff. Nice to sit around the pool. Far from the promenade but yes a walking bar. Suitable for families, for those who dive and just for those who come to rest
reviews.title: sweet home

reviews.text: The room was comfortable, big, the hotel facilities are new and the pool is great for swimming. Everything is very clean and neat. The restaurant is good and serves an Egyptian breakfast. It's close to the main diving areas in Dahab buy not too close, so you can sleep in peace and quiet. But the outstanding part was definitely Osama: he's one of the managers and probably the most helpful host I've had, he was always checking to see if we got everything we needed, would quickly solve any issues and requests we had even the ones not related directly to the hotel and also cared about our experience around Dahab. I honestly felt like I was home. It was a good service for a good price. Oh there's a bonus: the hotel has a partnership with a diving center so it makes it easier to book the hotel + dive lessons if you decide to get them. Thank you for that, Sayid!
reviews.title: Great stay, I recommend it!

reviews.text: I stayed at the 4s for 5 days holiday really I felt my self as it's my home and I live here from long time, the staff welcoming was very nice and warm away of them hekping you by arranging all Dahab trips and let you discover Dahab on their way, pool was clean breakfast was good and it's only 7 minutes walk to AL mamsha and all the shops. I wait for the next visit to the 4s thank you all my friends and love you all 4s team..

Good hospitality

reviews.text:
I enjoyed my stay very much at Solaris Villa. I liked everything about my stay, mainly because of the
1)  location is unique, as its a beach front villa, with great view of the sea and the mountain..  It's 8 minute walk by the beach to the light house
2) Direct and Private access to the beach
3) Relaxing: You can enjoy Dahab daily activities and parties but enjoy a good night sleep
4) Staff: There were very respectful, considerate  and  helpful
5)  Room Facilities: it has a kitchenette (microwave, mini fridge, kettle, mini-stove, plates, mugs, etc), heating AC, clean bathroom, hot water, covers and towels. 

Most importantly, it's pet friendly <3 and I had my cats with me thanks to Ms. Amal great help.

Totally recommended
reviews.title: Great Stay with breath taking View

reviews.text:
Starting from its light colors and beautiful facade, the rooms are beautiful, clean, and calm, it also has a kitchenette which can be very handy for light use and convince.
 The owner was really friendly and arranged the booking and payment most conveniently.

In all, a great sea view sitting area, beautiful place, clean rooms, and friendly stuff
reviews.title: Calm and beautiful with great sea view.

reviews.text:
People come to Solaris for comfort, peace of mind and great Swimming Experience. Solaris is in a good place in Asslah, with local beduin lifestyle and lots of coral reefs.
Not much amenities, however you never miss anything.
Clean and People are high class
reviews.title: Comfy and Lovely

reviews.text:
For the second year Solaris still the best place to stay in Dahab, Asala
Great view
Clean and cozy furniture and atmosphere. 
Some renovations and upgrades were done from previous year
