reviews.text: The best place to feel like home , People there are so friendly , The view is amazing , the best place to sea sunrise in and the place  is very clean  . people are so helpful to do any activities in dahab
reviews.title: HOME

reviews.text: We had an incredible stay and great time at Solaris. The location is amazing with stunning views of the sea and mountains. The staff are extremely friendly, welcoming and caring, and make you feel you are among family. The room is spacious and super clean, furnished perfectly, with kitchen supplies, so you have everything you need. It is so close to Assalah market and a walking distance to mamsha. A perfect belnd of simplicity, serenity, accessibility, and coziness. Definitely will come back again and again,and it will be my first choice whenever I am back to Dahab ❤️
reviews.title: One of the very best places in Dahab

reviews.text:
Our stay, me and 2 of my friends, is 11 nights in Jan 2021. 

I really enjoyed. It is amazing place, great view in the most beautiful place in Dahab, Assla. It is nearest to the markets, supermarkets, groceries, and also ATM machines. It is also near to Almamsha if you love walking or just few minutes by bike or a local car.

The room is very clean and there are all of tools we need. Mrs.Amal, Dr.Alaa the managers, Ahmad, Younes, and Khaled are very respectful and very polite, helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Perfect Place in Dahab

reviews.text:
Clean and tidy. rooms are spacious. great location right on the sea, outside centre of dahab but walking distance.
nice chilled area outside and also on the roof.
friendly and easy-going staff, and economical budget.
reviews.title: Dahab

reviews.text:
The receptionist, Tito, organized a trip to Mount Sinai for us after eating breakfast. The trip was amazing with the best tour guide that we encountered on the hike. 

Upon return to Dahab, Tito was also nice enough to organize a taxi ride to Sharm El Sheikh airport. 

Although we didn't stay here, Tito showed us accommodations. They were very clean with a stellar view of the Red Sea. If we were to stay longer in Dahab, we would've booked a couple nights. 

The restaurant has beautiful scenery, delicious breakfast and the absolute BEST Turkish coffee I had in all of Sinai and Jordan!
reviews.title: A nice café/hotel on the waterfront

reviews.text: I had a really nice 2.5 week stay in the Jasmin Hotel! What I loved most about the hotel and restaurant is the staff. Very friendly and helpful, always! I stayed in one of the rooms with seaview, and I loved the view! The room has all you need; it was cleaned every few days, AC worked well, clean towels etc. Furthermore, the food in the restaurant is really good, and I loved my breakfast every morning. It was freshly cooked and they make it exactly how you like it. If you're looking for an affordable place with seaview, delicious food and nice staff, this is your place!
reviews.title: All you need!

reviews.text:
We came to know the Jasmine pension through our search for a trip to the Coloured Canyon. We met Tito who works there and who promised us a trip there full of good surprises with a group of people that have already signed in. We paid 500EGP each in advance as requested (the trip was planned for two days later) but, of course, the following day we received a WhatsApp message from him with a funny excuse: "the trip is cancelled because of the hot wheather and the police wouldn't let us through." It was planned to be 38°, as pretty much every day in Dahab at this time of the year. But hey, he promised us that the trip would take place another two days later. And again, the following day, we received message saying that the trip is cancelled...because he actually didn't have enough people.

So we had to go back to the Jasmine hotel to get our money back. We were angry because Tito actually lied to us and he sent us the messages late in the evening so we couldn't even plan another trip. As Tito kept searching for excuses, he get me angry and I throw my bag of leftover food on the floor. At this moment another man (probably the manager), older and taller, came to us and grabbed my boyfriend by the neck and tried to kick him and kept coming at us and threatening us physically.
reviews.title: Day trips and safaris to avoid by all means!!

reviews.text: We are second time to jasmine palace and still lovely place and enjoyed the pool with the anination team and ramadan was lovely on the pool help us with the Towels and clean the pool and evening show was so nice
reviews.title: Amazing holiday in jasmine

reviews.text: I stayed there many times and every single visit is a souvenir for me. A perfect one actually. Rooms are affordable, the view is stunning, position is perfect and the food delicious. Cant ask for more. Tito is an unbelievable manager and can organize any trip around you ask for (desert, canyons, ATV, Motocross, bedouin camps, etc. You just have to stop by when you visit Egypt, its a must!
reviews.title: Wonderful, as usual!

reviews.text:
I stayed an amazing 5 consecutive days at this place and I really had relaxing time, the view and the service are just perfect.
It's so relaxing out there and the breakfast was tasty 
The crew was friendly
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED ❤️
reviews.title: Amazing experience

reviews.text:
Hello , we just had a very good stay.
Tito and his staff were welcoming , good natured , willing to help with travel arrangements and room amenities.
Away from the main area of the tourist zone but only a 5 minutes stroll away.
Easy access out the back door and cheaper locals restaurants , grocery store and services ie ATM and pharmacy.
Good food and prices in the restaurant as well with great beach location for hanging out. Evening firepit on request with shiesha!
We would book again, good value for the room and breakfast.
Enjoy.
reviews.title: Sweet hangout

reviews.text:
Well the hotel or pension the view is almost the best price is good cleaning is ok, if you look for nice view so close to the see for relaxing maybe yoga i suggest here, also staff are so polite and friendly
Thanks Tito and Ahmed hk and Ahmed of service
reviews.title: Diving trip in Dahab

reviews.text: This place is awesome. After long days of diving, we always looked forward to going to this place for drinks and shisha. You could not ask for a more relaxing place. The staff are super friendly and are great with kids. Sometimes you’ll even be joined by puppies and  cats. Plus, you can’t beat the view. Highly recommended and see you again in a few weeks!
reviews.title: My new favorite cafe/restaurant

reviews.text: Very comfy, amazing location, the view is awesome, the staff are very decent and helpful, great for friends and couples if you need a relaxing time, never had such nice stay with that cost, strongly recommend it and it will be my destination everytime in dahab
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: Spent a wonderful week at Sindbad camp. Everyone there is very friendly and the atmosphere is laid back and welcoming. The rooms are comfortable but you will want to spend time in the outside spaces. I would recommend getting up early to see the spectacular sun rise from the café. I am already planning to return next year.
reviews.title: Fantastic place

reviews.text:
This simple basic camp is friendly, clean & welcoming.
First of all I have to say the coffee is the best I had in Dahab hands down! The food is delicious and plentiful.
The rooms are basic but clean. The outside living spaces are perfect for reading, relaxing, sunbathing, socialising or just peace.
I am already planning my trip next year, a very special place 🙏🏽
reviews.title: Already planning to return!

reviews.text:
The place has this outstanding location right by the sea, friendly staff and good value for money, they also offer a nice breakfast.I stayed there for 4 days but Im going back for sure!
The place is perfect if you’re either traveling solo or with friends.
reviews.title: A real nice place

reviews.text: The staff are discriminative against Egyptians for no obvious reason. Hassan didn't allow me to rent a room claiming that its all fully booked, although when my foreign friend asked she was allowed to stay. It's sickening how Egyptians can't enjoy places in their own land!
reviews.title: Discriminative staff!

reviews.text:
Nothing can be said to describe the amazing vibs in the camp. Everything is available and simple.
When you stay here you feel like home as you feel the Sindbad family spirit mixed with Dahab vibes and relaxation environment.
reviews.title: Kindest staff and amazing Seaview

reviews.text: Totally loved this place. Simple but it has everything you might need. The shared toilets are kept spotless all the times and so are the rooms. If you stay make sure you have breakfast there as well, as the food is really good.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Very nice place! Fair price for a room that has all it needs (basically just a bed, the rest of the living is done outside), hammocks, chillroom with books, neat bathrooms with hot water and very taste food in restaurant for a good price
reviews.title: Very relaxing place!

reviews.text: Wow i already miss the camp and the staff very much. It was one of the nicest places i ever found in travelling. Its exactly what you wish to find somewhere. Hassan and his team are like a big, cute family treating guests excellent and making the atmosphere so nice like it is. Its clean, the prices are more than fair, you can get great coffee just in front of the ocean everyday and sitting in a chilled area with or without people..like you want. They treat their animals very kind and you feel safe, like home. Very impressing place and people. I love it and i want to come back.
reviews.title: Found a new home in dahab!!!

reviews.text: I have been visiting Dahab since 1987 and Sindbad is one of the last places you can stay there that resembles the old-style original camps, although the huts in those days were just made of grass and often had open-top, star-gazing roofing! If you are looking for 5* luxury complete with air-con and room service at the end of the phone, then this is probably not the place for you! However, if you are looking for budget accommodation which is clean and friendly with first-class hosts, Hassan and Salama, then look no further! Sit in the harisha, traditional sunken sitting area covered in colourful rugs and cushions, and meet fellow travellers and holiday-makers from all around the world! Or you can swing in the camp's hammock and read one of the books from Sindbad's library! Amazing welcome, amazing food from the Sindbad kitchen and amazing atmosphere! Sindbad is at the quieter northern end of Dahab and is just a stone's throw from stunning snorkelling at the Lighthouse reef where you can just wade out into the water and swim among the fish! It is also just a few minutes' walk from all the restaurants and cafes along the seafront. I love it and can't wait to go back! 🙂
reviews.title: Old-style bedouin camp in the quieter part of Dahab

reviews.text: Everything was exactly what I was looking for in a hostel in Dahab. It was an authentic bedouin camp that was very laid back and comfortable. The staff was incredibly helpful. The food was amazing! Make sure to try Moses's breakfast. It was something special. The location is perfect for Dahab. Its not on the main strip but a 1 minute walk. It adds to the laid-back atmosphere being around the corner from the action. Overall, an amazing experience and absolutely recommend!
reviews.title: One of the coolest hostels I've ever stayed at

name: Seaview Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: I am writing this review to share my personal experience in seaview. Seaview is one of the very good hotels in Dahab. The location is perfect near from El mamsha,  restaurants and from different beaches. The staff is amazing and welcoming. The rooms are always clean and tiddy. If you want to enjoy your stay in Dahab in a clean hotel with reasonable price then i do recommend seaview.
reviews.title: Review about Seaview warm hospitality in October 2022

reviews.text: I spent 3 nights .. overall it is a place just for sleeping after a long day .. staff is friendly and helpful .. breakfast is good but it is the same everyday .. rooms is not the best and it's bath is not too bad .. it's location is a little far from restaurants (about 15 mins walking) .. Simply it is a good place  for sleep only after a long activites in the day.
reviews.title: 3 nights

reviews.text:
I'll start with the good things: nice helpful staff, good breakfast (yet basic), it has a beach, clean, and good comfortable beds.
Disadvantages: basic not well equipped rooms, a bit far (25 mins walk to the lighthouse), old, they always serve the same breakfast, and very old fashioned bathroom/showers.
For us- 2 friends who were looking for a place to sleep after a long day at the beach- it was good. 
But I don't think good it's good for couples.
reviews.title: Ok hotel, a bit far.

reviews.text: The hotel has an excellent location and the view of the sea is awesome. The staff are so friendly and professional. Mr. Hossam the manager is a real gentleman and so professional. Bas a at the front desk is such a gem 💎 cheerful and friendly.. Medo at the beach Cafe is so friendly and helpful.. The pool, the breakfast, the room everything was great and beyond my expectations.. For a female who's staying alone or for girls in general it's the safest place you can stay in.. I highly recommend it to everyone
reviews.title: Seaview ⛱️🏆

reviews.text:
It used to be good, now it's a stay-away-from junk.
I stayed in this hotel two times before, in summer 2015 and 2016, both were very good visits. However, my most recent visit was traumatizing (August 2020). 
The hotel used to be safe for families and women, now in 2020 It's not. The manager and one member of the staff verbally harassed me and my sister. They moved forward with their unacceptable behaviour and attempted at suggesting to get us into some uncanny situations. We were able to put them in their places.
The management didn't honour their agreement with us too. Before booking the room, we agreed on a late check-out. Having stayed for five days without being requested to expedite the check-out time, the management, out of nowhere, unilaterally decided to evoke the agreement in our very last day of the visit. They "instructed" us to leave 5 hours before the agreed time. We had to interrupt our activities, rush to the hotel and get ready to leave. We ended up spending the last 5 hours of our trip tired and angry until the bus departure time. 
We gave the owner the benefit of the doubt, assuming these violations were inflicted without his knowledge. We thought he'd listen as we know him from the previous visits when he used to run the hotel himself. I am sorry to say after two long calls, he was only annoyed for how much a review we wrote to the hotel FB page would cost him money. 
We're both disappointed and sorry. It's a shame such a nice hotel had to be sunk into this level of unprofessional and unethical behaviour.
reviews.title: worest manager ever even from the owner of the hotel , it's not safe , Harassment

reviews.text: From the moment they picked us up we were treated like family.  The rooms are spacious and the hotel is right on the beach.  The manager Hossam and our driver Mido bent over backwards to make sure our stay was perfect.  Breakfast was delicious and the tours we booked were so much fun!  The hotel is about a 5 minute walk along a boardwalk to the center of town, it's perfect because it is close but quiet.  They will serve you breakfast by the pool, in your room, or on the beach overlooking the Red Sea and Saudi Arabia in the distance. You can also snorkel right in front of the hotel or a short walk to the lighthouse or the lagoon if it is windy. Again, cannot recommend enough!
reviews.title: Best place in Dahab

reviews.text:
Highly recommend Seaview Hotel in Dahab. Best place ever, everything you need is there. 
First of all location is perfect, The rooms either direct or side sea view are perfect , very clean, quite and comfy 
More importantly, the amazing staff Mr. Hossam and Ms.Sara They were very supportive, Friendly and treat you as a family member.
whatever you need is done. 
Thnx Alot Hossam for everything..
Of course won't forget to mention Mr. Adel the owner is a really decent man and always thinking how to make the hotel better 

Really loved to have my breakfast by the beach with Bedouin-tea hearing the sound of waves watching the Red Sea in-front of you, there is nothing more relaxing than this.
Loved every second of it. THNX ALOT
reviews.title: Heaven on earth

reviews.text: I would like to thank each and everyone in the hotel for their hospitality , we had a pleasant vacation and will definitely come back ,The staff there is the friendliest ever and they made sure to make our stay very comfortable,they even helped in arranging trips and suggesting what we can do there, The hotel has it's own beach infront of it and it's only 5 mins walk to the busy area which contains all restaurants ,shops and whatever you need , the breakfast isn't diverse and it's a set menu but it was more than enough , They have a very nice pool as well . if you are looking for a cozy and relaxing place then this is what you definitely need
reviews.title: Lovely Place , Amazing Staff

reviews.text:
The Staff are really nice friendly and cheerful all the time, especially Ms. Sarah the receptionist who helped us during check in and she helped us with a recommended tours with a really good prices, also the buffet was convenient comparing the price with a good taste. 
We would go there again for the nice staff.
reviews.title: Awesome Staff

reviews.text: I booked the hotel for 6 days from 05/10/2019 till 11/10/2019 . The hotel was so relaxing and cozy . Prices are very reasonable and it takes less than 5 minutes to be in El Mashraba st., which is the main street on Dahab . Food is not diverese but beside that the location is in the center of Dahab and minutes away from everything . Restaurants and activity locations are close by and it's located on beach . Stuff are very helpful Especially Hossam and Mido and Sarah . Pool is also need some renovation and steps added to it . But all in all it was a beautiful week and a great vacation which i will repeat soon .
reviews.title: A week in Paradise

reviews.text:
Bad smell allover the camp, Dirty BATHROOM!!!!!, Dirty rooms. مكان قذر 

You can increase your budget a little bit and enjoy your trip in better places in dahab.

Note: photos are not Real on trip advisor
reviews.title: DON'T GO

reviews.text: Come to Dahab it is an amazing place! 200 is a lot of words there is a hammock a volleyball area a campfire big screen relax staff vintage vibe exotic there is communal kitchen but not in use but falafel is cheap so I can only recommend!
reviews.title: Nice staff cozy inner garden good location! Good value for Ur money!!

reviews.text:
The manager of this hostel is a thief. During our third night it was literally raining in our room so we were forced to move to another hotel, the employees were trying there best but their manager stopped answering their call. During the rain a big part of our clothes and stuff were wet so we lost a lot of time and we kindly asked for a reimbursement but the manager strictly refused and gave the order to not give us any cash. Like it was not enough, we’ve been threatened. 

Unfortunately this manager doesn’t deserve his employees and should be sanctioned.
reviews.title: This place is a scam

reviews.text:
Freshly arrived from Jordan, I checked in at 3am without any booking. I woke up at 12pm, the manager Assad comes to me, without even saying hello, how are you or even introducing himself to me and say : "it's 12 you need to leave right now!" I looked at him, laugh and tell him that I just woke up, we are 3 people including myself in the miserable place, there is dozen of other rooms so what's the matter? He said that it's the rule, Check in at 2pm, check out 10am so he was already doing me a favor. I told him that he was very stupid to react this way because I arrived late anyway so you can't apply this rule. He got mad and told me that he will call the police if I don't leave the place immediately. I laugh again, paid 100pounds instead of 150 and left. 
SO I RECOMMAND YOU GUYS TO NOT GO THIS PLACE EXCEPT IF YOU THINK THIS IS NORMAL
reviews.title: AVOID THIS PLACE

reviews.text:
This place was the most reasonably priced accommodation in dahab. Service is kind and professional. It is a hostel however so u don’t get the luxuries of an inn or hotel. 

They rent snorkel masks and provide other services. I saw a sand board by the front desk!

Wifi is always a plus and provided at camp😀
reviews.title: Adequate hostel

reviews.text:
People must be kidding by rating this place with more than 2 stars!! It is neither fancy as a hotel, nor too close to the beach like most of the camps in sinai. They don't even have a view of the beach (the photos of the beach are fake).
The entrance of the place is a narrow lane that smelled of sewage. I had to change the room twice because of problems with the facilities and I ended up with a room with a broken AC remote control.
You don't feel clean around; the WC as an example, I felt like I want to wash my hand after using the sink! so you can imagine the feeling after using the toilet! They don't provide sope BTW. And the water is very salty, so taking a shower is not that refreshing.
There was many people around who were neither guests nor staff which was uncomfortable and unprofessional.
As a conclusion, I've been to simpler camps and less equipped places. But this place doesn't have the mesmerising touch with nature that may forgive any other drawbacks. And it's not cheap, It has almost the same rate of pricing that better and cleaner places in dahab offers.
reviews.title: A place that shall not exist

reviews.text: It was my second time to stay in Bishbishi garden village, it was a great choice, the staff are polite and friendly specially Sabry, the rooms are pretty decent for sleeping. The place is quiet and private. The location of the hostel is amazing right in the heart of the market.
reviews.title: Great as usual

reviews.text: Not nearly as good as many of the other hotels in Dabab. Not really very clean and in need a of a good renovation!  The room sizes were fine and the food was passable in the restaurant, fairly close to the centre, but not on the waterfront.
reviews.title: Pretty basic and not very clean

reviews.text: The only thing positive was the staff. However, they could do a bit more cleaning than hanging around. The bathrooms were filthy, the mattresses and pillows questionable, and the huts had this patched up roof with tons of places where mosquitoes could just build a home into. My friend and I were eaten alive that night by mosquitoes even with a plugin to help out. That clearly didn't work. We had to cover our entire bodies up with our heads inside the sheet to get some relief. Our fan didn't work either so you an imagine how hot it was. It was one of the most uncomfortable nights I've ever had. So sure, the landscape/sitting area is nice, but it's also mosquito infested. There are plenty of places to escape from these bloodsuckers but you will not find relief here. Sorry. I would not recommend this place to anyone. Plus, I found an even cheaper room at a hotel the next day that was bigger, had its own bathroom inside, hot water, a working fan, and 1/10th the mosquito problems.
reviews.title: How does this place have such good reviews??

reviews.text:
That was awesome , the staff and the owner was really friendly , view is lovely .
Room & service and quality was perfect.
I had a great time in bishbishi 
I recommend this place to anyone who love to come to dahab
reviews.title: The best place ever in Dahab

reviews.text: Great value hotel located by the beach to the southern, quieter, end of the main tourist area. Helpful and friendly proprietor and staff. Clean and spacious room.  I had an enjoyable stay at Sunsplash.
reviews.title: Great value hotel.

reviews.text:
I like to travel a lot, but this hotel was the place with the best service I ever had so far. Helpful, quick service, and understandable support from the booking until the end of our stay, while the covid time.

The hotel and the rooms are beautiful and clean and the environment was charming.

The diving was amazing and professional.
We where there with our whole family (with 2 kids and a baby) and everybody felt more than welcome.
The food was delicious and more than enough. 

We definitely will come back.
reviews.title: wonderful hotel, amazing and professional diving, lovely food and super service

reviews.text:
I felt great at Sunsplash, rooms furnished in high quality and similar to a rated hotel room, pleasant landscape in the center of the place and clean private beach.
The place located in a quite area which you will enjoy serenity.
The stuff are helpful , polite and make delicious dinner and fantastic flavored coffee which i was addicted to it.
Sayed the owner is the man of details and he cares for happiness and comfort of every guest.
Definitely i would come back in here.
reviews.title: Unique place

reviews.text: We had the best couple of days at this beautiful hotel. The service and staff were so friendly, helpful and respectful- we couldn’t have asked for a better experience. All trips etc were organised for us by the hotel manager as well as diving. The food was also delicious and good value. Great location as well with a private beach and only a short walk to town. Would highly recommend!
reviews.title: Amazing amazing stay

reviews.text:
It's almost 3 months in dahab now between many places .. the longest time for me in sunsplash .. good energy away from the noises .. the ppl so friendly & its directly on the see neer the coolest place to dive
I really love the place 💜
reviews.title: Place with awesome energy

reviews.text:
This is the second time I returned to sunsplash and it won't be the last time, I promise! 
Very nice rooms, excellent kitchen and super service also for snorkelers, very attractive excursions and a super fair price-service-balance.
Thank you very much Sayed for unforgettable vacations!
reviews.title: just perfect

reviews.text:
Very bad attitude , not helpful , expensive comparing with alot of alternative around 
I didn’t enjoyed at all 
I checked out at 10 pm & I kept my clothes to dry as well left my luggage for few since my flight at evening  & when I came back to get my luggage , he was very rude & not welcoming to go to bathroom
reviews.title: Rude owner

reviews.text: This is the second time we come back to Dahab and stay at Sunsplash. I guess there is not much to explain when you decide to repeat accomodation at the same place. Rooms are confortable and clean, food is excelent and it is placed in front of the beach and a coral reef. But what it makes this place special is the professionalism of the diving team as well as the charming environment during our stay.
reviews.title: Charming, easy-going, good food, good servide and perfect for diving

reviews.text:
We definitely enjoyed our stay here. The dive center and hotel is professionally run to western standards. The dive instructors/divemasters are capable and knowledgeable. My son (16 years) had a real quality OWD course, and really enjoyed it, while we enjoyed some very memorable diving sites around Dahab. Probably the best place to learn that I've seen, and combined with the Red Sea diving, amazing.
The trip into the desert with Anita was incredible and definitely not the standard tourist junk, so I would definitely recommend that even if you lose a couple of dives!!!

Dahab is still fairly empty due to the general middle east problems, which means it is a buyers market if you want to do any shopping, but I would guess that the BIG advantage is that there are a lot less divers around. We had no issues walking around the town at night or otherwise, you do notice they have a lot of security police around.
I can understand why people keep returning here. :-)
reviews.title: Easter 2015

reviews.text: I enjoyed all aspects of SunSplash Hotel during my month-long stay in July 2013 (as I have four past summers). The meals (two a day), staff, and room were excellent. SunSplash is known as a hotel for divers. But it fully suited my purpose of windsurfing. I was glad not to be off in a large hotel, but right in the activity of the village.
reviews.title: I always return

reviews.text:
We spent a perfect week relaxing at Eldorado. The accommodation was perfect for us as the rooms were very nice and clean.
There is also a nice private beach at the front.
We would also like to thank Sad,the owner and most of the staff for making it a perfect stay.
We would stay again and recommend to others.
reviews.title: Perfect accommdation

reviews.text:
Best pizza in town!
Really nice and quiet place. Good italien restaurant with pizza, pasta and huge steaks.
Pizza was perfect and you have to try the desserts! Tiramisu and panna cotta are on point!! 
We will come again!
reviews.title: Best Pizza in town!

reviews.text:
Best Italian restaurant in Town, professional staff, amazing food. If you wish to stay over night a cozy is waiting for you. Near there is a laguna and blue hole.
Sure we will come back soon.
Thank you to everyone.
reviews.title: Top relaxing place

reviews.text: I had the pleasure of staying here for four nights and it felt like being at home thanks to the warm hospitality of the staff and the owner (and Eldo the cat) and the positive vibe of the place. The room was comfortable and clean. A sandy beach with deck chairs was literally right outside, where you could witness an amazing sunrise over the Red Sea. The lodge rooms surround the lovely restaurant area, which means the rooms are not quiet (though the music playlist is excellent), but this also means being able to eat some of the best Italian food I’ve ever had, including in Italy—the current owner of Eldorado is Italian from Puglia and is an excellent chef who obviously trained his attentive team well. Every day I was greeted with smiles and I was also delighted to find some vegan items on the food and drink menus. The location is perfect, walking distance from the Lighthouse area but in a quieter neighbourhood, and the setting gorgeous. Airport pick up and local tours can be arranged, just ask. Thank you to the whole Eldorado team for a really pleasant stay and I hope to be back soon!
reviews.title: Home from home

reviews.text:
The stuff are very nice and friendly specially Sparter who is not only so friendly, but very helpful as well. The manager of the hotel is very nice and he checks on everything by himself. The restaurant offers a great selection of pasta and pizza. 

The rooms are very basic and they are near to the restaurant so it is sometimes noisy a little bit for people who wake up late.
reviews.title: Peaceful and friendly atmosphere

reviews.text: Food heaven this is what this place is about, don't ask for their best item go and try any and you will be indulged, had 2 pizzas, pasta and lasagna 😋 for 2 persons only, sauces and doughs are real Italian, one of the reasons to visit Dahab.
reviews.title: Amazing food

reviews.text:
This place is a Dahabian gem! The food is top-notch, the service is impeccable and the ambiance is super cozy. With vegan and gluten free options, this authentic Italian restaurant will impress everyone you bring here. The tiramisu is a must try.

PS: ask for Spartan, he will give you the best service!
reviews.title: Amazing place

reviews.text: Amazing food, amazing service. Best chef in town. We are there over 5 times during our visit. Side note: you have to try their tiramisu. Ask about Spartan the waiter he is very helpful and has a big nice smile
reviews.title: High end cuisine

reviews.text:
Food quality is average and overpriced
Owner is very rude to customers
Staff apologized after they saw how rude he was to us. They said he is nervous because they served a lot of customers today. 
Obviously he needs to learn how to treat customers and guests who pay him money. 
Not recommended at all
reviews.title: Restaurant review

reviews.text:
The place is very carefully managed.
The rooms are nicely designed and maintained - the are pretty and clean, with sweet water in the showers.
The Lodge is right on the beach, and has a private, quiet, sandy beach strip - actually the nicest in the area, from what we saw.
In terms of value for money (if you're looking for fine accommodation but not a "hotel"), this might be one of the best choices in Dahab.
reviews.title: Great Value for Money

Takeing in considration the hotel rates in Dahab and howuch i paid here the hotel is good and worth trying. The view is sooooo good it is in one of the most beautiful beaches in Dahab. During my stay the pool was good unlike what i mostly read here. The beach is very good the room is okay breakfast would do it considering the rates again.
Downsides:-
Iam not sure it is downsides maybe all 3 stares hotels are so but 
1-there was no towels in my room or on the beach.
2-no kettle considreing that it is a breakfast only hotel it was too much that everytime i needed to have a hot drink inhad to go to the market in the downtown.
3-no music or activities on the beach though nearbay hotels have and the hotel's beach is perfect and worth it.
4-no room service they come when i check.in and aftet u check out but that wasn't really an issue as long as u keep ir room clean and put that in mind.
5-room need some maintinance espicially bath rooms they are clean but the floor and the walls changed colors in someparts due to being old.
But all in all it was a very good experinece that i would do again just hope next time these things would be better and taken in consideration.😊😊
reviews.title: Good value for Money

reviews.text:
The view of the hotel is good. But the hotel itself is terribly bad. No room service during the whole 4 days. The pool's water is with flying objects with no water change, but the beach is very good. No WiFi. AC isn't working inside most of the rooms. Breakfast rating is average. And finally Sewers are flooding in bathrooms.
Total rate of the hotel is poor it doesn't even deserve the 3 stars.
reviews.title: Worst experience ever

reviews.text:
The hotel has some advantages and a lot of disadvantages 
Among advantages:1. Its location on the lagoon beach which is the only sand beach in dahab .

Regarding the disadvantages ;

1.pool is not clean at all and there is no attempts to do , so exclude it from your expectations and actually hotel beach is more than enough .

2. There is no room services at all , they only clean the room between a guest and a new one once during your stay , but also this is not a big deal as long as you keep your room nearly clean .

3.The breakfast consists of few choices with poor to average quality ,but it passes 

4.The receptionist ,who called Islam is a worst person ever to meet , as he is not honest and doesn't serve you , he was the primary and only cause to make us make our check in more than  2 hours late 

5.The rooms are with varying conditions , some are very good ,some not really good at all , so it depends on your luck .ours was very good by the way

All over it is above than average place to have your night at , as long as you will stay most of your time enjoying the city, and I may repeat this experience again , but the secret is :not make high expectations and don't let the pictures deceive you
reviews.title: average place -read carefully

reviews.text: The place looks exactly like the pictures. It is beautiful and cozy and spotless clean. The owners, Mamdouh and Mimi are awesome people, they make you feel so welcome and so much at home and really go the extra mile eventhough the place is almost always fully booked. There's a kayak and 2 bikes at the property free for anyone's use. We've had a lovely and cozy movie night in their garden, a surprise Bedouin tea in the desert, and many many interesting conversations with Mamdouh who makes you feel like you've known each other for years. We definitely plan to come back.

Ghazala & Heba

reviews.text:
This is a really nice place to stay at. The staff are really nice and friendly, the food is really good. The room we slept in had super comfortable beds.
You could ask the chef for dinner and he could cook most anything.
Most of the staff speak English so it was eazy to communicate. 
You can walk all the way in to Dahab center walking by the sea side. 
You can also see an amazing sundown on the mountain behind the hotel. 
Snorkling just by the beach seeing beautiful corals and a lot of interesting fish. 

Beautiful place and nice people all around made out stay perfect. 

Thank you all at Dahab bay hotel. 
I will be back 🙏❤️
reviews.title: I really really like Dahab 😊

reviews.text: What a great place !! Our favorite place we stayed in Egypt. Perfect location right on the water. The best part is the staff they were so friendly and helpful they really made us feel at home. The food was amazing. Make sure to eat dinner here one of the best meals we had! The chef is outstanding. We will be back for sure.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

reviews.text: I was thoroughly impressed with my experience. The staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and well maintained, with a nice view. However, I did notice a few areas for improvement. Although the staff was friendly, they didn't have much experience in helping guests prepare for local trips and activities. Additionally, fresh towels would have been a nice touch. Overall, I would highly recommend this hotel for its comfort, quietness, and security.
reviews.title: good place to stay on

reviews.text: A clean well managed and friendly hotel, right on the beach, good value for money. The rooms were spacious. We had a lovely view over the sea. The small kitchenette was fine for occasional cooking and everything worked. Linen towels and the rooms are very clean. Staff are very helpful and it’s a 50 Egyptian pound taxi to the bus station.
reviews.title: Nice professional hotel with friendly staff. Right on the beach.

reviews.text:

The hotel has two branches, i was in the one which was 15 mins walk from the center and there is other one in the center, if you are interested in a quiet area with a beachfront view and have no problems to walk 15 mins to the center go for Neptune residence and if you don't want to walk and you care about being in the center go for neptune hotel.
reviews.title: Great experience

reviews.text: I fully recommend a stay at Neptune Residency if you are taking a trip to Dahab. The staff are friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean. My room had a small kitchen so I cook make my own food, or take a short walk or taxi ride to the many nice restaurants close by. There is a nice pool, and excellent snorkelling above coral just across the road from Neptune. I will definitely return.
reviews.title: Lovely time at Neptune Residence, Dahab

reviews.text: This is my 2nd time staying at this hotel. I came back for the calmness of the area (not too close not too far from the center). Also, the rooms are very clean and cozy. The staff was very helpful and very very flexible. Definitely won't be my last time staying there when I visit Dahab.

Very nice, clean place, staff are super friendly and Helpful, sea view and mountain view, missing only restaurant service, able to arrange for different programs which facilitated time management for our visit.

reviews.text:
I really loved the place it is very cozy staf  are super friendly the place is clean and they try thier best to make your trip memorable plus you will find everything around you restaurants and markets 
In addition they are the Best trip organizors with reasnable prices
reviews.title: Home far from home 😍😍

reviews.text: The room I stayed at was not cleaned nor maintained, I felt as if the bed sheets were not changed. There was no place in the room to put our bags. There were at least four cockroaches, I had to sleep with my bags on the bed just so I wouldn’t have to put them on the floor. The bathroom was not clean, the window was broken and its floor was wet. When we went to the reception to tell them about the cockroaches they came and blamed us for the wet floor. They found it weired that we compalined about the insects. At the end we changed rooms and they said that they would take care of it, but the next morning I found that they rented the room to other guests, so I’m not sure if they really checked the problem out. Anyways, I wouldn’t go there again and would never recommend it to any of my friends.
reviews.title: Bad experience

reviews.text:
Unique design hotel, lovely balcony with sea and pool view, clean room, helpful concierge, extremely friendly staff, jimmy hotel is the perfect atmosphere which i was looking for in dahab.
Thanks to all of you and special thanks to wael😍 he makes me got the perfect room which i like to have and Simply solved the trouble ❤️
Highly recommend, for sure i will back again.🥰🥰
reviews.title: enjoyable stay, trusted hotel, perfect location in dahab

reviews.text:
Jimmy was super-easy to book through, and extremely flexible. We came not knowing how many days we wanted to stay (ended up staying 8) and Jimmy helped organize everything through WhatsApp. 

We wanted to book airport transportation from the airport. No problem. We wanted to go to Sharm for the day. No problem. We wanted to do a day trip to Petra. No problem. Any time we needed anything like TP, advice, room cleaning, it was done immediately and with no fuss. 

This was exactly the vacation that my partner and I were looking for and Jimmy and his staff delivered. Thanks so much and we will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Awesome Time

reviews.text:
My sister and I stayed here for 3 days in December. This hotel was a quick walk from the main restaurant/market area in Dahab but far enough away that the hotel was quiet. The hotel was clean and beautiful. The beds were comfortable and the staff was incredibly friendly.

When we arrived, we were greeted by Jimmy: a high energy man sporting a fantastic cowboy hat. Jimmy and his manager, Wael, ensured that mine and my sister’s time in Dahab was wonderful. They planned our hike up Mt Sinai as well as our snorkeling and blue lagoon trip. 

The hotel is right on the beach and breakfast is served on the beach. The hotel also has a pool. 

If we ever go back to Dahab we will be sure to stay here again.
reviews.title: Quiet and Relaxing but Close to the Excitement

reviews.text:
Jimmy Travel (hotel owner) is your perfect guide to organize your tour in South Sinai (Ste Catherine, Moussa mountain = Sinai top sunrise, blue lagoon, desert camel, taxi to Sharm, Bedouin camp in Sinai, etc). Jimmy is a perfect host who knows all the contacts in the desert to make your trip a memorable experience. 
He organized for us a 2 days journey to Ste Catherine, transfer to Blue lagoon through the mountain, overnight stay at Elomda beach camp, boat to Blue hole and back to Dahab for 200 eur all included transfer, B&B + dinner). We stay ourselves overnight in Ste Catherine local Bedouin camp Sheikh Moussa with a 3 hour trek to see the Monastery Gardens in the mountain, with Mohammed, the Sheikh's son. 

Thanks a lot Jimmy!
reviews.title: Fantastic organization of our South Sinai tour

reviews.text: I spent one month in the studios, from the beginning Mohamed the owner scammed me and mislead me, I noticed that the place was very dirty but he told me that one of the few places with fresh water and the lowest price(he even complained that he wasn't earning money, nothing of it was true you can find a better place and cheaper just next door ), and of course he wanted to sell me everything he can at a higher price using misleading techniques speaking very bad about other diving centers and windsurf instructors. The first week I heard noises in my room and I could see TWO RATS eating my food!!! When I complained they said it was my imagination, the same story with the other guests, the place was INFECTED WITH RATS!! Then when I told them I was not going to renew my stay there Mohamed start sending me messages at midnight asking me to leave the place earlier than agreed and of course without having my money back! So I was so scared that I had to leave not having the money I paid for a month's stay. It is not a safe place for girls, take into account that the owner will tell you "you are my friend we are a family" just don't trust him!
reviews.title: Horrible experience! Rats in my bedroom and scam!

reviews.text: The diving aquipment is old and not so good. The prices are a bit higher than the other clubs. hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: Horrible staff, pool isn’t available, and ACs are poor. Staff should learn to deal in a more professional way and have some manners rather than disrespecting the guests. Even more, they turn off lamps at night to save their expenses so the hotel is unbearable
reviews.title: Worst experience

reviews.text:
Even so I was told, that the breakfast is included, it was never ready at 8am. I always had to wake up the cook. Once he even slept deeply at 8:45am. Whereas he woke me up at 7:25am, because he had to get up earlier, because 3 germans left. So he came to my room and knocked me out of the bed.
That was the first time I spoke with the manager. I worked well for about 3 days. Then I had to wake him up again. I was really angry, because the breakfast is not good either! 
The manager told me that he spoke to the owner and apologied.
Anyway the next day again no breakfast was ready. I wanted to wake him up, but the restaurant was close. It was already 8:15, when the manager then appeared.
I called him. He told me, that the cook had and accident, but he himself did also not get up!
So he went out to buy breakfast. And I had to wait again, like usual. 
About 8:30-8:45 I got my breakfast with no coffee and no fork. He went, no stress, and came back with salt, what I had ordered. No fork. On the way a man came and he started to talk with him. Me still waiting, they wanted to go in the restaurant.
I had to stopp him.
This gesture was so respektless for me, because he also made me wait for a long time, like I would be stuff, or a friend! 
He pretendere to be  "shocked" about the behaviour of the cook, but he did the same! I didn't feel like a guest, who Is paying for that service! I felt like a nothing; not important!
Both showed me with that, what they think about me!
Beside that the breakfast was disgusting!
reviews.title: Breakfast was never ready

reviews.text: The hotel is clean, and has an wonderful view. It is located to all centers of one-day tourism, and diving centers. All are reachable on foot. reviews.text:
I stayed for three weeks in this budget hotel. It is has a nice pool and a restaurant with a chill out space at the beach. I especially like the interior or the rooms. The breakfast buffet has many different mostly egyptian foods.

Sometimes the showers are broken, so check directly after you enter the room. Also the wifi wasn't working properly for some days.

The staff is very friendly - especially the breakfast chef :) - and this venue has a good value for the price!
reviews.title: Nice budget hotel

reviews.text:
We got a room for 4 days in Dahab in this hotel. 
Positive:
* Close to beach.
* Nice swimming pool
* Friendly staff
Negatives:
* We got first room for a night and then next day we had to ask to change it because shower and hot water system wasnt working.
* Got a new room and shower was again broken. Asked to change room again and they replace the shower in few minutes. It was a band-aid fix which didnt work for long. 
* WIFI is slow.

I guess the main reason for this situation is that Dahab as a place is not making any good money because of a decline in foreign tourists. This hotel probably is struggling with providing basic necessities.
reviews.title: 4 days of stay in this hotel was a nightmare

owner_response.text:
Dear Himanshu_Dogra, 
Thank you for your feedback!
We are deeply sorry for the problem with the shower.
Christina Hotels has just completed part one of maintenance  -the beach rooms of Christina Palace - of all bathrooms, including water-taps and showers. 
Remaining rooms are to follow. Please ask with check-in whether any renovated rooms are available to guarantee a perfect stay!

We do appreciate your feedback, dear guest, and while being aware that it is subjective still wish to kindly remind that using drastic language (nightmare) while at the same time pointing out several of our great facilities, such location right by the beach, free WIFI, our widely praised, beautiful swimming pool, friendly and attentive staff... can be misleading (to other readers), contradictory at the least. 
Hoping that you'll visit Christina Hotels again during your next stay in Dahab and thus granting us opportunity to offer you a great stay!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
From the moment I arrived to when I left, everybody was so kind and helpful to me.

Yusef, so calm and knowledgeable. He helped me with everything, from paying my stressed out taxi driver on the first night. Important advice on the best laundry, where to change money (when the banks are closed) and the most important thing for me, no big sell concerning the available trips around Dahab. Thank you.

I think I must of met everybody who worked there, everyone took the time to talk and help me. Shout out to Ahmed in the restaurant.

My room overlooking the pool was perfect, and very clean. The free breakfast had a big choice.

Finally, a big thank you to Amal, the princess of the Cristina Beach Palace. Whose smile and friendly conversations made it a joy whenever i met her.
reviews.title: The perfect palace to chill out

reviews.text: The rooms are clean yet need some renewal which i knew they're working on it seriously, the pool is clean and well maintained, they have a restaurant by the beach front which serve nice food, the crew is very helpful and friendly, the owner Mrs Maha and her daughter Ms. Amal are running the hotel themselves so they're doing their best to look after every guest and  take the comments seriously, seems like this  management is new so they're working hard on making everything better. The hotel got a good location, I really loved the place

owner_response.text:
Dear Clémence, 
Thank you for your lovely feedback. Please understand that 300 LE meanwhile is worth less than 15 Euro  - that is a real bargain as you enjoy a comfy double room for 2, breakfast, a swimming pool and direct access to our private coral beach!
Please remember that operating costs have risen exorbitantly during past months and be assured that Christina Hotels always was - and will continue to - make sure that you enjoy great value for money while staying with us. 
We'd be very pleased to welcoming you again as a guest at any time in future.

The people working there are unfriendly and has no minimum basics of hospitality. there were dogs owned by the owner of the place that attacked me and my friends. the pictures added here are not as in reality. the place is unclean at all. and at the end when we wanted to leave they did not want us to refund our money.

reviews.text:
I was on a solo bike tour and wanted to camp in dahab, Sunrise give me space to set my tent with good services, bathroom, kitchen and amazing company and friendly staff, I even stayed more than I planned.
If you want to be in the city but still get to camp and meet like minded people, Sunrise will be your best option.
reviews.title: Great for camping ...

reviews.text: I made the reservation and Ahmed was soo friendly, actually when i went there we didnot like it, it was so calm and it was really small area, but we cancelled the reservation without any fees and Ahmed helped us find another okace abd he made recommendations. I wish i could stay there but the garden was very small and reems was close but i recommend for others to try the stay.
reviews.title: Very very helpful staff

reviews.text: My friend and I travelled to Dahab to dive and a friend of ours who lived there advised us to stay at Sunrise! The price was great we payed 150EP a night and Ahmed was fantastic! The rooms were really basic with 2 beds and a bathroom and some storage spaces for our clothes, everything was really clean and sunrise is a stone throw from the main promenade! Ahmed also offers a campfire in the evening with shisha and a barbecue if you ask, I think that cost us 100EP  each and there was 4 of us. Sunrise is really quiet and we slept really well! I have no complaints it was exactly what we were looking for!
reviews.title: Fantastic location, exactly what you pay for!

reviews.text:
This is where I always stay in Dahab, I'd go back again and again. Haven't ever had a problem here. I don't know, it's hard to explain, but the feel of the place is really nice - chilled, relaxed, never had any problems with noise (only occasionally with 'parties' from nearby places), child-friendly, feels very safe, simple and clean. 

I like that there are basic emergency supplies in each room (ie. a bottle of Raid insect killer just in case!) The shower is better than most in Dahab. Only difficulty is in getting through to them, their facebook site does not have updated numbers. 

I don't know what people mean when they say this place cost them 20 GPB. I paid the equivalent of about 10 - maybe the price has gone down. 

A really enjoyable stay, thanks. It's my home away from home in Dahab. Jay's restaurant is a real winner, too.
reviews.title: Great location, nothing to complain of

reviews.text:
We booked Sunrise Lodge because of an outstanding deal on Groupon which included breakfast and transfers all for £7pp per night! For this price we really feel the lodge delivered 100%. 

Fantastic location, just behind the beach promenade but perfectly located for access to the dive sites to the north and south of Dahab.

Breakfast at Jays was great, even provided pack up for when we had early morning dives. We often ended up at Jays most afternoons because of its location, friendly staff and great strawberry smoothies.

The rooms themselves are basic, but what more do you need than a bathroom, bed and somewhere to put your clothes. 
We did have room 4 to start with which does have a slight smell to it because of the drainage but got moved to room 2 after a couple of hours without even asking which was absolotuly fine and perfect for our week long dive holiday.

Ahmed the on-site man is great and will help you with whatever you need. Claire the owner was fantastically helpful with emails before we arrived in Dahab, recommending dive centres, horse riding and various excursions. 

We would definitely stay here again and would recommend to divers looking to spend their cash on diving rather than a 5* hotel. As we stayed at Sunrise we also got a discount at the dive centre recommended which made the whole thing even better!
reviews.title: Great value

name: Sea Horse Hotel Dahab
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: The hotel was recently renovated. The external image is more Greek than Arabic, but it is still very pleasant to spend summer days. The employees were very kind: they allowed us early check-in and late check-out. The location of the hotel is excellent, a good fifteen minutes to the center of Dahab and about twenty minutes to the beautiful lagoon on the other side of the city. It is located in a quiet neighborhood. The only drawbacks we noticed are the rather poor cleanliness of the rooms and the fact that the pool closes very early in the afternoon. Everything else is great!
reviews.title: A great hotel in a great location with a few minor flaws

reviews.text:
First, most of the pictures here are old and don't show the real thing there!
We stayed there for two nights and it was really tough!
The room smelled horrible, and a cockroach was there the 2nd day
The bathroom is extremely small that in order to use the toilet you have to put your feet inside the shower!! 
The TV was not working and they fixed it a few hours before our checkout after asking them more than 3 times we even offered to buy the wire ourselves
Dont even think of checking the kitchen there! Its not clean I even saw a sheep head thrown on the floor!
The only good thing about it is that its close to the sea and El Mashaya and that's it!
Very poor but if some good efforts are exerted it'd really be a good place for a quick cheap stay.
reviews.title: Very poor!

reviews.text: It's not even a Hotel ,Rooms are not good at all there is no view ,toilets are really bad ,water is not clean ..when we wanted to leave the room they asked us to pay 50% of the total amount knowing that we asked to leave after 4 hours from our stay so he wanted us to pay 50% of the night price for the 4 days we reserved ..also while reserving online he didn't tell us this information ..
reviews.title: Worst Hotel ever

reviews.text:
We met the owner in the bus station,  we traveled  with him to see the hotel, it is clean, quiet and lovely place, everybody are very friendly. Yaser is an excellent person, he help us all the time, also when we had a problem with the visa.

I recommend this hotel, and to go with them to the blue hole, we went with Mohammed, he is an excellent tour guide!!! 

Excellent holidays in a lovely place!

Dahab is the best city in Egypt!!!!
reviews.title: Amazing  hotel!!! Very nice people!!!

reviews.text:
The hotel and room were both good but very basic. Considering the price though I cannot complain. The room I stayed in consisted of two beds, a couple of tables, an air-con unit and an ensuite with toilet, shower and sink. There was an outdoor courtyard area in the middle of the hotel and a shaded area which was great for relaxing and watching films in the evening. 

In the morning myself and 12 others I stayed with were provided with breakfast which was much better than I was expecting. The staff were polite and easy to talk to. On one occasion, I broke the room key (which was very weak, be warned!) in the keyhole. Upon awkwardly telling the owner what happened he was very easygoing and fixed it later that day!  

Seahorse was a really relaxed hotel and I found it good value for money
reviews.title: Very pleased!

reviews.text: We only had one night at Seahorse hotel because we were booked in elsewhere, but would have definitely stayed on longer for the value for money. Yasser was a fantastic host, very hospitable and helpful with local knowledge and contacts. They serve great authentic meals for a good price. There is a relaxed and casual atmosphere. Rooms are simple but spacious and comfortable.
reviews.title: Friendly and helpful staff, great value for money

reviews.text:
I would have given this hotel a better review, as I extended my stay here considerably.  But it has simply got worse over time. My room has not been serviced at all within twelve days that I stayed, and I do not feel that safe as a woman on my own.  The only staff member seems to hate his job and his life, as he even told ,me, and wants to share his misery with others. He thumps around all day and has little logic. I have a TV and decoder but there is no extension cord and the cables are not connected. The staff member comes in at a three or four day interval to tell me an engineer will come to fix it all up as well as the non working AC, but he never arrives. It is a bit of an asylum really. I had a big mishap due to the unfixed AC whereby my room is boiling at night when sleeping / trying to sleep.  Half asleep in the middle of the night I opened the door to get some cooler air in the room and fell asleep naked before closing the door again I awoke naked in the morning with the door open. The windows are nailed shut except for the bathroom window which is tiny. I think the staff member was perving at me while I was sleeping and I smelled cigarette smoke when i awoke.. He changed his manner to super nasty and acted like a psycho  and I think that the cats got beaten up that morning. They were hiding under outdoor furniture in terror. Maybe this hotel is fine for Arab males to stay, but I would say that is about it these days. Once again I hesitate to recommend this hotel to females and even foreigners. One does not feel that welcome and there is an air of neglect and dissonance, especially with the staff member who needs a counseling service and medication.
Mainly I gave this bad review due to the bad service and unsafe staff member.  Otherwise it would have got a better rating.
reviews.title: Bad manners and aggressive

reviews.text: Last week I spent 5 nights there. I choose this hotel because it's located in downtown nearby everything you need supermarket, pharmacy and restaurants. I think it's new building the furniture is new, my room existed flat tv,Mini bar, a/c and hot shower. There isn't kettle. The breakfast is okay. The staff is friendly and helpful I asked them for sèche cheveux, soap and they arranged for me the trip to wady weshwashy. It's a nice accomodation for whom has plans for morning or diver will spend most of time in activity.
reviews.title: Budget hotel in downtown

reviews.text: Very clean and best budget friendly hotel in Dahab. This hotel has more good reviews then all the hotels together in Dahab. I always check to make sure if everything is clean and comfortable and indeed it is. The staff is super friendly and very helpful in everything you need. They arranged everything we asked always with a smile. The beds are very comfortable and there is a television and coffee and tea in the room. They actually have a lot of services I didn't expect so definitely know where to come back next time. Thanks guys!
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable

reviews.text:
It is a budgetary hotel, you can use it to spend the whole day outside and come back to sleep..

Blankets wasn’t too clean nor bed cover..

You have to ask for towels too many times, (better to get yours)

Some rooms have kettle, you have to be lucky..

Noise at the morning by workers and night by other clients :))
reviews.title: Budgetary Hotel..

reviews.text:
We stayed at Golden Plaza Dahab Resort for 5 nights and it was a really pleasant stay. 

The hotel is fairly new, there is warm water in the shower and free drinkable water at the reception. The staff is super friendly and attentive - they provided us with fresh bed sheet and towels on request. Otherwise the room gets cleaned every time you leave a sign on the doorknob when you leave. 

The breakfast is good, but it needs a bit of variety (during our 5-day stay it was the same breakfast each morning). Overall, we had a really nice stay and we would come back if we find ourselves in Dahab again.
reviews.title: Modern, clean facilities & great staff

My son and I stayed in Sukoon for 5 days and enjoyed our stay very much. 

The hotel is very pleasent, very clean and, although in a central location, very peaceful. Additionaly, Sukoon is also very beautiful. 

The hotel owner, Rami, and Sdaam, who works in the hotel are very nice and helpful (recomendations re resturants, arranging transport etc').

Therefore, I highly recomend staying in Sukoon.

reviews.text:

The plce
 Near to everything

Highly recommended to stay in.

reviews.text:
I've stayed in Sukoon four times now and wouldn't stay anywhere else in Dahab! It's one of the main reasons that my friends and I love visiting Dahab.
The location is perfect: close to countless cosy cafe's, just a two minute dash to a beautiful swimming spot, and yet tucked away in a quiet spot amongst the palm trees.
The team at Sukoon are super friendly and helpful, and have helped us to organise some incredible trips around Dahab.
It's always sad to say goodbye to Sukoon, but I'm sure we'll be back again in the near future!
reviews.title: Hidden Gem!

reviews.text: Sukoon is an amazing place in the center of Dahab with beautiful minded people, amazing breakfast, cozy decor, nice and comfy rooms and a very unique atmosphere. It represents peace and beauty for me and I would love come back !

reviews.text:
It was really difficult to say goodbye to Sukoon, this welcoming place...
for me it was definitely one if the nicest places in Dahab.
Everybody who comes to Dahab and wants just to drop out of rush and hussels of the daily live, will find good vibes and an surrounding which has been realised with lots of love and a good feeling for lots of details which just can make people feeling better...you will get a delicious breakfast every day and can even make Yoga on the roof ;-)
 a little oasis in Dahab near to the centre and the beach but nevertheless quiet and not crowded.
reviews.title: Little Oasis in the middle of Dahab

reviews.text:
My girlfriend and I spent almost a week at Sukoon guest house, and it was phenomenal!!. Ramy, the host, was very friendly and specific about the details of the place. Booking was fairly easy and straightforward and he even arranged a pick up for us from Sharm el Sheikh airport. Upon arrival, we had a very warm welcome, were given a quick tour around the place. The place is eco-friendly and there’s a place for food waste (compost) as well. The rooms are simple and very comfortable with a unique design and lots of sunlight. The guest house is designed for travellers, so if you are thinking of a 5 star service, this place is not for you! This is a place for people who seek simplicity, peace , and quiet! Ramy also has lots of contacts in Dahab and was able to put us in touch with different places to do different activities (diving, safari, snorkelling, etc.). All his recommendations were excellent and we didn’t have any trouble at all! The location is ideal; it’s right on the strip where all the restaurants are, we didn’t need to take a cab anytime during our stay.
We had such a wonderful time and were sad to leave :( (we even extended our stay 1 extra night) we will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Simply...AMAZING!

reviews.text:
j'avais besoin d'une retraite pour 5 jours, Sukoon m'a apporté l'essentiel ; calme, propreté, sérénité,  bienveillance. Rami , l'hôte parfait pour compléter le tableau et m'aider dans l'organisation de mes transports de et vers l'aéroport à des horaires impossible... 
Cet oasis est une recommandation pour les âmes en recherche de tranquillité.

reviews.text:

Franck et Nadège 
See you in Bali Insha’Allah 😉

name: Penguin Village Dahab
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
My wife and I visited Penguin Village for the beginning of our honeymoon and stayed for 3 nights.

From the moment we got there we felt right at home. Dahab is extremely beautiful. There was a great mix of families, couples (old and young) locals from Egypt and expats through out the village.

Penguin Village is located at the southern end of the market strip in Dahab. It is a short 5 minute walk to the centre of Dahab's market district. Penguin village is at the quieter end of town and if you are a light sleeper it is likely the spot for you.

Breakfast at Penguin Village was included in the package we bought and we always had tasty food with a great experience. 

The staff at the front desk (Hany, Abdul, Mohammed and Osama) all consistently went out of their way to help us at any chance or request and their English skills are superb. I cannot thank them enough for making our stay a breeze. The staff provided simple or in depth information on everything from recommending places to see, tours to go on, organizing a taxi to and from the airport and directing us to services like laundromats. I cannot speak highly enough of the service.

Anything that was lacking in the room was made up for by the outstanding service.
reviews.title: Would return in a heart beat. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.text: This hotel is amazing. Everyone is so friendly and helpful, not for tips or out of fear but because of great human character and love for the job. They even helped us organizing a tour to St Katherine when we were’nt guests there any longer. Thank you so much, Osama.
reviews.title: Friendliest staff ever

reviews.text: Staying at this hotel in Dahab was a delightful experience. Its prime location near restaurants and diving spots offers easy access to the best that the town has to offer, while being blissfully quiet in the evenings. The indoor-outdoor design of the hotel creates a warm and inviting atmosphere. The staff is incredibly helpful and friendly, always eager to ensure that guests find a room that suits their needs. The restaurant is cozy and comfortable, very laid back, and they serve delicious food. The pool lounge area is a standout feature, one of the most beautiful in the entire town. Often guests stay there all day for an entire week, it's so nice. And i you're an animal lover, the hotel's friendly cats will bring an extra dose of warmth and comfort to your stay. All in all, this hotel is easily one of the best in Dahab and I cannot recommend it enough. Thank you, will definitely see you again someday!
reviews.title: Dahab's Best Oasis!

reviews.text:
On behalf of the group of 39 pax here is 
The groups comments 
Amazing , clean , friendly staff , nice view , clean rooms 
Easy check in with no problem in addition to the worm welcoming 
High food quality 
The place deserves the price paid and more 
Its not my first time i used to book here for the above mentioned benefits i found in the Acacia 
By the way i tried most of other hotel in Dahab but still Acacia is the best 
Thanks fir Mr Bader and his crew

reviews.text:
One of my favorite hotels in dahab, very good location at El Mashraba st, you will find all restaurants , cafes, shopping markets beside you . They also have an amazing breakfast in front of the sea.
Staff are very friendly and rooms are very clean, but they have a problem in WIFI connection at the rooms
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: A very good hotel with a very welcoming people. I enjoyed my stay so much, the rooms are clean and they have a very good service and even u can have a view in any room you stay in. If you are looking to stay in dahab far from the crowded places with a very calming place.
reviews.title: A perfect stay to chill

reviews.text:
I recently visited Dahab and stayed at the charming Hotel Acasia, which I can’t recommend enough! While it was perhaps a bit more expensive than average in the town, it was worth every penny. Firstly, the team running the hotel were lovely and super accommodating: Badr in particular made me feel totally at home and was always ready to help with a smile. He had lots of great sightseeing tips from personal experience and found out about a local tour for me.

In terms of location, the hotel is a 10 minute walk from the main town, set back from the coast on one side and on a main road with handy shops on the other side. It’s incredibly peaceful and was ideal for a relaxing holiday. 

My room had a sea view: while the sea was in the distance, my room looked over the pool which is surrounded by palm trees swaying the breeze. The room itself was very clean, spacious and nicely decorated, with a lovely private balcony, a private bathroom, good storage (a wardrobe and drawers), a fridge, and other amenities on hand from the front desk.

In terms of ambience, the hotel overall was beautifully decorated with plants and local crafts. It’s also worth saying that the price includes breakfast in the restaurant opposite the hotel, by the coast: it was always substantial and the sea view made it a perfect way to start the day! 

Two small things I think could make a stay even better would be for the hotel to have a list of recommended excursions and taxi drivers on hand. Secondly, the shower in the bathroom was a little small and the space was tighter because the shower curtain was quite big.

Overall I would 100% recommend a stay here when visiting Dahab, I came away feeling rejuvenated!
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel, great location, wonderful team!

reviews.text: You guys, it was such an amazing and warm experience to stay at Acacia Hotel in Dahab. The staff is super friendly and we made so many awesome memories & new friendships, that for sure will last a lifetime at this place. Acacia feels like a save haven and we will come back many times. We met people from all around the world here. The music is great and the food is great standard. We snorkeled every day and saw so many different fish and even an eagle ray and a turtle.
reviews.title: Amazing, warm experience

Only my comment bout rooms, very small and not clean enough, food good, but need to add more drinks. Thanks all.

reviews.text:
My sister and I enjoyed two very relaxing weeks at this lovely hotel , situated on a long sandy beach overlooking the lagoon and fringed by sand coloured mountains.
The staff are very friendly and special mention must go to reception who upgraded us to a room with morning sun ( and a perfect view of the sea), The animation - Donia and Ahmed and their friendliness . Also, Mr, Nageh and his wonderful team providing the great food. Abdullah in the on site shop and his help with arranging trips :-)
Also , the on site spa is new and really worth a visit , with all types of fantastic treatments available.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel in a very scenic location

owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to rate us. Your feedback is invaluable and helps us to ensure that we are providing the best possible service to our customers. We are always striving to improve and your ratings help us to identify areas where we can do better. We appreciate your support and look forward to continuing to serve you in the future. reviews.text: Very nice animation team. I really enjoyed the stretching class run by Ahmed, Haya, Donya. Everyone is super friendly and helpful. There is a nice garden in the hotel. I highly recommend this place.
