name: Tropitel Dahab Oasis
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
It was a great trip, the hotel is beautiful, the service is excellent, the rooms are clean and comfortable, the animation team was so great, the activity in the morning and the shows in the night overall it was good and enjoying
Thanks tropitel ❤️❤️❤️
reviews.title: Vacation

reviews.text: The experience was amazing I had so much fun everything was perfect the food the rooms the staff everyone was very welcoming and friendly and the show was very amazing and everyone made us feel like we belonged there 10/10 experience would definitely recommend
reviews.title: Vacation

reviews.text:
First of all i would like to thank tropitel hotel for its lovely hospitality , it was a pleasure to stay there rooms are clean food is perfect , sea beach is amazing and private.

And a special thanks to Hossam Emad who made my day really an unforgettable night with my beloved wife along with the sea under the stars with soft jaz music ,food and service . All was great, thanks to him and his crew. 

Wanna come back again and again🥰🥰
reviews.title: Special thanks to tropitel team

reviews.text: Yet another wonderful stay at the aptly named Oasis in Dahab,sparkling Red sea on one side, stunning mountains on the other. Poolside, gardens and beach are spotless, huge surplus of bedchairs, so no 6am towel run needed !! Food is plentiful and varied, served buffet style, with salad on the side. The patisserie display should be listed under the dangerous drugs act !! Hotel staff are wonderfully attentive and it seems their only objective is to make sure you enjoy your holiday. Cannot wait to return in the Autumn
reviews.title: Return visit to excellent Hotel

reviews.text: Small hotel but the employees with big heart! I want to thank Hossam emaad and Mr.Ehab for taking care for everything we needed and always with a smile, you made our vacation perfect- thank you both, we already waiting for our next vacation in tropical
reviews.title: Perfect vacation

reviews.text: great service. interesting activities. fantastic team of fantastic people. interesting activities in the pool. the hotel has changed for the benefit in 5 years, the service has been improved, interesting variants have been added for spending free time, great bookkeepers, much better service ))
reviews.title: I love It

reviews.text:
Reception, Tour Staff, Restaurant, Catering, House Keeping, Animation,  .Bar and Gardening .  Everyone  was family and always smiled..  I  stayed for nearly a month and had excellent value for money..  

Alot of laughs.  International. Gorgeous setting .  The staff fed the birds at breakfast,....wonderful bird song in pretty garden setting.  Very English !

 THANK YOU EVERYONE FOR LIFTING MY SPIIRITS OUT OF A DARK, DAMP FEBRUARY.

SusieX
reviews.title: Delightful

reviews.text: Everything about this hotel is magical. It’s the second time I have visited as had been before in 2007  and it won’t be the last. The staff are relaxed, friendly and  go above and beyond . The setting is beautiful with the mountains as a backdrop. Dahab itself has its own unique atmosphere which will continue to draw me back for the rest of my life. Food at the hotel is fantastic. Service is exceptional and we made some fantastic friends and magical memories. The hotel has a beautiful coral reef and nearby is the famous blue hole and must see Abu Galum if beauty and nature are your thing.The hotel doesn’t feel touristy at all which is what we also loved.  11/10. Thank you Tropitel you do yourself proud from the 3 of us in Manchester England.
reviews.title: Cannot recommend enough.

reviews.text:
We really enjoyed the service of the hotel .
Excellent entertainment team We really enjoyed them!
The food is excellent!
The staff in the dining room is excellent, Ahmed Bush is our friend.
The staff at the pool are excellent.
Room attendant was excellent.
The hotel is full of well-kept vegetation, it looks very beautiful.
The reef in front of the hotel is one of the last in the world where you can still see live coral from the beginning of the beach
We found our home in Sinai!
reviews.title: Trip to Dahab 2023

reviews.text:
The hotel was about an hour from Sharm el Sheik, the roads were very good through the desert and mountains until we passed through Dahab when they became very rough. The actual location of the hotel is somewhat isolated although there is a regular free shuttle bus into Dahab The hotel bedrooms could do with some refurbishment but the grounds were very well maintained and and there was a lovely pool area which led directly onto a private beach.  There was a pier which allowed you to access deeper water and the coral reef.  Lots of fish to be seen when the water was calm.  The entertainment team was very enthusiastic especially Ouija and Alaa, who also performed in the evenings in the outdoor theatre.  The fire show was great and the belly dancer also.   
Food in the restaurant was a bit samey but plentiful although it could have been a bit hotter.  The breakfast included very good bread and pastries. Overall it was the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff who would tempt us to return in the future.
reviews.title: two week break

name: Red Sea Relax Resort
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
The best things about this hotel are it’s fantastic location right in the heart of the main area & also the lovely staff who went out of their way to be helpful. The room & pool etc all perfectly good also definitely recommend. 
You don’t really need a pool here though as it’s all about the sea which is right outside the hotel
reviews.title: Lovely staff & great location

reviews.text: Great location and clean. Most of the staff were friendly, but they charged us with a exchange rate significantly higher than we expected. Breakfastwas OK. The pool is also nice and clean. It is important to understand that the common standarts in Sinai is quit low, compared to other loacations
reviews.title: Nice

reviews.text: I should have listened to other low-rating reviews. I read a few and who knew that would become my experience?! If you are reading this and contemplating then look further. The hotel smelled like an ashtray since they allow people to smoke inside. Also, their bed was old and the sheets were of low quality. It was so thin that you could see the mattress. Lastly, the hot water didn't work well. I didn't know what to say after seeing a stream of black water coming down the faucet. Their breakfast was awful too. There were so many flies and some of them ended up in the food. Staying in this hotel made my trip miserable so I had to switch to another one which was so much better. If you aren't sure about the hotel, just book a day and see if it works for you. I wouldn't recommend this hotel to anyone. There are other better places you can stay in town. don't nice picture fool you. The hotel looks nothing like the picture.
reviews.title: The worst stay I've ever had.

reviews.text:
Great location, super clean , Diana all the team are were amazing with super chefs !!who spoiled us everyday , the food was fantastic, very clean rooms , thank you to the cleaning staff , a laundry service too, 
We can’t wait to return , Diane went out of her way to arrange and organise everything for us ,a real credit to the hotel!! there are many restaurants around , and a delicious Bakery out the back, spoilt for choice , 
It’s definitely a lot busier than a few years ago, but a super friendly safe place
reviews.title: Very friendly

reviews.text:
Perfect location on sea beach, with direct access to “Lighthouse” diving site, several minutes walking from “eel garden” 
clean rooms, pool & lounge chairs, good breakfast and nice bar with balcony looking to the “lighthouse” lagoon.
All best restaurants and diving clubs are nearby… this optimize time spent to transportations
reviews.title: Location, Pool, and RedSeaRelax diving center make this hotel one of the best places to stay in Dahab

reviews.text: Had a wonderful stay here and could easily have stayed longer. The hotel rooms were basic but clean and comfy and good value for money. The breakfast had a great range of choices and pool area was beautiful. The hotel is perfectly located on the main board walk for accessing restaurants but set back enough that it is quiet. The attached Churchill restaurant did amazing food and we also used the dive centre who did a refresher dive with us and were extremely helpful and friendly. We'll definitely be back!
reviews.title: Wonderful place, excellent location

reviews.text: As a relative new comer to diving I was unsure of what to expect, but jordon and his team were so attentative and understood my nervousness. The exuipment was excellent and the whole center very professional and safety concious (much better than other centers I've dived at) 5 stars all the way for me. The hotel we have stayed at before as its in a great location, very clean and good value and all the staff are very helpful including Diana and Ahmed at reception. Any one who is concidering staying at this hotel, I can highly recommend it. Many of the people we met were return visitors who echoed these views.
reviews.title: Fantastic dive centre and hotel

reviews.text: My partner and i had an incradible time at the redsea relax resort. the hotel is beautiful and workers are extremely nice ans helpful. I took a scubadiving course at PADI center that belongs to the hotel as well, and it was super comfterble, the course was very profassional and safe, and i had the best week. Highly recomanded!
reviews.title: Highly recomanded, we will visit again for sure!

reviews.text: Planned to stay 2 nights. Rooms are a joke. The room we were given was not an “actual” room, it was one they made of drywall... no sound of heat insulation, all the doors were glass and as the room is facing East it is a greenhouse when the sun rises even with the AC on the coldest setting. The bathroom was filthy and full of cockroaches. We were offered another room but was also full of cockroaches and was not a double which we needed. They said they fixed the problem aka. Sprayed the room with chemicals and expected me to sleep the night breathing in carcinogens.... breakfast was decent.
reviews.title: Worst hotel experience ever

reviews.text: I stayed at red sea relax for about a week. Its located in the centre of town on the beach promenade. The rooms are comfortable and the staff very forthcoming. There's an excellent dive school at the hotel with very professional diving instructors. The breakfast spread is sumptuous and the Churchill bar offers great views of the waterfront. I would recommend this hotel for both solo travelers as well as families/groups.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

name: The Bedouin Moon
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
I loved being back here after 10 years - a wonderful new team headed by the inimitable Mr Nasser It felt like the same peaceful, welcoming, comfortable space of my memories with some fabulous additions - the rooms have been upgraded and there is now a lovely BBQ/fire pit - great on the cool evenings, eating or drinking tea.

I stayed a week, would have loved it to have been two, so easy is it to be there - close enough to walk to shop and eat but far enough away from the hubbub of downtown Dahab to feel a real sense of peace

The staff are lovely, friendly, funny, helpful, nothing was too much trouble.  Rooms are spotlessly clean, managed  by Mohammed and Ashraf (plus the amazing towel sculptures!)  Mohammed x 2 on reception, one a very accomplished artist, Ahmed keeps a tight rein and runs the restaurant, Mansi at the bar and Mustafa who's Moussaka is up there with the best - to name but a few.

Look forward to seeing you again soon, my friends!
reviews.title: So happy to be back at the Bedouin Moon Hotel!

reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights at this hotel in Dahab and we liked it very much. The location is fantastic, in front of a lovely beach and an impressive mountain that you can hike to. The facilities are clean and nice. Swimming pool is very cool and has a quite deep spot. We really enjoyed breakfast as well. Is a bit far away from the center but the walk is nice. The stuff is very careful, especially Mohamed, the receptionist. I totally recommend staying at this place and would definitely repeat next time!
reviews.title: Great place and peaceful location

reviews.text:
Excellent place for people who seek nature and calmness with beautiful mountain and sea view, and an almost clear sky for stargazing.
The staff is friendly and the room service, cleanliness, and breakfast is good for a 3 star's hotel.
Also hiking is unique experience you can find there where it was easy for a beginner like me to climb the nearby mountain.
reviews.title: The Bedouin Moon Experience

reviews.text: we  stayed in the hotel for 5 nights. the stuff is amazing. very friendly poeple, allways trying to help and really nice and worm. the pool is  in a beautiful location, next to the mountain. there is a beautiful beach next to the hotel with beautiful corals. its close to dahab but not close to the buisy scene so everything is quiet and close to nature. the hotel is intimate and we had a great spacious room. i highly recommand it for poeple who look for simplicity, nature, and good poeple
reviews.title: beautiful poeple in bedouin moon

reviews.text: Good hospitality, the staff is very friendly and helpful, the view is very good and the food is very tasty.  It was a wonderful holiday in the calm of the day.  The view from the mountain is really good.  The rooms were very clean and the sea view was very good.
reviews.title: One of the most recommended hotels in Dahab.

reviews.text: Great hospitality, the staff are very friendly and helpful the view is extremely good & the food there is very delicious. It was a great holiday in the calmness of the day. The view from the mountain is really good. The rooms was very clean and the sea view was pretty good.
reviews.title: One of the most recommended hotel in dahab.

reviews.text: We’ve stayed at Beduin Moon for 4 nights, value for money the place is amazing ! It’s located just outside Dahab so it’s quiet and peaceful but still within walking distance to the city if you fancy to grab a nice meal there. The stuff is super nice and friendly and the pool is just perfect. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Amazing visit to Bedouin Moon

reviews.text: This is a truly amazing hotel. Close to the sea, atmosphere is very family like. Personnel caters to all your needs and even more. The hotel is very cosy and I felt myself like home here. Yoga hall is a great plus for those who practice yoga. Located a bit far from all Dahab night life and you can truly enjoy cosy evenings and atmosphere.
reviews.title: Cosy and hospitable

reviews.text: Bedouin Moon is a lovely hotel, a little away from Dahab's touristic center, very quiet and more luxurious than one could expect. The hotel is expansive and very nicely appointed, and the service is particularly excellent and smiling. Only good things about this hotel!
reviews.title: Recommended!

reviews.text:
The overall experience is good, and the staff are super helpful and friendly, I liked the quietness of the hotel and both the sea view and the mountain view, the stay is really relaxing, and the location is good.
I also liked the dome in my room 😀
While the location is very nice and quiet, if you prefer to be on walking distance from the Dahab Walkway then the location wouldn't be the best
reviews.title: A friendly and cosy stay with super friendly staff

reviews.text:
A great place to chill out in as a group of friends for 2 weeks.
The apartment had everything to make you feel at home and the garden was a peaceful retreat .
Easy  to get to the Lagoon, beaches and into town.
Fiona and Toby were  really helpful with local knowledge .
Fabulous place to take in some winter sun.
reviews.title: Sunny Times

reviews.text: We had the most amazing 2 weeks staying at the octypus villa apartment. The hosts, Toby and Fi, were very welcoming with a wealth of local knowledge and able to recommend and book trips. The aparttment is 1 hour transfer from Sfarm and arranged by Toby and Fi. The apartment is minutes walk from a stunning beach and ideal for swimming, snorkeling and wind surfing. You can use the public beach or pay to use one of the private hotel beaches with sunbeds and towels.. There is a local supermarket and fruit and veg shop very close by the apartment. Dahab is a quick taxi ride and cost us around £1.50 each way. There are many restaurants and places to snorkel. We had a relaxing 2 weeks and would love to return. Dahab offers a more authentic Egyption experience compared to the bright lights of Sharm.
reviews.title: Dahab Lagoon  Villa Apartmenrs

reviews.text: We had the most wonderful time staying at the lagoon villa apartment. The hosts, Fiona and Tobi were so kind and are always there if you need anything. They gave us advice and locations where we could go eat or do activities. The apartment is very clean, the garden is so beautiful and it is big enough to let children play. I loved the pool very much, I used it many times during my stay. Toby and Fiona came to clean the pool many times to make sure it was clean for their guest. I will definitely go back there.
reviews.title: Amazing location

reviews.text:
I had the best experienc staying in with Dahab Holidays. From well before take off I was offered solutions to things before I'd even thought about them. I had airport transfers arranged, dinner ordered for my first night, advice for getting set on the water. It was all amazing!

Fiona and Toby made me feel so welcome, the apartment was spotless and had everything I needed for my stay. 

Just a short walk to the beach to launch from Harry Nass center 2 it was the perfect place to make the most of fantastic wind, getting out on the water right after breakfast. I didn't once regret traveling alone, with friendly faces everywhere!
reviews.title: Solo windsurf and post winter season unwind

owner_response.text: Thank you for your great review. We are pleased that you had an amazing time. Cleanliness and service are our top priorities.  We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
What a stay! 
I was alone underway for a windsurfing holiday - and never b4 in Egypt. After booking the room, Fiona and Toby (who are perfectly conntected to the Dahab-every day live) contacted me for further information and any help. A shuttle from Sharm-el Sheich was organised; I got information about fair and realistic prices in taxis/restaurants/activities; I could asked everything I wanted (weather/wind/choice of wetsuit)! 
When I came first in the appartement, everything was clean (top!) and decorated with fresh flowers. Water and small foods were already there. I got instructions - in the right, appropriate way.
Wow - that is what I call a perfect hospitality. Gold standart and better.

I never had a feeling of being alone or being a "normal" tourist. It felt more like being a foreign family member. I never had such a god organisation and safe, clean, uncomplicate stay like in this very comfy appartement. For everyone, who does not like to stay in a hotel and wants to get connected easily - go for Fiona and Toby. I strongly recommend.
reviews.title: Outstanding stay!

owner_response.text: Thank you for your lovely review. We are pleased that you enjoyed the gold standard hospitality! That is so great to hear. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
We spent a fantastic 3 months staying in an Apartment in Toby and Fionas chalet.  Overall the quality of the apartment and homely feel to it is excellent.  Some apartments in Dahab can be quite "barren" and not exactly a "European standard".  Not so here!  Our apartment was beautifully appointed and furnished and the kitchen had more utensils than I think I do at home!  The garden is peaceful and sunny and well sheltered from the famous Dahab breeze.  The garden has pretty flowers, grass and a small pool to cool off in during the summer months.  Again grass is a varity in Dahab, so this was really a proper garden to relax in!  The property is just minutes walk away from the beach, both public and hotel beaches are available, both with very affordable food / snacks / sunloungers etc....  

There are also a few small shops nearby for daily essentials, an ATM, and a store that sells alcohol too should you wish an afternoon beer in the garden.

I am sure there are cheaper places possible in Dahab, but for what you pay staying here is excellent value for money for the quality of the apartment and the location.  There is zero traffic noise compared to many other noisy areas in town.  What really makes staying here are Toby and Fiona themselves who are always available via WhatsApp or phone call and live just minutes away.  They've lived here for over 15 years and know Dahab from restaurants to snorkeling spots inside out.  We stayed here for a full 3 months and their advise on everything from taxis to visas was invaluable.  They have both worked in hospitality and tourism for most of their working lives and make excellent hosts, I can't praise them enough!  Full marks from me and I really hope to come back 10/10!
reviews.title: Home away from home in Dahab!

owner_response.text: Thank you for your fab review. We are pleased that you enjoyed the quality, beautiful garden plus the peace & quiet. Thanks for the full marks!  We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
Our week at the seahorse apartment in the lagoon villa were amazing. The cozy and modern apartment and beautiful garden exceeded our expectations. We especially loved how private the apartment and garden are and will always prefer such an individual experience to large hotels. There is another apartment in the property, but we never saw or heard our neighbours and had the garden all to ourselves.
The apartment itself has modern furniture and all the amenities and kitchen supplies one might need. The highlight is definitely the spacious terrace and charming garden with a small pool.
The property is easy to reach. It is located in a quiet neighbourhood, the beach is just a 5-minute walk away. The city center is approximately 10 minutes by car.
Tobias and Fiona are great hosts and helped us on our way through the first days on the peninsula. 
We are looking forward to coming back since we felt at home since the very first day.
reviews.title: Cozy apartment with beautiful garden and great hosts

owner_response.text: Thank you for your lovely review. We are pleased that you enjoyed the privacy in the beautiful garden and that is exceeded all your expectations.  We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

photos.caption: Cozy terrace and private garden view of the seahorse apartment
Sunbed in the garden of the seahorse apartment
Spacious and modern bedroom of the seahorse apartment

reviews.text: A perfect place for holidays. We really enjoy our time there so much!! Toby and Fiona wehre amazing with us and so careful. The flat was so nice too with the garden and the swimmingpool. We recommend this place 100% .
reviews.title: Amazing place and people

owner_response.text: Thank you for your lovely review. It was great to see you again. We are pleased that you enjoyed the garden, pool and your holiday.  We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
Fiona and Tobi’s place was perfect for my family and I (4 people). Its very clean and cosy and its even better than the pictures!

Communication was very smooth and they did their best to organize an early check-in for our arrival. They offered us essentials in the fridge which was very nice of them. They were always available through Whatsapp and gave us awesome tips to enjoy Dahab :). 

We were lucky to spend two days alone in the whole place. But the place is designed in a way we didn’t come across our neighbor. So, it was perfect privacy wise. 
 
The chalet’s location is perfect. It is right next to a super market and the public beach is nearby but there are also different hotels where you can access their beaches as a day use. El mamsha is just approximately 10 mins by car and you can find taxis everywhere. 

I’d definitely recommend staying at Tobi and Fiona’s place. They are great hosts! Thank you guys for everything. We had a nice and memorable stay:)
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Dahab!

owner_response.text: Thank you for your wonderful review. We are pleased that you enjoyed the location, privacy and that it was even better than the photos. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text: Working in The Sudan as a teacher and fancied a last minute get away for March break. So happy to have discovered Fi and Toby on this site and their lovely Seahorse apartment. Very communicative throughout (1st trip to Dahab). Organised bike hire, which was very reasonably priced. So, it was a 10 - 15 minute cycle to Downtown each day, or a leisurely 3 minute walk to the lagoon. Having breakfast at The Swiss hotel as recommended by Fi and Toby. So many useful recommendations and offers of help throughout my stay, I will visit again for sure! The actual apartment is stylish, clean, safe, cosy  and even has a Lavazza coffee machine! Thank you both  for your hospitality and a wonderful break.
reviews.title: Mid Semester Break

owner_response.text: Thank you for your lovely review. We are pleased that you enjoyed your holiday, the hospitality and the top tips. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

location.address: Lagoon Villa Golden Beach, Medina, Dahab 46617 Egypt

name: Ganet Sinai Resort
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: Beach is amazing ,people are so helpful, facilitates are good and finally food was amazing specially the pâtissier chef ( dessert chef) his name is                 “ CHEF MOHAMED HAMED” was sooo kind and professional also cheerful 🥰🥰♥️♥️
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text:
Terrible hotel! Everything is ruined. the audibility in the rooms is very strong, you will hear any sneeze of your neighbors. The building of the hotel looks more like chicken coops. 
A disgusting bar is open on the beach. Employees cheat, the service is boorish. The bartender is rude. I'll never come back here!
reviews.title: The staff is rude!!!

reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights thinking it was a nice hotel turned out it is more of a nice camp !! The rooms are very small , not clean enough everything is old , broken or overly used . No kettle not even water to drink when we asked for water they said ok but never sent anything .We claimed to leave and have a refund they refused !! Will never return overthere again not recommended at all if u r seeking comfort by any means .
reviews.title: Bad experience

reviews.text:
we came to stay in a private villa and found it not clean and not suitable for us at all, we came to the hotel at night after we went to many resorts and hotel, they accepted all our special requests we had 2 dogs and my mother in a wheelchair and they served us in a professional way and very helpful and friendly stuff and the owner was following up with us everything and the most important thing the resort was full they have thier gustes already.. and we had some raw food they cook it for us,, we had a fantastic and awesome stay in it.
Thank you for all of the stuff and the owner.
reviews.title: A fantastic Resort

reviews.text:
My mother and brother live in Dahab, and have frequented the Ganet Sinai restaurant area often, ordering food at the table and accessing the sea from the beach. On this occasion, my family and I had just ordered lunch at the Restaurant, and my two brothers and I laid out towels on the sand in an empty space closest to the sea and sat on the beach (we knew that you had to rent the sunbeds, so we did not go near them), while our parents remained seated at the Restaurant table. A man wearing no identifying uniform or name tag came to tell us we had to get up and leave or pay to stay sitting there. My brother speaks fluent Arabic, and asked him who he was and where was this rule that we had to pay to simply sit on the beach, if we were paying guests of the Restaurant. Therefore this man, who we later discovered to be a "beach boy" named Mohammed, walked my brother to the reception, rudly saying "Don't you speak Arabic to me" and "You talk too much". We did not have an issue with there being a fee, it was the manner in which we were told to get up and leave by Mohammed, despite being clients of the resort. The reception simply made excuses for Mohammed's behaviour, and did not acknowledge the two e-mails I sent the owner, simply asking for an apology.

Think twice about deciding to stay here or visit their restaurant; despite there being very pleasant employees such as the restaurant staff, the way this event was handled says a lot with regards to client handling, in English, Arabic, or any other language.

Don't ruin you stay in wonderful Dahab by choosing the Ganet Sinai.
reviews.title: Rude and lacking - definitely would NOT recommend

reviews.text: I never stayed here but we are eating frequently at the restaurant because are using the surf school next door. For the price, the food is great. Salads are really good (70 Egyptian for Caesar or seafood, good portion). Fried rice also good and from seeing others being served, pizza looks good too... plus the beer is cold (extra points for the chilled glasses!) :) would recommend for a cheap and easy lunch when you’re at the lagoon.
reviews.title: Restaurant inly

reviews.text: I stayed there for 3 nights,the staff were friendly, the place in general is quiet and good for families with kids, my comments is the service is poor, no rooms amenities, bathroom is ok,  and the food is ok too.
reviews.title: i was travelling solo for relaxation, the hotel is cool, the rooms are clean, and the beach is great "sand Beach"

reviews.text:
Well, I was here as part of my visit to Dahab hospital. It is a nice, calm and well-organized resort.
It is a perfect one for families with a nearby supermarket. The breakfast was great with multiple kinds of dishes. The air conditioner efficiently worked. Finally, the staff there were not so friendly
reviews.title: A good place for family stay

reviews.text:
I had visited this hotel on 1996 with a friend and really enjoyed my stay . This year I had my family and explained that we are staying at 2 stars hotel to limit their expectations , yet the place was wonderful.  The receptionist Mr.Ashraf  was professional and very supportive , rooms were as expected small but clean and comfortable. House keeping did a good job . Restaurant was nice with wonderful staff especially with our kids and food was excellent,  we all enjoyed it especially that we had an outdoor BBQ which was so delecious.
Swimming pool is clean and safe for kids , I left my kids swimming alone with the life guard. Beach is the best in Dahab , sandy beach with calm water were wonderful for relaxing . In addition that the place is the best location for windsurfing and parasailling.  Hotel location is 5 min by car to downtime and hotel had pharmacy and mini market. 
I am sure that we will revisit this hotel again and again :)
reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations

reviews.text: My husband and I had a truly wonderful holiday. We had a sea and pool view. The staff were friendly and helpful. We had bed, breakfast and evening meals. We spent a lot of our time at the hotel, we love dahab and this was our third visit. It was one of the best holidays we have had. The bedrooms are it 2 story chalets in stagered blocks of 3. They were clean every day, with clean towels dayly. The beach there is great. You are provided with sunbed mattresses and beach towels whenever you want. I felt that it was good value for money. I would go there again.
reviews.title: Claref.saafan@gmail.com

name: Amanda Yoga Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
Second time but this time we were there for Christmas. Great christmas dinner put on by sammy and rita. Lunas getting big but she rules the roost. This time we only stayed 11 days and then 4 more after israel. Highly recommend. I would and will make reservations in advance. The secrets getting out !!
Chris and haleigh
reviews.title: Again, the best place in dahab

reviews.text: This is one of the best guesthouses we've stayed in, ever. Mohammed and Rita are warm and welcoming, and their chef Ali makes incredible breakfasts. They helped us arrange tours, massages, and even provided breakfast when we had a 3am pickup to go to Petra. Views and atmosphere can't be beat!! We'll definitely be back.
reviews.title: Felt like home

reviews.text:
Staying in Amanda Hotel was a great experience, the owners, Rita and Sammy are amazing people, kind, helpful, with a good humour. I really felt at home. The breakfast Ali makes will start your day, it's plentiful, fresh and delicious.
The rooms are neat and comfy, the common spaces are super, beautiful exotic flowers everywhere, great for relaxing. Everything is closeby, shops, restaurants, still it has a quiet, calm setting. Right by the hotel the reef is great for snorkeling, stunning coral and marine wildlife, Eel garden is just next doors. On top of all this, they have a lovely, smart, playful puppy, Luna, whose company will always light up your days. 
Watch out, if you come to Dahab and stay in Amanda, you might find it really hard to leave (your new home and family :) )
Thanks for everything guys, definitely see you next time!
reviews.title: Your new home in Dahab :)

reviews.text:
The common story in Dahab is "Come as a guest, leave as a friend" But at Amanda, it's .... come as a guest, leave as family !! Haleigh and Chris came for 3 or 4 days but ended up staying 18! Why? Well Rita (mom), Mohamed, and of course Ali and his amazing breakfasts. We even had Osama for a while and he was a delight. What can you say about this place. Every one we met staying there were repeat visitors as we will be next year too. Their new puppy Luna  was a real treat and we got to watch her grow up. I hope she remembers us next year when we come back.  Its clean and comfortable with delicious food. 

Great value, great people, great company, but the GREAT overall experience made it wonderful. Give Luna a pat for us!
reviews.title: Best breakfast.....EVER!!!!!!!

reviews.text: Clean, friendly owners, best value for money compared to at least 10 hotels we visited in the same category. Situated in a calm area on the pedestrian path. Will definitely go there again. The only remark: bungalows are not sound proof.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: this is the most chill out place in Dahab, i loved staying there.. the rooms are a bit old and not so nice, but the owner helps with everything he can ... this is always our first choice when we go to dahab .. also the location is perfect, so close to all the restaurants and supermarkets and it has the perfect weather somehow!
reviews.title: chillout

reviews.text: I looked at many guesthouses when I arrived in Dahab. I discovered there was a big difference in offerings of guesthouses and hotels in the same price range. Amanda was in a more serene and private part of the tourist area but still within walking distance of the action. The rooms were bright and spacious and airy and the view and sound of the sea on the semi-private beach from my room was the best part. The owner, Said, was friendly and very knowledgeable and helpful. The beachfront lounging area was beautiful and comfortable enough to stay all day and the restaurant actually had healthy meals with a variety of vegetables. The yoga studio was not hosting classes at the time I was there so I got to use the whole space to myself for self-practice. This place is truly wonderful and unquestionably the best value for the money in the area.
reviews.title: Gorgeous, peaceful, clean and kind retreat in Dahab

reviews.text: 房間很漂亮也蠻乾淨的，很有到中東的感覺，服務也很不錯，回飯店還有車子到停車場接送，還可以租中東服拍照，真的蠻不錯。
reviews.title: 中東風很特別

location.address: El Melal Street Eel Garden Area, Dahab 46617 Egypt

name: Sea Soul Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
I've been visiting Dahab for the last 6 years in different locations and this is the first time to recieve such a disappoitend treatment. The man who called himself the owner of the place which he is not and also called himself a retired pilot which doesn't apply on his manners and way of dealing with guests that proofs he doesn't have any idea how to treat people with respect his name is Ali. He doean't even care to ask how was our stay and if there is anything we need like other places do. Everyday we stayed almost 2 hours without water and they were renovating the place so workers start at 6 am in the morning to drill on our heads.
Will never visit the place again for sure.
Prices are overrated with no service in return.
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.text:
The hotel is a nice hotel in Dahab with perfect location & sea spot where u can swim , do snorkeling or diving.
My room was so cozy , clean and nice , the view out of the window was amazing as well. Ayman at the reception is so caring friendly & helpful & mr. Waleed the owner was extremely caring and nice, they did everything they could to grant me a pleasant stay. The breakfast also was tasty and nice. Would visit again definitely .
reviews.title: Nice & cozy

reviews.text:
Brilliant location in the middle of Dahab , with accessibility to all facilities , the staff is very friendly and they do their best to make your stay enjoyable , they tailor their services according to your needs , the theme of the place is very cozy and friendly .
The food is good and the rooms are clean .
Thanks to the owners ( Mr.Walid & Mr.Hisham ) for their hospitality ,it was one of my best vacations ever .
Definitely I will come back to the same place , and hopefully to the same room with the magnificent view .
reviews.title: Best vacation ever

reviews.text: The perfect location where everything is available from the great lighthouse reef to restaurants of all kinds, mixed with the most friendly people surving at any time lead by an extremely understanding general manager who is always present.
reviews.title: Great and friendly place

reviews.text:
At the beginning I thought it will be more than that, but unfortunately I found out that they have the worst service I've ever seen.
I won't go there again under any circumstances. Sorry that they have such wonderful location and not use it properly.
reviews.title: Great Location but nothing else

reviews.text:
Perfect place, perfect staff and elegant services where you can really feel at home in paradise.

Enjoyed everything there as the whole staff are so friendly.
I really had a non stop extreme feeling there. #Sea Soul Hotel ❤️.
reviews.title: Magician spot

reviews.text:
Very nice location friendly staff convenient bedroom all my family liked this place. 
Rooms very clean, breakfast as Egyptian style. Hotel sea view also near by restaurants and coffee. Hotel has diving center very professional
reviews.title: Convenient Hotel

reviews.text:
very good to stay at  it staff very friendly  unique  view on the beach  and back to the mountains great roof 
 view for relaxtion and taking your meals , coffe....and so on room is air conditioned the hotel is on the light house area it's the most beautiful place in dahab
reviews.title: port said

reviews.text: Most relaxing and enjoyable experience in a super friendly atmosphere in the whole world, sea view all the time, fantastic,  weather, can't wait for the next visit, you feel at ease all the time, Hisham the owner was so friendly that make us feel we knew him long ago, very enjoyable company, don't miss that great fun.
reviews.title: Dr. Ahmed

reviews.text: They are very friendly. The hotel roof top has exceptional view of Masbat (Dahab). Rooms are clean and service is good in comparison to the price. It is located in very good place & very close to the lighthouse (This information is important for the divers). The sea right in front of the hotel there are the new diving sites (Elephant statue, Bess statue and Horus Statue)
reviews.title: The best roof view in Dahab

location.address: Elfannar St. Light House Area, Dahab 21251 Egypt

reviews.text: thank you sababa hotel and restaurant ,i went there with my husband the place there was good it is next to the sea .we ate sea food it was delicious .the staff was helpful and service is fine too  the room was clean
reviews.title: romantic trip

reviews.text: This is a good hotel with clean rooms and a nice restaurant at the beach. The hotel is in the town so if you want it to be quiet outside  this hotel is not for you but if you want to go diving or swimming a lot this is perfect because it is so easy to go to your room for shower
reviews.title: Good hotel with restaurant at the beach

reviews.text: Easy entry to the sea, and during my swim the staff was so frendly to watch my personal stuff. Felt very safe. Free wifi. I used this place to work from. and after couple of days, they even reserved my favorite table for me in the morning!!
reviews.title: Best iced coffee in town

reviews.text: The place wasn’t breathtaking because I felt able to breathe properly when I arrived there. It’s full of various kinds of energies. The owners are great hosts with a friendly vibe along with everyone working there. The food was amazing and the beach was one of the best.
reviews.title: Tranquility

reviews.text:
The rooms are extremely Tidy & Clean , the service was excellent , the food was ridiculously good & they have best beach front in Dahab .

The owners were the best hosts ever . 

This is truly Dahab’s Hidden Gem
reviews.title: Dahab’s Hidden Gem

reviews.text: Clean air-conditioned rooms with private bathroom, friendly staff, reasonable prices, huge dining area and a dedicated space for yoga ❤️, no food but they have a spacious, well-equiped shared kitchen you can use yo cook and they can manage to get a private cook for groups if requested, close to the public beach which gets noisy last two hours of day light yet since I was usually at my room by the time it didn't bother me much. Glad I found this place, will definitely come again!!
reviews.title: Lovely Stay at the Wind Farm

reviews.text: We were there for 2 nights, we had the suite for 3 persons, and we were really satisfied of the property! The sea is in a lagoon and very clear, private access directly! They grow organic vegetables and fruits for the house restaurant!
reviews.title: Very nice place to chill and relax!

location.address: Off El Nasr Road, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text: Last day there the “receptionist” suggested we leave out bags in the room, instead of walking around with it and he explicitly said “pick them whenever you want”, we left them, and then when we came back to take them, the owner “Youssef” asked for money because he’s saying “these are the rules and this is not anybody’s fault but ours and the reception is out of it”. Never going to recommend this place to anyone, never coming back again, this is a place with literally no integrity.
reviews.title: Do not go there

reviews.text: Basic budget accommodation. Centrally located, with private beach access. Everything you could need, from shopping, activities, takeaways and restaurants within a five minute walk. Stand out service from the owners who cannot do enough to welcome you and share their local knowledge
reviews.title: 11 day stay

reviews.text: Hands down the friendliest and loveliest place to stay in Dahab. Gracious host, chill setting. The garden is spacious and the rooms often have a private bathroom. Compared to the 40$+ hotels along the coast this is a bargain.
reviews.title: The loveliest place to stay in Dahab

reviews.text:
Budget travellers & divers, look no further! "Fighting Kangaroo El Bulti" has everything you need. (Do not confuse it with the other similarly named fighting kangaroo hotel. This one is tucked away next to Seven Heaven hotel right on the main boulevard. A prime spot!).

The managers, a married couple, are amazing to interact with. Helpful & keen on making you comfortable. There's a shared equipped open air kitchen, and a nice common courtyard with comfy seats. The rooms are basic but everything is functional & clean. Hot water & AC available. For a central location, it is surprisingly nice & quite at night in the rooms. 

It's a great price for what you get! And if you're a solo traveller, I'm sure you'll make friends here.
reviews.title: Comfy, cozy, hospitable & a great value for money! Backpacker heaven!

reviews.text:
I have been here quite a few times. I would call myself a regular. Visited with family, friends and solo sometimes.
The camp is located in the heart of the action of the boardwalk. Less than a minute walk to all cafes, restaurants and water.
Rooms vary from 100 Egyptian pounds (5$) to 250 per night per person based on wether you want a room with AC, own restroom or a fan and a hut. 
The staff is very friendly and accommodating and the regular guests at the camp are also quite nice.
I highly recommend this place for a true Dahab experience. 
Oh, forgot to write how much I love the name ❤️🤣
reviews.title: Great location with an unbeatable price.

reviews.text:
Sam the proprieter and his family are what makes magic of this place.  Sam welcomes you with such a smile and kindness that you truly do feel at home from the first moment.  He keeps the pleasant courtyard impecable, and though the rooms are simple and a bit old, they're clean, functional, and very inexpensive.  Sam is always willing to help with anything you need and never pushes for anything.
Also we asked if they offered tours of the Blue Hole and Colored Canyon, which they did, and were the best price we found in town.  (We'd asked at nearly 10 different places).  Excellent value, complete satisfaction.  Especially the Canyon tour we were impressed by: their bedouin guide Mansour spoke excellent English, absolutely loved the desert and what he did, knew tons of information, never hurried or pressed us, and was polite and respectful the whole time.  
Try to stay here; if they're booked, at least take a tour with them.
reviews.title: Welcome Home

reviews.text:
I was in this camp for 2 nights in may 2016 with a friend of mine, we had a double room with an air conditioner that work with 50% of its power, the room has a cupboard.  The bathroom was very bad , no door and the toilet was not working well 
There is a place outside to sit and relax  with enough cushions we  have our meals in the open area in the middle of the camp , they have good free Wi-Fi , and oven if you like to make tea or coffee.
The owners of the camp are nice people, they can take you to the bus station and get you back . The place of the camp is in the middle of everything.
reviews.title: place to sleep

reviews.text:
I've been to Dahab 3 times, and I will never stay anywhere except Fighting Kangaroo!  Sam is absolutely the best host you could ever imagine - on my first stay in 2012, I got food poisioning (not from his restaurant, might I add) and he helped me with everything - made me soup especially for my tummy, brought me teas, water, everything, he even drove me to the clinic and stayed with me to make sure I was okay!  There isn't a more gracious and kind host anywhere! 

Regarding the rooms, they are very economical, clean, and have everything you might need.  He provides a communal fridge where you can store drinks and food and will cater to your needs if you want to cook something.  Some of the rooms have murals inside on the walls which past long term residents have created, and new guests add to which makes it all feel more friendly and like you are at your local spot.  

I recommend choosing one of the rooms with A/C for a few extra dollars per night.  Although you don't NEED the A/C, it never hurts to have it in case the breeze dies down at night or you want a few extra hours lie in on a lazy Sunday morning :-)
reviews.title: Excellent Service and Owner!

reviews.text:
I'm writing this review much belated to my visit last summer.  After arriving in Dahab, I looked for a place to crash and call home for the next month while diving.  I found a great deal at The Fighting Kangaroo and had no regrets.  Its right on the main strip in town and the owners are great.

Sam was very helpful and friendly my entire stay and consider a good friend I'd like to see once back in Egypt one day.

Lodging is affordable, location is perfect and the atmosphere peaceful.

5*
reviews.title: Great Camp, Great People!

reviews.text:
This is one of the few places in the main strip with true value for money and bedouin hospitality. They offer clean budget rooms and I've stayed here many times and once for a long period...there are many other expats who stay at El Bulti Fighting Kangaroo for long periods.Its a friendly family run place, lead by a bedoin who has been running the place since the 1970s and his son. 

There are two bedoin camps called Fighting Kangaroo in Dahab, this one is next door to 7th Heaven hotel, tucked in behind just steps away from the main pedestrian street along the ocean. For that reason it can be easy to miss, I only found it by accident myself the first time (I was staying in the other FK and the sign pointing the 'wrong' direction piqued my interest).

The owners are happy to arrange trips for you and will sometimes fire up the BBQ to cook for guests. It is quite near the muzin tower of the mosque so you'll hear the calls to prayer quite well, but hey...its Egypt. Overall a really great place to stay in Dahab!
reviews.title: Fighting Kangaroo El Bulti

name: Happy Land Hotel
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text: Staff is so friendly , rooms have all the nesscesities, the cafteria by the sea has a magnificent view , Drinks & food are so delicious... the place is pet friendly... they organisied for us many activties to discover dahab ... over all it was an excellent experience
reviews.title: Best stay in Dahab

reviews.text: The hotel is nice and the staff was friendly, tasty desserts and food .. i loved the vibes of the cafe .. that’s what serenity was .. and the menu price is normal according to other  cafes and restaurant in dahab .. highly recommended and the best in town .. till we meet again my happy land
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text:
I was feeling a bit depressed lately and things were going south so i decided to have some time off to disconnect and be able to continue. Coincidentally, i stayed in Happy Land Hotel in Dahab and it was my first time there; I ABSOLUTELY loved the place, vibes, people, program, and how helpful the staff is ❤️❤️

The place has many room options, garden view, sea view, and panorama
It includes the cafe you can see in the photos with great food and drinks accompanied with different genres of music all day long 
For the activities in Dahab, you’ll be connected with  Daria Tours and Brand Tours to assist you
Prices are very good 
Different events take place in the cafe and you can know more about the program once you’re there
AND you’ll be meeting the great stuff you can see in the photos -missing wegz el ghalaba, Mohsen, and many more- so please say hi to them all and let them know i miss them already ❤️❤️

Thank you so much for the great stay wishing you all the best cause you guys are the best ❤️
I promise to see you soon
reviews.title: Very friendly staff, amazing food, perfect parties and great view by the sea ❤️❤️❤️ many options for the rooms as well

reviews.text:
Very bad attitude from someone there called Ragheb,, he didn’t know how to deal with guests.
He is talking with me with a very bad way when i asked about my breakfast Hotel is not clear
Hotel entrance from El mamsha is bad

Not recommend at all….
reviews.title: Bad Attitude

reviews.text:
I stayed for four days and everything is just perfect from the cleaning and facilities.
They have awesome staff, they are so friendly and helpful.
For sure i recommend this hotel and i will come back soon ❤️❤️
reviews.title: What a wonderful vacation ❤️❤️

reviews.text: This was our rooms and one of the rooms wasn’t air conditioned and when we asked to switch the room they did nothing except for we can offer u a fan and it belongs to one of the staff and they doing it as a favor and they didn’t want to give us our money back
reviews.title: Do not recommend

reviews.text:
IT WAS THE WORST EXPERIENCE EVER !!! the rooms was so bad insect every where in Bathroom Too !!! The lamps was swish off when we are out !! and i have the Photo as eveidence for that and our food was unfortunately in the refrigerator!!
The Cats everywhere even unfortunately in the rooms was disturbed. we try to look the bad windowwhich opened by itself by the items
 you will be a guest in this hotel 🙂you won’t to open the door of your room you kicked it , it will open !!! can you imagine the sefty .....if you are a guest ..you will need a torch too because the lanps on the room is one or only to in the Hole so you won’t see any thing good
reviews.title: the review

reviews.text: The hostel was very clean , the room was very tidy and cleaned , provided with a good air conditioner and a satellite receiver . the view was too good in front of the beach . The hotel manager told us there are planning to make a swimming pool in the middle of it which will be very awesome .
reviews.title: A lovely hostel to stay when travelled with friends

reviews.text: It is a nice simple place with small area has a wonderful place to stay in front of sea, rooms are clean with TV and A/C with private bathroom and refrigerator. It is 10 min away by foot from The Light House.
reviews.title: Nice place has a nice sea access

reviews.text: Stayed at happy land hotel dahab, the hotel are very nice and quite , rooms are very nice and very clean and the staff are friendly and helpful , the price is reasonable for what they offer , we also ate at the restaurant just few meters from the hotel called shahrazad and we love the food there and the good and quick service , really was the best choice to stay and to eat , highly recommended
reviews.title: Best choice to stay

reviews.text: The location is pleasant, facing the sea. The private beach is nice for swimming and chilling out. However, our room was not cleaned at all during the 4 days of staying, despite our request. We were expecting such service on a daily basis. The reason of not cleaning was attributed to the Ramadan period. Asking for advice for a day trip we did nor get a trustable answer. The price of the requested trip would have been around 3 times higher than the price offered by travel agencies. All our friends in Dahab spent less and stayed in better places. The service needs a serious improvement.
reviews.title: Overpriced

reviews.text:
The place has nothing special at all. 
They asked for a minimum charge while they offer very bad food so it's quite hard to find something good to use your money for.
service is below average.
There are so many better places to go to in Dahab.
Just a few meters away there are a couple of much better places with no minimum charge.
It's a disappointment.
reviews.title: Rediculas minimum charge for nothing!!!

reviews.text: Nice and clean guesthouse, modern with great facilities yet decorated with taste.  You can go directly from the guesthouse to the sea. Nice clean and warm showers. Very welcoming and helpful host. Recommend
reviews.title: Welcoming place

reviews.text: This place honestly made me feel a lot differently about Dahab this time, it was very quiet, my husband was able to work from there. The view from inside and outside the room is spectacular. The managers are very nice and they have a very unique taste, I really like the simple artistic touches on the tables and the designs, the place is very clean and tidy, the room couldn’t be closer to the beach,it is now my favorite part of Dahab. I’m definitely going to be there again soon♥️
reviews.title: Chilled with a unique view!

reviews.text:
I travel to Dahab regularily  and have stayed at Sheikh Salem over 15 years. 
I was in Dahab, Sinai Egypt in March and I was very impressed with the renovation work.
The rooms are all bright with names instead of numbers. 
They each have bright, clean modern showers and toilettes, Very comfortable beds. Safes in the room with fridge, kettle. Outside each door is a fire extinguisher. 
There are lower sea view rooms facing the Arisha.
The garden has been beautifully renovated with garden rooms. The rooms are spotless, clean, fresh. With nice closets.and lots of space.
My favourite part is the Arisha on the beach. Its cozy, relaxed, chilled and absolutely a wonderful place for reading, chilling, staying out of the sun, chatting.
If the wind peaks up you can still sit out side or in the Arish. The beach is spotless and clean with great bedouin seating.
Fridays are not to be missed when the entire community comes for Friday Market. Where food, crafts, art, clothing and many other things are sold.
Most of all they have an incredible group of young dynamic people working as a team to give you an authentic Bedouin experience.
Great place for children, famalies, couples, friends travelling together or solo travellers. Great place for a sunset, moon rise or sunrise walk, or just for gazing.
New lights are  being installed along the entire beach area.

Its a few minutes walk to an endless number of restaurants, laundry service, market
A few minutes walk to Aasala where you can eat fresh fish, buy fruits, a few grocerie stores, places to buy wine and beer. Egyptian bakery, German bakery. A vegan soup bar. Several places to eat fresh fish caught. You can buy grilled chicken. There is a 
pharmacy.

A few minutes walk to the Light House
Where you will find other restaurants, bars, shops, snorket and diving places, bakeries, Indian, Russian , Italian and Egyptian Resturants. Another great Vegan Resturant near by.

For those who like to run, walk , bike  and exercise in the morning or sunset. A few great places to run include from Sheikh Salem to Lagoona. Sheilk Salem is the most beautiful part of the beach area in Dahab.

Ask Mohamed Amr and his team at the Soul of Sinai to organise day trips or multi day trips. To St Katherine, desert mediations, desert hikes and walks. 
Want to learn about Bedouin culture, music and food then sit in the Arisha and hear about the stories or take a trip with the team who will show you a truely authentic local experience.

Yoga, Meditation and those who enjoy quiet calm and relaxed atmosphere:
This a great place to stay if you enjoy calm, relaxed atmosphere away from bars and restaurants. Those who want to mediate, do yoga and have a spirtual journey. This is again a wonderful place to stay.

I highly recommend Sheikh Salem for a truely authentic local experience in Dahab , the Sinai with a wonderul group of people  who will take care of you and make you feel at home.
reviews.title: Fantastic atmosphere, chilled, relaxed, great rooms

reviews.text:
it's clean.
great hospitality.
very good location and beach.
they can get u anything u want and suggest where to go and make the needed arrangments for u.
Felt home :)
i don't think i will stay anywhere else.
I loved the food market they organize every friday. The food is really good and the prices as well.
reviews.title: Amazing place :)

reviews.text: Ha, I've never stayed in a hostel this far off the deep end before. Nasty dirty, there was a padlock on the door from the outside so we couldn't lock it from the inside and there was a huge opening above the door to the common area so privacy was non existent or anyone wanting to creep in could have. The one bed had such a curve in the middle that we had no choice but to sleep with no personal space. My friend and I pretty well slept in shifts it was that sketchy. Cheap, yes. Worth it, never! We checked out the next morning and found a really affordable spot half a kilometre down the same strip.
reviews.title: Oh My God!

owner_response.text:
Dear Sue,
We are very sad to read your review and i am personally sorry that you were given a room which should not have been given to guests at this time. Unfortunately on the date you stayed the guest house was almost full and you were given a room which is in much need of attention. This situation should have been made clear to you and should have been reflected in the price. However Mr Havez our General Manager has very poor English language skills and he was probably unable to explain this to you. He could have also explained that there is a safe in our office where you could have left anything valuable if you felt unsafe.
Therefore please accept our sincere apologies for this problem and be assured that this review will be taken seriously by all the business partners of Sheikh Salem House.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
If you don't give much care for the room service and want enjoy staying in one of the best locations in Dahab this place is quite nice.
It has nice arabian sit on the beach for tanning in the morning, and wounderful night time with friends for driniking and listining to music.
Very close to the local market where you can get all your beverage, grocery and food in the very regular official prices.
The place is very safe and owners are decent, friendly and not greedy.
reviews.title: Perfect for the limited or low budget traveller

reviews.text:
Great stay as a returning customer. Thank you Nicole and Hasan for making it memorable and enjoyable. What I asked for I got, Hamad was an outstanding waiter/ look after the guest in every aspect ones holidays should see fit. The front rooms have mind blowing views, great  price. Keep the news off the TV, stop the black dog barking at 3am, more chilled out music playing and I will be back. 
Safest area if you want to visit Dahab....
reviews.title: Much improved

photos.caption: Perfect location, right on top of the beach, where else in the world

reviews.text:
I have been coming to Dahab since 2003. I have been staying at Sheikh Salem House since 2006. This year it was closed for a few months for renovations and I was lucky it opened in time for my stay on this trip to Dahab. 

I am staying at Sheikh Salem House from April 9 to May 3 2013. I am writing from there now.
The rooms are spotless and clean. The beds are very comfortable. The best part is the wonderful hot shower with fresh water, not salty water. Lots of counter space for two ladies, good light in the bathroom. On this trip I was staying in the garden room, rather then the sea room for a change. The room is quiet, with full afternoon sunlight in the afternoon.
The staff are very friendly, accommodating. Ahmed who works in the Arisha makes fantastic Eyptian lemonade. He is very helpful. Shahah is also very helpful and cleans the rooms till it is spotless.  When I arrived I wanted stronger light, hooks and a table put in and they were done immediately.

The Arisha ( a bedouin tent covered with palm leaves on the beach is cosy and a great place to chill and hang out, with new cushions, carpets which are dusted and cleaned daily. You can enjoy Shisha, coffee, juice. The kitchen has also just opened.
This is the best location anywhere in Dahab. Its quiet  as its the last hotel on the beach, great place to snorkel and swim with shallow water infront of the hotel.
The hotel has two bikes available for guests to use if they wish.
Short walk to Assalya the Bedouin village with a market, super market, liquor store where you can get beer, wine, drinks, a few fish restaurants, fresh fruit and vegetable market.
You can easily walk to the light house area which is filled with restaurants of every type, shops, nightclubs, banks, post office.
Every morning I take a long w
Every day I walk along the beach  for about an hour, then take the bike and cycle all the way to lagoona.
Every Friday the Friday Market(Souk El Gomma) takes place at Sheikh Salem. Where you can buy clothes, foods from around the world.

Some days the winds pick up and we all gather in the Arisha to be out of the wind and read, send e mails, have a Shisha, bedouin tea... a really relaxing  atmosphere

My favourite time of the year to come to Dahab is in March, April and early May. However I have also enjoyed it in November, December and February.

The Dahab Bedouin Festival in April will give you the chance to  experience and learn about Bedouin Culture, food, music and medicines from the earth. An exciting camel race during the festival is highly popular.   There are activities for solo travellers, families, friends. The South Sinai Bedouin are incredibly friendly, helpful and their hospitality is legendary
 
Those who stay in the sea view rooms get the sunrise and in the evening the sun setting on the water.  Those who stay in the garden room can also enjoy it right on the beach.

It does not matter what time of the year .. I would highly recommend the new and refurbished Sheikh Salem House in Dahab..
reviews.title: Best Location, redone, refurbished, revived same charm!

location.address: El Melal Street Eel Garden, Assalah, Dahab 14611 Egypt

reviews.text:
Very clean bathroom and comfy beds, soap, towels, hot water, very near to the center, markets and at the same time in a quite street... We really enjoyed the roof, you can see the mountains and the sea from there, you can make your hot drinks for free.
 Million thanks to Mr. Hanna, he allowed us early check in and late check out without any extra payment, he even helped us with arranging internal trips.

Totally recommend it!
reviews.title: Your Motel in Dahab

reviews.text: it supposed to be a four nights stay, but i had to make it a night less unfortunately due to some personal issues. perfect location, near the beach area just 2 min walk, near all the night life, near all the restaurants you want, 4 mins to the light house area, 2 mins to the bus station. the manager Mr. Hannah he is the best, decent and professional. in short if you are searching for a cozy very clean and big beds with AC rooms in dahab you definitely had to see this motel
reviews.title: small cozy, very welcoming motel

reviews.text:
È il posto perfetto per soggiornare a Dahab, rapporto qualità/prezzo davvero ottimo. La camera è essenziale ma pulita, la posizione ottima visto che si trova in una via tranquilla distante 5 minuti a piedi dal centro 
Ci si può rilassare al roof sdraiati su cuscini e bevendo un buon the o caffè a disposizione degli ospiti
Il manager Hanna è una persona squisita, sorridente e disponibile, se avete bisogno di qualunque cosa vi verrà incontro
Ritornerò sicuramente
reviews.title: Perfetto

reviews.text:
Ein Kurzurlaub hat meine Freunde und mich in dieses Hostel gebracht.
Obwohl es sehr Zentrumsnahe liegt ist es ruhig.
Die Zimmer sind mit TV, Kühlschrank, Klima und Bad ausgestattet.
Auch wenn wir Europäer einiges renovieren würden, sind sie sehr sauber.
Im Hostel gibt es eine wundervolle Dach-Terrasse und eine Küche die man auch nutzen kann.
Für uns war das Hostel perfekt!
reviews.title: Sauberes Hostel und nette Leute

reviews.text: One of my friends recommend the place for me , actually it was a Good place to visit , nice service and. Evaluation i can give them 4,7/5 I highly recommend the place for everyone who wants to change his moooooooooood .
reviews.title: Good

reviews.text: I stayed at Dahab Dorms when doing a PADI Divemaster course at Red Se Relax Relax Resort dive centre. I enjoyed the accommodation and the transient travellers were a blast of fun. There are friendly dogs and cats all around. I managed to sleep well throughout my stay, however, some did not.
reviews.title: Have A Blast At Dahab Dorms

reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at the dorms/saver annex of Red Sea Relax Resort. The friendly and helpful people working here made it a very pleasant experience. The staff, especially Osama, assisted with everything from travel arrangements to tour and activity booking and helpful tips on what to do and where to eat. Perfect! Adjacent dive center is great value for money, too, and staying at the dorms is refunded when diving. Plus, access to a gym and a fantastic breakfast included. At nighttime the bar turns into the social hub of Dahab and especially the terrace is a cool place to hang out for a drink. Come to Sinai despite any travel alerts your governments might have issued - it's safe and this little gem is such a relaxing place with great vibe and hospitality and plenty of stuff to do in the area.
reviews.title: Best accommodation in Dahab

reviews.text: Have stayed here twice now and loved it both times. Great location, very spacious apartment attached to the dorms, and free breakfast at the adjoining hotel. Also very friendly and helpful staff as well, especially Osama - thanks! Without doubt the best hostel in dahab, and amazing value too!
reviews.title: Best in dahab!

reviews.text: I stayed here for 5 nights in November 2013, extended from 3 nights. I loved my time in Dahab with Dahab Dorms at Red Sea Relax Resort. I stayed in the dorms, which are located a 1 minute walk away from the resort. Staying here was like having a flat.  There was a kitchen and male and female dorms. This place has some of the best prices in town, the best location, and every day you dive with the dive centre, you get free accommodation in the dorms with access to their resort facility. Some of the freebies that were included were a clean pool, breakfast, kayak rental, gym and sauna access, strong wifi. The guys that work at the front desk could not be friendlier. I wished I could have stayed longer but at least I managed to convince some of my friends to!
reviews.title: Great prices, staff, and location with tons of freebies

reviews.text: I've stayed at Dahab Dorms twice and have loved it each time! the dorms are comfortable and clean and the complimentary water makes all the difference. Additionally, the staff, especially Osama and Said are so friendly, welcoming and professional! This is the perfect place to relax and not worry about anything. It's reliable, pretty, convenient and hands down the best deal in Dahab!
reviews.title: Best Deal in Dahab

reviews.text:
This place exceeded my expectations. In addition to the two dorm rooms (one male, one female, each with two bunk beds), there was a very large living area with dining table and chairs, couches, purified water and full working kitchen, including stove, refrigerator  pots, pans, dishes, etc.

The breakfast included in the price at Red Sea Relax Resort, it's "sister" facility," was excellent. it had many Western and Arab choices as well as omelets or pancakes made to order. Free instant coffee and tea was available 24/7. 

The beautiful swimming pool  at Red Sea Relax Resort provided a lovely option to the Red Sea.

Staff was friendly and helpful, especially Said who worked the afternoon/evening shift.
reviews.title: Great value & Terrific Breakfasts

reviews.text: We stayed in the dorms for 6 nights, and we were absolutely happy with our experience! There were six beds in the room and plenty of lockers for bags. The shared bathrooms were not always functioning, but a message at reception, and it was handled right away. Rooms were cleaned every day and bathrooms more often. The people at reception were very helpful and eager to make our stay as good as possible. The breakfast buffet was pretty good, with a good range of choices between fruits, cereals, eggs, sausages, pancakes etc. the bread could be a bit boring though. A nice touch was the all day free coffee/ tea/ drinking water!
reviews.title: Great value!

reviews.text: One of the best hostels I've ever stayed (and I stayed in hundreds), incredibly good value for money. Location - very good, it's located on the main seaside street. Hostel is a part of a bigger hotel. Staff - very nice, kind and friendly, it's possible to arrange bus tickets and tours at the reception for a fair price. Dorm room was very neat, beds comfortable. Atmosphere - superb! There's a bar at the hostel, with cheap beer and very nice terrance. But the best part of the show was breakfast, I expected tiny one - some juice, some bread, ham and cheese. I get hot traditional egyptian dishes, all were very delicious. To be honest - it's wise to pay for the night just to eat this breakfast, as it was better than meals in some restaurants before, and one night in dorm was cheaper than meals in those restaurants. Recommended without any doubt.
reviews.title: The best

reviews.text: The dorms were quite clean.  Situated on a resort grounds you get access to all the amenities.  There is a pool right outside, free wifi, internet, breakfast.  The dive centre is a bit pricier than others but I had a good time with them.
reviews.title: Great place, lots of extras

location.address: Lighthouse Promenade PO Box 78, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.text:
helpful, friendly and incredibly welcoming hostel! Rafiki‘s team provide Egyptian breakfasts, organize trips, host all kinds of activities such as language exchanges, game nights, karaoke nights, beach clean-ups and movie nights.
Rafiki hostels is superb!!.
reviews.title: an exceptional hostel!

reviews.text: As a traveler, I have to say that never felt that easy getting into a different culture... Two days there and I was already feeling at home! Dahab offers you a warm welcome and the Rafiki team and its guests become a family for real! I'll be back for sure ;)
reviews.title: Warm welcome to Egypt

reviews.text: My stay at Rafiki Hostels was absolutely exceptional - not just because the hostel's very well-equipped for travelers (great kitchen, beds with curtains for privacy, storage spaces for personal belongings, clean bathrooms, spacious roof, pool space...) but also because of the community spirit at Rafiki. This hostel hosts daily events to encourage interaction, which means I managed to make tens of friends within just a few hours of arriving, and I got to participate in all kinds of activities such as language exchanges, game nights, karaoke nights, hiking trips, sunset hikes, beach picnics and more. I highly recommend this place for extroverted travelers looking for an affordable
reviews.title: Highly recommend!

location.address: Peace Road In front of Sewage Central Station, Dahab 46617 Egypt

name: Hotel Rocketa
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

reviews.text:
I travelled to Dahab with my friends in Summer 2019 and we stayed in that hotel for about 4 days. The hotel located in front of the sea directly with a private beach and a good big pool for those who would love the pools more than beaches. Located from downtown of the city about 15 minutes walk. very calm and clean and good simple designed hotel.

My experience about 6 out of 10 and I may stay there again when I visit Dahab.
reviews.title: A good hotel to use in Dahab

reviews.text:
really nice facility that is beach front, small but comfort rooms with the needed facilities when we are comparing to other at DAHAB

the stuff is friendly and nice, and the location of the hotel is beside dahab downtown (walking distance).

the price is good comparing to other facilities offering the same experience.

Clean rooms

Friendly people

Just 2 problems: 
The pool wasn't very clean
The beach (like most of dahab hotels) was very rocky

reviews.text:
Hotel location is very good as it is close to shopping area (15 mins walk) and cafe area too. 

Rooms area is very good relatively to the hotel nature.
Rooms are clean 
No towels 
Room service does not visit your room daily! 

Doors are not working, so you may not e able to lock the door whenever you are out. 

AC is very good.
reviews.title: Very good just needs some maintenance

reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights and enjoyed it thoroughly. So quiet and beautiful, The staff is incredibly sweet and helpful, My room was bright, spacious and clean and was perfect for my requirements. i will be back.
reviews.title: Beautiful view, great staff, clean and comfortable

reviews.text: Very simple and clean place,  suitable for youth and couples. Staff there are so helpful,  specially Mr. Mohamed Magdy. Location of the hotel is very near from everything. View of sea in the hotel is so magical. This will be my only choice every time.
reviews.title: Excellent place

reviews.text: Good value for tje money. The hotel is clean although the rooms in the ground floor are a bit smelly. The breakfast is very basic. No activities or animation team in the hotel. The private beach very basic thing.
reviews.title: All rounder, kind of not bad for the price

reviews.text:
They are very nice friendly people and helpful they English breakfast is great .
This place next to Laguna quite ; not luxury's for me good location rooms are small but ok small refrigerator , air conditioner, small tv all i need for a room in dahab
reviews.title: Nice place for chilling

reviews.text:

but overall i recommend the place especially if you want a silent chill place

However rooms are simple but the whole building is unique. It remind me of Morocco style in buildings. The rooms are clean. But no toileters available. You should ask for towels from the receptionist.
The location is very nice and calm.. if you are lucky you can reserve the sea view rooms. 
The restaurant was not working during our stay but the wi fi was good.

It has multi varieties of rooms, such as single, double and triple… with private bathrooms and sharing one, depends on your choice and budget.

I can’t say it’s close to center; as it’s on center of DAHAB; every public place is near to you.
reviews.title: Dolphin 🐬 saves your time

reviews.text:
The best camp ever we feel at home the moment we entered the camp .Michael the owner was very helpful and friendly the place is very comfortable and cozy , the rooms are very simple and amazing , all the staff is very respectful and friendly 😍😍 highly recommended . Special thanks to Hady who helped us alot there and Emil also they are the best ♥️♥️was plessure to stay with you the past few days 
I Love u guys 🥰

The A/C is very good and not noisy at all.
The prices are excellent for the services, accommodation and location 👌🏼

Very good location In the middle of the city
